text2: O Paskah ma Rarame isigeto - geto ma biasa ma gubernur o nyawa moi o bui ma rabano wisisupu de wipalako , yamote yadadala to ona manga ngongiri .

text: And they had then a notable prisoner , called Barabbas .
text2: O orasi magena wimoi o bui ma rabaka o nyawa yadala winanakoka awi ronga o Barabas .

text: Therefore when they were gathered together , Pilate said unto them , Whom will ye that I release unto you ? Barabbas , or Jesus which is called Christ ?
text2: O nyawa yadadala imatolomuno o Pilatuska , de o Pilatus wasisano onaka , " Ngini nimode ngohi naguuna towipalako nginika . O Barabas , eko o Yesus iwiaso lo ma Kristus . "

text: For he knew that for envy they had delivered him .
text2: O Pilatus wotemo komagena , sababu wosihoda o Yesus Awi sala ihiwa , ena momongo ma ngale manga sininga ma siri Unaka , so o Yahudika manga roriri Una iwitota .

text: When he was set down on the judgment seat , his wife sent unto him , saying , Have thou nothing to do with that just man : for I have suffered many things this day in a dream because of him .
text2: So o Pilatus ka wogoge kusi kagena o hakim ma kursika , de ma peqeka ami sosulo imasidiado la mowidedemo unaka , " O nyawa Una Awi sala ihiwa , so upa nowisangisara bai ! Sababu ma ngale Una magena so ka putuka o gogiolo ma rabaka de togoruga de ngohi ai sininga foloi isangisara . "

text: But the chief priests and elders persuaded the multitude that they should ask Barabbas , and destroy Jesus .
text2: Duma o imamka ma bi sahe ona magena o nyawa yadadala yagegeo la igolo o Pilatuska , ma ngale o Barabas wipalako de wihike onaka de lo o Yesus gena bilasu iwitooma .

text: The governor answered and said unto them , Whether of the twain will ye that I release unto you ? They said , Barabbas .
text2: So ma Gubernur Pilatus wasano kali yadadala ona magenaka , " Nako yasinoto manena , ngini nimode naguuna ngohi towipalako nginika . " Ona yosango , " O Barabas ! "

text: Pilate saith unto them , What shall I do then with Jesus which is called Christ ? They all say unto him , Let him be crucified .
text2: O Pilatus wosano kali , " Nako komagena , de ngini niodupa ngohi o kia taaka kiaka ngini niwiaaso Una manena ma Kristus . " De ona yangodu imatoore itemo , " Una bilasu iwisidasangahadi ! "

text: And the governor said , Why , what evil hath he done ? But they cried out the more , saying , Let him be crucified .
text2: Duma o Pilatus wotemo onaka , " Asitagala ! Awi dorou o kia . " Duma ona ifoloi imatotoore , " Bilasu iwisidasangahadi ! "

text: When Pilate saw that he could prevail nothing , but that rather a tumult was made , he took water , and washed his hands before the multitude , saying , I am innocent of the blood of this just person : see ye to it .
text2: Ma dodoguka o Pilatus womanako una waaku kawa de ma ngeko lo he wosimake kawa , sababu yadadala gena manga galala idogo - dogo de o gangamo he isigoko . So una o ake waqehe de yadadala manga simaka awi gia watiodo de wotemo , " Ai gia tatiodo ! La ngini nikelelo ngohi ai sala ihiwa ma ngale o nyawa Una manena niwitooma bai ! So ka to ngini nia sala . "

text: Then answered all the people , and said , His blood be on us , and on our children .
text2: O nyawa yadadala gena yangodu yosango , " Iya , maha ka ngomi bato de lo mia ngopa de mia danoku Awi sone miamoku . "

text: Then released he Barabbas unto them : and when he had scourged Jesus , he delivered him to be crucified .
text2: So kagena de una o nyawa yadadala manga sininga wosimote so o Barabas wisisupu de wihike onaka . De una wasulo awi prajurit - prajuritka ma ngale o Yesus wingangapo , qabolo de gila - gila Una wisidoa onaka la iwisidasangahadi .

text: Then the soldiers of the governor took Jesus into the common hall , and gathered unto him the whole band of soldiers .
text2: So o bi prajurit o Yesus wingaho ma gubernur awi mahkamah ma riho o kadato ma rabaka , de awi baru - baru qangodu imatolomu o Yesus iwisigilolino .

text: And they stripped him , and put on him a scarlet robe .
text2: Kagena de ona Awi juba yahoi de o juba qauungu maro o bi kolano manga juba wisitibaku ,

text: And when they had platted a crown of thorns , they put it upon his head , and a reed in his right hand : and they bowed the knee before him , and mocked him , saying , Hail , King of the Jews !
text2: de ona lo o bi gota ma daara qatototopo yaaka koloko to Una Awi mahkota moi so Awi saheku isitalake . Qabolo de o didiki koloko to Una Awi kolano ma didiki moi iwisicoho Awi giaka , de kagena Awi simaka asa yobukuku isuba Unaka , iwisimaqe itemo , " Suba , Jou ! O Yahudika manga kolano ! "

text: And they spit upon him , and took the reed , and smote him on the head .
text2: De gila - gila Una Awi bioko yahohobi , de lo o didiki magena yaqehe de Awi saheko isingangapo .

text: And after that they had mocked him , they took the robe off from him , and put his own raiment on him , and led him away to crucify him .
text2: So wisimamaqe qabolo , de Awi juba qauungu yahoi de wisitiba kali to Una Awi juba masirete . De asa wituda wisisupu so itagi la iwisidasangahadi .

text: And as they came out , they found a man of Cyrene , Simon by name : him they compelled to bear his cross .
text2: Kagena de ona itagi so yahika o ngeko ma soaka , de o Kirene ma nyawa moi , awi ronga o Simon , wimake de wigegego o Yesus Awi sangahadi wamoku .

text: And when they were come unto a place called Golgotha , that is to say , a place of a skull ,
text2: Itekawa , de ona imasidiado o riho moi ma ronga o Golgota , ma ngale " O Sahe ma Papala ma Riho " .

text: They gave him vinegar to drink mingled with gall : and when he had tasted thereof , he would not drink .
text2: So kagena yahika de ona wihike Unaka o anggur de o sou qamamali isicapuka , la Awi siri isikurangi , duma Una wahame de woholu waudo .

text: And they crucified him , and parted his garments , casting lots : that it might be fulfilled which was spoken by the prophet , They parted my garments among them , and upon my vesture did they cast lots .
text2: So kagena de gila - gila ona wisidasangahadi de Awi baju imatekesikotoku yaaka moi - moi de manga gimina yamote o undi ma rabaka .

text: And sitting down they watched him there ;
text2: Qabolo de kagena ona yogogeku Una iwijajaga .

text: And set up over his head his accusation written , THIS IS JESUS THE KING OF THE JEWS .
text2: Awi sangahadika Awi sahe ma qokuye yalefo o galaki ma demo itemo : UNA MANENA O YESUS O YAHUDIKA MANGA KOLANO .

text: Then were there two thieves crucified with him , one on the right hand , and another on the left .
text2: O orasi magena Una de ikokoora yasinoto yasidasangahadi ka o wange moi , so moi Una Awi girinaka de moili Awi gubalika .

text: And they that passed by reviled him , wagging their heads ,
text2: O bi nyawa nogena yakokahino la wikelelo de ona manga sahe yagiwi de wisimaqe

text: And saying , Thou that destroyest the temple , and buildest it in three days , save thyself . If thou be the Son of God , come down from the cross .
text2: itemo , " Cedekele ! Temo Ngona gena o Gikimoi Awi Tahu aku naruba de nabiau , duma o wange saangeka de naoko kali . Nako igogou Ngona o Gikimoi ma Ngopa , de hika o sangahadiku nouti la Ani rohe nosisalamati . "

text: Likewise also the chief priests mocking him , with the scribes and elders , said ,
text2: Komagena lo o imamka ma bi sahe , de o bi guru agama , de lo o Yahudika manga roriri Una wisimaqe de itemo moi de moika ,

text: He saved others ; himself he cannot save . If he be the King of Israel , let him now come down from the cross , and we will believe him .
text2: " Cedeke ! O nyawa ma somoa wasisalamati , de Una Awi rohe masirete duma wosisalamati waakuwa . Nakoso igogou Una o Israel ma Kolano , qaloha ilaku de o orasi manena Una o sangahadiku wouti la ngomi miwingaku de miwipiricaya ka cawali Una !

text: He trusted in God ; let him deliver him now , if he will have him : for he said , I am the Son of God .
text2: Una wopiricaya o Gikimoika de womaeto Una o Gikimoi ma Ngopa , so hino la pakelelo idodooha o orasi manena o Gikimoi gena wodupa Una wisisalamati . "

text: The thieves also , which were crucified with him , cast the same in his teeth .
text2: De o nyawa yasinoto yasisasangahadi ona lo imasimote Una wisimaqe .

text: Now from the sixth hour there was darkness over all the land unto the ninth hour .
text2: La o wange itotiai , de o doku ma sigilolino magegena qapuputuku ma deka o orasi saange .

text: And about the ninth hour Jesus cried with a loud voice , saying , Eli , Eli , lama sabachthani ? that is to say , My God , my God , why hast thou forsaken me ?
text2: Sidago o cako saangeka de o Yesus womatoore , Awi ili wapoputuru , " Eli , Eli , lama sabakhtani ! " Gena o Yahudika manga demo ma ngale gena , " Ai Gikimoi , Ai Gikimoi , qadoohaso Ngona noidongosa Ngohi ! "

text: Some of them that stood there , when they heard that , said , This man calleth for Elias .
text2: O bi nyawa ngo kagena yogiise o gore magena de itemo , " Una ma nabi Elia wiaso ! "

text: And straightway one of them ran , and took a spunge , and filled it with vinegar , and put it on a reed , and gave him to drink .
text2: O nyawa moi to ona manga sidongirabano womatai - tai so o bunga moi koloko o kaka waqehe , so o anggur qakokiopiku watonoka , de o gota ma ideka wosisuruka , de watubo la ma ngale o Yesus wapipi .

text: The rest said , Let be , let us see whether Elias will come to save him .
text2: Duma ona yamuruo nagali itemo , " Mahasi ! La hika ngone pakelelo nakoso o Elia igogou wahino de wisiguti o sangahadiku . "

text: Jesus , when he had cried again with a loud voice , yielded up the ghost .
text2: Ma dodoguka o Yesus womatoore de wosoneka .

text: And , behold , the veil of the temple was rent in twain from the top to the bottom ; and the earth did quake , and the rocks rent ;
text2: Ato imatodoka o baro isifafati o Gikimoi Awi Tahu ma rabaka iraca de ileta sinotoka kadaku ma bati kudahu . O tona ihiti de o osu qapoputuru moi yahino , sidago lo o bi teto ilalago lo ileta - letaka .

text: And the graves were opened ; and many bodies of the saints which slept arose ,
text2: O bi boosu ma diaru ipelenga de o Gikimoi Awi nyawa isosone imomi so ioho kali .

text: And came out of the graves after his resurrection , and went into the holy city , and appeared unto many .
text2: De ona magena manga boosuno yosupu de done o Yesus o sone ma rabano wisioho kali qabolo , de yotagi yowosa o Yerusalem ma dokuka , eko o kota qatetebika . De kagena asa o nyawa yadala ona yamake .

text: Now when the centurion , and they that were with him , watching Jesus , saw the earthquake , and those things that were done , they feared greatly , saying , Truly this was the Son of God .
text2: Ma kapita moi dede awi prajurit - prajurit o Yesus wijojajaga gena o osu de lo o kia naga idadadi magena yakelelo , de ona yamodo imasidotirineku , de yotemo , " We ! O nyawa Una manena igogou o Gikimoi ma Ngopa ! "

text: And many women were there beholding afar off , which followed Jesus from Galilee , ministering unto him :
text2: Kagenadahu lo o bi ngopeqeka yadadala yakelelo ma soa sutu ikuruka . Ona magena iqomaka ma orasi o Yesus o Galilea ma bi dokuka so Una wimomote de wiriwoka .

text: Among which was Mary Magdalene , and Mary the mother of James and Joses , and the mother of Zebedee ' s children .
text2: Manga sidongirabaka kanaga ongo Maria Magdalena , ongo Maria o Yakobus de o Yoses manga awa , de lo o Zebedeus ma peqeka .

text: When the even was come , there came a rich man of Arimathaea , named Joseph , who also himself was Jesus ' disciple :
text2: Ma orasi he qamaqa - maqa , de o nyawa wokakaya moi o Arimateano , awi ronga o Yusuf , wahino . Una magena lo o Yesus wimomote moi .

text: He went to Pilate , and begged the body of Jesus . Then Pilate commanded the body to be delivered .
text2: Una wahika o Pilatuska , de wagolo o Yesus Awi sone ma bake . So o Pilatus awi prajurit - prajurit wasulo la o Yesus Awi sone ma bake magena iwihike unaka .

text: And when Joseph had taken the body , he wrapped it in a clean linen cloth ,
text2: So kagena de una o sone ma bake magena waqeheka la de o baro qaaare wosisangika ,

text: And laid it in his own new tomb , which he had hewn out in the rock : and he rolled a great stone to the door of the sepulchre , and departed .
text2: qabolo de wapoosu o Yusuf to una awi boosu masirete qamomuane , kiaka yaaaka o teto ma rabaka . Qabolo de una o teto ilalamo moi walolo o boosu ma ngora magena wosiperesu , qabolo de wolihoka .

text: And there was Mary Magdalene , and the other Mary , sitting over against the sepulchre .
text2: Orasi magena lo ongo Maria Magdalena de ongo Maria ma somoali yogogeku kagena yojaga yorisima Awi boosuka .

text: Now the next day , that followed the day of the preparation , the chief priests and Pharisees came together unto Pilate ,
text2: Ilangino , o Sabat ma wangeka , de o imamka ma bi sahe de lo o bi Farisika ma nyawa yotagi imakangaho o Pilatuska ,

text: Saying , Sir , we remember that that deceiver said , while he was yet alive , After three days I will rise again .
text2: de itemo , " Baba Gubernur , ngomi miosininga ma orasi wokokulai magena ka woohosi , de Una wotemo , ' O wange saangeka de Ngohi tooho kali . '

text: Command therefore that the sepulchre be made sure until the third day , lest his disciples come by night , and steal him away , and say unto the people , He is risen from the dead : so the last error shall be worse than the first .
text2: Komagena so migolo ngona nasulo la ani prajurit - prajurit itagi Awi boosu gena yojaga sidago o wange saangeka , ma ngale upa sidago Awi muri - muri Awi sone ma bake gena yatosi de yotemo o nyawa yadadalaka Una womomi wisioho kali , de asa yadadala yakulaika . So o gulai magena o nyawa yakulai ifoloisi yadala de o gulai ma nonomaka , kiaka Una ka woohosi de wotemo Una o Salamati ma Kolano . "

text: Pilate said unto them , Ye have a watch : go your way , make it as sure as ye can .
text2: Magena de o Pilatus wotemo , " O bi prajurit kagena naga , so nitagi la ona niangaho de hika Awi boosu gena niojaga nisidodiahi . "

text: So they went , and made the sepulchre sure , sealing the stone , and setting a watch .
text2: So ona de o bi prajurit magena yotagi o boosuka . De yacapka o teto isipoperesuka , la ma ngale idadiwa yalolo , de o bi prajurit yasulo la Awi boosu yojaga ma ngale o nyawa moi lo upa yahoi .

text: In the end of the sabbath , as it began to dawn toward the first day of the week , came Mary Magdalene and the other Mary to see the sepulchre .
text2: Ma orasi o Sabat ma wange ipasaka , so o Nahadi ma wangeka de goginita nosi o wange asa ibao , de ongo Maria Magdalena de lo ongo Maria ma somoali itagi o boosuka .

text: And , behold , there was a great earthquake : for the angel of the Lord descended from heaven , and came and rolled back the stone from the door , and sat upon it .
text2: Ato imatodoka o osu qapoputuru moi yahino , sababu o Jou Awi malaikat moi o sorogaka de wouti de waloloka o teto ilalamo magena , kiaka o boosu isipoperesu , de wogogeku kagena ma qokuka .

text: His countenance was like lightning , and his raiment white as snow :
text2: O malaikat magena awi jamani isora de ileto - leto maro o tatawi , de lo awi baju gena qaare maro o namo o gotola ma gogo .

text: And for fear of him the keepers did shake , and became as dead men .
text2: So o bi prajurit kagena yojojajaga gena yamodo imasidotirineku , sidago yaaku kawa imaoko so ona idadi maro ka o nyawa isosone .

text: And the angel answered and said unto the women , Fear not ye : for I know that ye seek Jesus , which was crucified .
text2: O malaikat magena wotemo o bi ngopeqeka magenaka , " Upa nimodo ! Ngohi tininako ngini niwisari o Yesus , kekiaka Una wisisasangahadika gena .

text: He is not here : for he is risen , as he said . Come , see the place where the Lord lay .
text2: Hika nianano masirete kanena Awi riho de kanena Una iwihahado . Duma ngo kanena wihiwaka . Una wooho kali , maro iqomaka wosingangasu nginika !

text: And go quickly , and tell his disciples that he is risen from the dead ; and , behold , he goeth before you into Galilee ; there shall ye see him : lo , I have told you .
text2: So nimatai - tai nitagi nisingangasu to Una Awi muri - murika , Una wooho kali de lo wotagi woqomaka o Galileaka . Kadoka ngini asa Una niwikelelo . Kamagena ngohi tinidedemo nginika . "

text: And they departed quickly from the sepulchre with fear and great joy ; and did run to bring his disciples word .
text2: So kagena o boosuka de ona imatai - tai yomajobo . Ona yamodo duma de manga more de manga nalika . Ona itagi imagogora la isingangasu Awi muri - murika .

text: And as they went to tell his disciples , behold , Jesus met them , saying , All hail . And they came and held him by the feet , and worshipped him .
text2: Imatodokano , Una kagena naga imakamake de ona , de wotemo , " Tabea ! " De ona imasidate Unaka , de Awi qohu yakololo de iwisuba Una .

text: Then said Jesus unto them , Be not afraid : go tell my brethren that they go into Galilee , and there shall they see me .
text2: Kagena de wotemo , " Upa nimodo ! Nitagi bato , niasingangasu Ai dodiao imomote ona magenaka la ona yotagi o Galileaka , de kadoka asa ona Ngohi ikelelo . "

text: Now when they were going , behold , some of the watch came into the city , and shewed unto the chief priests all the things that were done .
text2: O ngopeqeka ona magena imajoboka , de o bi prajurit o boosu yojajaga ona magena itagi yakahika o dokuka , de o kia naga o boosuka idadadika gena qangodu ona isingangasu o imam ma bi saheka .

text: And when they were assembled with the elders , and had taken counsel , they gave large money unto the soldiers ,
text2: De o imamka ma bi sahe ona magena de o Yahudika ma roriri imatekefakati . Ona isitatapuka , lebelaha o pipi idala yasibaja o bi prajurit magenaka la ona upa yodedemo o nyawaka ,

text: Saying , Say ye , His disciples came by night , and stole him away while we slept .
text2: de yatemo onaka , " Nakoso o nyawa nisano , de ngini gena bilasu nitemo , ' O putu itongiraba ngomi mikioloka , de o Yesus Awi muri - muri ona magena yahino de Awi sone ma bake gena yatosika . '

text: And if this come to the governor ' s ears , we will persuade him , and secure you .
text2: Nakoso manena de ma gubernur woise , de maha ka ngomi asa miwibaja la o susa o kiawa idadi nginika . "

text: So they took the money , and did as they were taught : and this saying is commonly reported among the Jews until this day .
text2: Magena de o bi prajurit o pipi magena yaqehe de yodedemo maro o kia yasibobeseso onaka . Sidago o wange manena de o jarita magena ka isiade - adesi o bi Yahudika ma nyawa manga sidongirabaka .

text: Then the eleven disciples went away into Galilee , into a mountain where Jesus had appointed them .
text2: O Yesus Awi muri - muri yamogiowo de moi yotagi o Galilea ma tonaka , o tala moika kiaka iqomaka Una wadedemo qabolo onaka .

text: And when they saw him , they worshipped him : but some doubted .
text2: Kagena asa idadi ona gena Una iwikelelo de ona iwisuba Unaka . Duma manga sidongirabaka yamuruo naga manga siningaka isitatapu waasi .

text: And Jesus came and spake unto them , saying , All power is given unto me in heaven and in earth .
text2: So kagena de Una womasidate onaka , de watemo , " O kuasa o sorogaka de lo o duniaka gena qangodu ihike Ngohika .

text: Go ye therefore , and teach all nations , baptizing them in the name of the Father , and of the Son , and of the Holy Ghost :
text2: So nitagi ma bati o bi bangsa o dunia ma ngoguka niaado de o bi nyawa yangodu niadoto la ona idadi to Ngohi Ai nyawa imomote . Niaosi ona de o Baba Gikimoi , de ma Ngopa , de lo o Gurumi Qatetebi to Ona Manga ronga .

text: Teaching them to observe all things whatsoever I have commanded you : and , lo , I am with you alway , even unto the end of the world . Amen .
text2: Niadoto onaka o bi moi - moi qangodu o kia tinisusulo nginika . De niososininga , Ngohi asa togoge dede ngini o orasi manena de isikahika , ma bati o dunia ma dodoguka . "

text: The beginning of the gospel of Jesus Christ , the Son of God ;
text2: Manena gena o habari qaloloha o Yesus Kristus , o Gikimoi Awi Ngopa .

text: As it is written in the prophets , Behold , I send my messenger before thy face , which shall prepare thy way before thee .
text2: O Yohanes wahino woqomano , de o demo moi wosingangasu la o bi nyawa wasidailako so o Yesus asa wahino wadoto . Maro ma nabi Yesaya awi buku ma rabaka isilefo gena , o Gikimoi wotemo Awi Ngopaka , " Una to Ngohi Ai sosulo Ngohi towisulo una asa woqomano , una magena wosidailako to Ngona Ani ngeko .

text: The voice of one crying in the wilderness , Prepare ye the way of the Lord , make his paths straight .
text2: So kanaga o nyawa moi o tona ibobeleuka womatotoore , ' He ! Ma ngale nanga Jou Awi hino gena ngini nimasidailako . La o ngeko gena bilasu nisibolowo de nisitiai . ' "

text: And John was clothed with camel ' s hair , and with a girdle of a skin about his loins ; and he did eat locusts and wild honey ;
text2: So kagena de o nyawa moi , awi ronga o Yohanes , wahino de awi goge o tona ibobeleuka , so awi ino gena ka o galasosoko de o hopu ifofufuru ma madu , de awi baju lo ka o unta ma gogo , de awi doi ma bobiliku lo ka o haiwani ma kahi . So kagena wahino de wosingangasu de womatoore wotemo , " He ! O nyawa nia manara qatotorou qangodu bilasu nimatoba de nimatoduba de niosi kasi , la nia dorou o Gikimoi wosiapongu . " So o Yudea ma daerano de lo o Yerusalem ma dokuno ma nyawa yadala yahino o Yohanes Wooosika . So ona yangodu manga dorou imamangaku o Gikimoi Awi simaka , qabolo de asa o Yohanes waosi o Yordan ma Seleraka .

text: And preached , saying , There cometh one mightier than I after me , the latchet of whose shoes I am not worthy to stoop down and unloose .
text2: De o Yohanes o habari moili wosihabari onaka , " Ma orasika kanaga wimoi asa wahino wotuuruno , gena Una Awi manara foloi ilamo , so ngohi manena to Una Awi simaka gena o kia lo waali idahe , ka Awi capato ma gumi tasose maro o nyawa wileleleani moi lo idadiwa .

text: I indeed have baptized you with water : but he shall baptize you with the Holy Ghost .
text2: Dede o ake ngohi manena tinisiosika , duma Una magena asa wahino de ngini la kanaga nimatoba de nimatodubaka , ngini magenaka wosingosa o Gurumi Qatetebi ma kuasa nia sininga ma rabaka wopareta . "

text: And it came to pass in those days , that Jesus came from Nazareth of Galilee , and was baptized of John in Jordan .
text2: Ma orasi magena o Yesus wahino o Nazaretno o Galilea ma tonaka . De o Yohanes o Yesus wiosi o Yordan ma Seleraka .

text: And straightway coming up out of the water , he saw the heavens opened , and the Spirit like a dove descending upon him :
text2: So ma orasi Una o akeye wodola , de imatodoka wakelelo o dipa ipelenga de o Gikimoi Awi Gurumi iuti imatero maro o namo dara de itangi Unaku .

text: And there came a voice from heaven , saying , Thou art my beloved Son , in whom I am well pleased .
text2: Ato itangi de o ili moi yoise o sorogaku itemo , " Ngona manena to Ngohi Ai Ngopa tonidododara . De Ngona gena Ngohi tonidupa . "

text: And immediately the Spirit driveth him into the wilderness .
text2: Komagena qabolo de o Gikimoi Awi Gurumi wingaho o tona ibobeleuka .

text: And he was there in the wilderness forty days , tempted of Satan ; and was with the wild beasts ; and the angels ministered unto him .
text2: Kagena o tona ibobeleuka una wogoge ma deka o wange moruha , de o Iblis yahino iwibaja la ma ngale o dorouku wisitura . De o haiwani ifofufuruka womasicapuka , duma o bi malaikat yahino so asa Una iwileleanika .

text: Now after that John was put in prison , Jesus came into Galilee , preaching the gospel of the kingdom of God ,
text2: So kagena de o Yohanes wibuika , qabolo de o Yesus wakahino o Galilea ma tonano , de wosihabari o Gikimoi Awi habari qaloloha

text: And saying , The time is fulfilled , and the kingdom of God is at hand : repent ye , and believe the gospel .
text2: wotemo , " Ma orasi yaadoka , so manena asa o Gikimoi wopareta maro o kolano moi . Mutuwade hika niise la nimatoba de nimatoduba , de o habari qaloloha magena niopiricaya bai ! "

text: Now as he walked by the sea of Galilee , he saw Simon and Andrew his brother casting a net into the sea : for they were fishers .
text2: Ma moiku o Yesus wotagi - tagi o Galilea ma Talaga ma dateka , de Una wamake o nyawa yasinoto o nao isasari , ona magena o Simon de ma nongoru moi awi ronga o Andreas . Ona yasinoto o talaga ma dateno o nao yosoma .

text: And Jesus said unto them , Come ye after me , and I will make you to become fishers of men .
text2: Kagena de o Yesus waaso de wotemo onaka , " He ! Hino la nimote Ngohi . Nako ngini gena Ngohi aku tinidoto ma ngale ngini o bi nyawa asa niadoto la imote Ngohika , imatero maro o nao niasoma la niatolomu . "

text: And straightway they forsook their nets , and followed him .
text2: Gila - gila ona manga soma yodongosaka , so asa itagi Una iwimoteka .

text: And when he had gone a little further thence , he saw James the son of Zebedee , and John his brother , who also were in the ship mending their nets .
text2: So kagena de Una wotagi wogila - gila de wamake kali o Yakobus de awi nongoru o Yohanes . Ona magena de manga baba o Zebedeus manga soma isidiahi o deru ma rabaka .

text: And straightway he called them : and they left their father Zebedee in the ship with the hired servants , and went after him .
text2: De ona lo o Yesus gila - gila waaso , so kagena de ona manga baba de manga roriwo o deruka yadongosa de asa Una iwimoteka .

text: And they went into Capernaum ; and straightway on the sabbath day he entered into the synagogue , and taught .
text2: O Yesus de Awi muri - muri ikahika imasidiado o Kapernaum ma dokuka . Kagena de o Sabat ma wangeka de Una wowosa o Yahudi manga puji ma tahuka de wodoto .

text: And they were astonished at his doctrine : for he taught them as one that had authority , and not as the scribes .
text2: O nyawa yosigogigise Awi dodoto magena yangodu yohairani , sababu Una wodoto de o Gikimoi wikuasaka , de imaketerowa de o Yahudika ma bi guru agama manga dodoto .

text: And there was in their synagogue a man with an unclean spirit ; and he cried out ,
text2: Ma orasi magena o puji ma tahu ma rabaka o nyawa wikokitoka moi de una womatoore wotemo o Yesuska ,

text: Saying , Let us alone ; what have we to do with thee , thou Jesus of Nazareth ? art thou come to destroy us ? I know thee who thou art , the Holy One of God .
text2: " He , Yesus ! Ngona o Nazaretno de Ani edekati o kia dede ngomi . Ngona nahino la nomimorutu ngomi ? Ngohi toninakoka , Ngona gena o Sosulo Nitetebi moi o Gikimoino . "

text: And Jesus rebuked him , saying , Hold thy peace , and come out of him .
text2: Kagena de o Yesus wodogore o toka magenaka wotemo , " Nomapopongo de nosupu o nyawa una manenano ! "

text: And when the unclean spirit had torn him , and cried with a loud voice , he came out of him .
text2: Kagena de o toka magena qatoosa so o nyawa magena wisiwawako yapoputuruka de imatoore imaili - ilika , de o nyawa una magenano isupu duma iwidoohawa .

text: And they were all amazed , insomuch that they questioned among themselves , saying , What thing is this ? what new doctrine is this ? for with authority commandeth he even the unclean spirits , and they do obey him .
text2: O bi nyawa yangodu yohairani poli , sidago ona itemo moi de moika , " Wobarani bolo ! Una Awi dodoto qamomuane ! De Awi kuasa Una aku wapareta o bi toka isupu , de igogou wisigise Unaka . "

text: And immediately his fame spread abroad throughout all the region round about Galilee .
text2: O orasi magena qabolo o habari ma ngale Una qatai yogiise kiaka bato sidago o doku o Galilea ma sigilolika .

text: And forthwith , when they were come out of the synagogue , they entered into the house of Simon and Andrew , with James and John .
text2: Qabolo de o Yesus wosupu o puji ma tahuno , de o Yakobus de o Yohanes lo iwimote wotagi o Simon de o Andreas manga tahuka .

text: But Simon ' s wife ' s mother lay sick of a fever , and anon they tell him of her .
text2: De o nyawa isingangasu o Yesuska , o Simon ma toroa misiri de o sosahu mitubu .

text: And he came and took her by the hand , and lifted her up ; and immediately the fever left her , and she ministered unto them .
text2: Kagena de o Yesus ami giaka wacoho so womisimomi de milohaka . Gila - gila miputuruka , so muna aku ona maleleani .

text: And at even , when the sun did set , they brought unto him all that were diseased , and them that were possessed with devils .
text2: Ma orasi he qaputu de o nyawa yadala yabisisiri de yabikokitoka yatotota Unaka .

text: And all the city was gathered together at the door .
text2: Komagena lo o doku ma nyawa yadadala yahino imatolomu manga tahu ma lolohaka .

text: And he healed many that were sick of divers diseases , and cast out many devils ; and suffered not the devils to speak , because they knew him .
text2: Komagena de Una yasisiri wasilohaka de yakokitoka manga toka wodusu so imahoika . De wasimaha kawa manga toka ibicara , sababu o toka lo iwinako Una magena naguuna .

text: And in the morning , rising up a great while before day , he went out , and departed into a solitary place , and there prayed .
text2: Ilangi - langi qaginitano , de o Yesus womomika , so wosupu o doku ma duduka so wahika o riho moi imatitingano , la kagena asa Una wosumbayang .

text: And Simon and they that were with him followed after him .
text2: Duma o Simon de awi dodiao itagi so Una wisari .

text: And when they had found him , they said unto him , All men seek for thee .
text2: Yahika ma soaka , de Una iwimakeka , de ona itemo , " Wewe , Baba ! O nyawa yadala nisari bai ! "

text: And he said unto them , Let us go into the next towns , that I may preach there also : for therefore came I forth .
text2: Duma Una wosango wotemo , " Bolo bato niaqohaka , la ngone pogila - gila potagi kadoke o doku ma somoaka , de tosihabari de lo tadoto o Gikimoi Awi habari qaloloha . Sababu ma ngale magegena so Ngohi manena tahino o dunia ma qokuka . "

text: And he preached in their synagogues throughout all Galilee , and cast out devils .
text2: Kagena de Una wotagi o Galilea ma bi doku wakiloli so o habari qaloloha wosihabari o bi puji ma tahu ma rabaka , komagena lo idala manga toka wodusu de wasisaka .

text: And there came a leper to him , beseeching him , and kneeling down to him , and saying unto him , If thou wilt , thou canst make me clean .
text2: De o nyawa moi wipapado wakahika o Yesuska , de wobukuku wosuba . De wogolo wotemo , " Baba , nako nomode , de igogou aku noisiloha . "

text: And Jesus , moved with compassion , put forth his hand , and touched him , and saith unto him , I will ; be thou clean .
text2: Magena de o Yesus foloi wigalusiri so Awi gia watoa de una magena , ngaroko wipapado , duma awi roheka wapaqa de wotemo , " Ngohi tomode . So nilohaka bato . "

text: And as soon as he had spoken , immediately the leprosy departed from him , and he was cleansed .
text2: So o orasi magena qabolo de una wilohaka so he wipado kawa .

text: And he straitly charged him , and forthwith sent him away ;
text2: Magena de o Yesus wisulo woliho de wipoma wotemo ,

text: And saith unto him , See thou say nothing to any man : but go thy way , shew thyself to the priest , and offer for thy cleansing those things which Moses commanded , for a testimony unto them .
text2: " Ngona bilasu nosininga , upa sidago nodedemo o nyawaka . Cawali nogila - gila o imamka , la ani rohe yatailako . So naaka maro o Musa awi bobita wotetemoka , de ani gaso natota o Gikimoika , maro o sinako moi o bi nyawaka igogou ngona nilohaka . "

text: But he went out , and began to publish it much , and to blaze abroad the matter , insomuch that Jesus could no more openly enter into the city , but was without in desert places : and they came to him from every quarter .
text2: Duma una wotagi o nyawa yadadalaka wosihabari so o nyawa yadadala yogiise . So o Yesus o bi dokuka wowosa waakuwa . Ngaroko Una asa ka wahika ma soaka , duma o nyawa o kiano bato yadala icarawa asa yakahika Unaka .

text: And again he entered into Capernaum , after some days ; and it was noised that he was in the house .
text2: O wange muruo naga ipasa de o Yesus o Kapernaumka wowosa kali , de o nyawa yogiise o tahu moika wogoge .

text: And straightway many were gathered together , insomuch that there was no room to receive them , no , not so much as about the door : and he preached the word unto them .
text2: So kagena o tahuka o nyawa imatolomu yadala poli , sidago o tahu ma raba yawedo de o ngora lo yatihiwo . So kagena Una wodoto .

text: And they come unto him , bringing one sick of the palsy , which was borne of four .
text2: So Awi manara ma rabaka , de o nyawa wolulugu moi awi nyawa yaruha so o dangiku iwisitide iwingaho o Yesuska .

text: And when they could not come nigh unto him for the press , they uncovered the roof where he was : and when they had broken it up , they let down the bed wherein the sick of the palsy lay .
text2: Kagena o nyawa yadala poli , so idadiwa yahika o Yesuska . Yahika idadiwa , so o tahu ma qokuye idola de kudaku yapusune , so o jongutuku wingado la kugena o Yesus Awi simaku iwisiha o nyawa manga sidongirabaku .

text: When Jesus saw their faith , he said unto the sick of the palsy , Son , thy sins be forgiven thee .
text2: La o Yesus wakelelo manga piricaya ma lamo komagena , de wotemo woluluguka , " Ai ngopa , ani sininga nosiputuru . To ngona ani dorou tosiaponguka . "

text: But there were certain of the scribes sitting there , and reasoning in their hearts ,
text2: Duma kagena de o bi guru agama yamuruo naga igogeku , de manga sininga ma rabaka itemo ,

text: Why doth this man thus speak blasphemies ? who can forgive sins but God only ?
text2: " Wobarani bolo ! Wotemo woluluguka , ' Ani dorou tahoi . ' Ngone panako ka cawali o Gikimoi aku o dorou wahohoi , so Awi demo magenena ma meta o Gikimoi wisiceke . "

text: And immediately when Jesus perceived in his spirit that they so reasoned within themselves , he said unto them , Why reason ye these things in your hearts ?
text2: Kagena de manga sininga ma takasiri o Yesus wosihoda , so wotemo , " Upa niapikiri koloko to ngini nia sininga ma rabaka .

text: Whether is it easier to say to the sick of the palsy , Thy sins be forgiven thee ; or to say , Arise , and take up thy bed , and walk ?
text2: Nako Ngohi o nyawa woluluguka totemo , ' Ani dorou tosiapongu , ' de nakoso imahoi , eko hiwa , ngini niakelelowa so nianakowa . Duma nako totemo , ' Nomaoko , de ani jongutu natide , la notagi , ' de ngini aku niakelelo de nianakoka Ai buturu iwisilohaka .

text: But that ye may know that the Son of man hath power on earth to forgive sins , ( he saith to the sick of the palsy , )
text2: So Ngohi asa towisiloha la asa ninako , Ngohi o Nyawa ma Duhutu manena o duniaka tahino de Ai kuasaka la nia dorou tasiapongu . " So wotemo woluluguka ,

text: I say unto thee , Arise , and take up thy bed , and go thy way into thine house .
text2: " Nomaoko ! De ani jongutu nalolo la natoti de noliho . "

text: And immediately he arose , took up the bed , and went forth before them all ; insomuch that they were all amazed , and glorified God , saying , We never saw it on this fashion .
text2: De igogou o nyawa magena womaoko , qabolo de gila - gila awi jongutu watoti de womajobo . Magena de o nyawa yadadala ona magena yohairani de o Gikimoi wisigiliri itemo , " Ma moi waasi pakelelo maro idadi komagenena bai ! "

text: And he went forth again by the sea side ; and all the multitude resorted unto him , and he taught them .
text2: O Yesus de Awi muri - muri ikahino kali o Galilea ma talagaka . O nyawa yadadala yahino Unaka , so Una wadoto ona magena .

text: And as he passed by , he saw Levi the son of Alphaeus sitting at the receipt of custom , and said unto him , Follow me . And he arose and followed him .
text2: So ma orasi Una kagena wokahika , Una wikelelo o nyawa moi o balastengi wototolomu awi ronga o Lewi , o Alfeus ma ngopa , o kantorka wogogeku . Kagena de o Yesus wotemo unaka , " Nahino noimote Ngohi . " Gila - gila o Lewi womaoko de wotagi o Yesus iwimoteka .

text: And it came to pass , that , as Jesus sat at meat in his house , many publicans and sinners sat also together with Jesus and his disciples : for there were many , and they followed him .
text2: Ma orasi magena ipasaka , o Yesus de Awi muri - muri o Lewi awi tahuka imatamiye yooqo . De o balastengi itotolomu yadala de o bi nyawa yadala manga sininga qatotorou o bi kawasa yahoholu , ona magena lo imatamiye yooqo de o Yesus .

text: And when the scribes and Pharisees saw him eat with publicans and sinners , they said unto his disciples , How is it that he eateth and drinketh with publicans and sinners ?
text2: Kagena de o bi guru agama yamuruo naga , ona magena o Farisika , Una wikelelo womatamiye wooqo de o balastengi itotolomu de o bi nyawa ma dorou ona magena . So Una Awi muri - murika yotemo , " Aistagala ! Qadoohaso Una wooqo de o balastengi itotolomu de o bi nyawa ma dorou ona magena . "

text: When Jesus heard it , he saith unto them , They that are whole have no need of the physician , but they that are sick : I came not to call the righteous , but sinners to repentance .
text2: Una wogiise manga demo - demo magena de Una wosango wotemo , " O nyawa yapoputuru upa he ma dokterka yahino , cawali ka o nyawa yasisiri . Magena imatero maro Ngohi tahino gena , taasowa o nyawa la kanaga itemo manga sininga itotiai , duma ma ngale taaso o nyawa de manga dorouka , la ma ngale manga dorouno gena ona aku imatoba de imatoduba . "

text: And the disciples of John and of the Pharisees used to fast : and they come and say unto him , Why do the disciples of John and of the Pharisees fast , but thy disciples fast not ?
text2: Ma moili yooqowa de youdowa ma orasi , so o Yohanes Wooosi awi nyawa wimomote de o Farisika ma nyawa ona lo yooqowa de youdowa . Mutuwade o nyawa yahino o Yesuska , yosano itemo , " Baba , o Yohanes Wooosi awi nyawa wimomote de o Farisika ma nyawa yooqowa de youdowa , duma qadoohaso to Ngona Ani muri - muri gena ka ioqo de lo iudosi . "

text: And Jesus said unto them , Can the children of the bridechamber fast , while the bridegroom is with them ? as long as they have the bridegroom with them , they cannot fast .
text2: Kagena de o Yesus wosango de wosiade - ade wotemo , " Ma orasi o kawi ma rarame ma rabaka , de wokakawi una magena de o nyawa yakokoro yahino kagena so imatamiye , de imatekedodiao de o nali de o more ma dongirabaka , igogou itiaiwa nakoso ona yooqowa de youdowa .

text: But the days will come , when the bridegroom shall be taken away from them , and then shall they fast in those days .
text2: Duma done ma orasi imasidiado la wokakawi una magena wituda wisisupuka to ona manga sidongirabano . Done ma orasi magena asa ona ioqowa de iudowa . "

text: No man also seweth a piece of new cloth on an old garment : else the new piece that filled it up taketh away from the old , and the rent is made worse .
text2: Qabolo de o Yesus wotemo o ade - ade ngai sinotoli , " O nyawa moi lo pamakewa o baju qamomanalo de asa isitapa de o baro qamomuane . Sababu ma dadapa qamomuane magena isilia sidago o baju qamomanalo magena itola so yaraca foloi ilamo .

text: And no man putteth new wine into old bottles : else the new wine doth burst the bottles , and the wine is spilled , and the bottles will be marred : but new wine must be put into new bottles .
text2: Komagenali o nyawa moi lo asa pamakewa , o anggur qamomuane de yoguse ma ngihi iqoqomaku , upa sidago o anggur qamomuane done asa ma ngihi iqoqoma magena yapolote . Ma dodoguku ma anggur de ma ngihi sinoto lo sona podahewa . So o anggur qamomuane gena bilasu poguse ma ngihi lo qamomuaneku . "

text: And it came to pass , that he went through the corn fields on the sabbath day ; and his disciples began , as they went , to pluck the ears of corn .
text2: O Sabat ma wange moiku o Yesus de Awi muri - muri o ngekoka itagi de yakahino o gandum ma doro moi ma dateno , de Awi muri - muri o gandum ma sopo magena yautu .

text: And the Pharisees said unto him , Behold , why do they on the sabbath day that which is not lawful ?
text2: O Farisika ma nyawa kanaga yakelelo de yodupawa , so itemo o Unaka , " Ce ! Ani muri - muri gena igogou o agama ma bobita yatilakuka , sababu o Sabat ma wange de pomanara gena to ngone nanga boboso . "

text: How he went into the house of God in the days of Abiathar the high priest , and did eat the shewbread , which is not lawful to eat but for the priests , and gave also to them which were with him ?
text2: Kagena de Una wosango wotemo , " He ! Ngini manena ningodu niabacaka duma niawosaka , ma ngale o kia ma Kolano Daud asa waaka qaboloka , o orasi magena o Abyatar wodadi ma Imam Wilalamo . So ma orasi o Daud de awi nyawa imomote manga ino ihiwa so yasapika , o Gikimoi Awi Tahuka una wowosa so o roti o Gikimoika isisusuba gena waoqoka . Ena momongo , idadiwa nako pamote to ngone nanga agama ma bobita , cawali o bi imam aku o roti magena yaoqo . Duma o Daud waoqoka , de to una awi nyawa lo wahike so yaoqoka .

text: And he said unto them , The sabbath was made for man , and not man for the sabbath :
text2: So ma moisi totemo nginika , o Sabat ma wange o Gikimoi wosidadi gena ma metawa ma ngale o nyawa wasangisara , duma ma meta ma ngale o nyawa wariwo .

text: Therefore the Son of man is Lord also of the sabbath .
text2: So igogou Ngohi , o Nyawa ma Duhutu manena , tapareta o Sabat ma wange so magena lo Ai kuasa ma rabaka . "

text: And he entered again into the synagogue ; and there was a man there which had a withered hand .
text2: O Yesus wokahino kali o puji ma tahuno , de kagena o nyawa moi awi gia ma sononga isoneka .

text: And they watched him , whether he would heal him on the sabbath day ; that they might accuse him .
text2: O wange magegena o Sabat ma wange , so kagena de o bi Farisika iwinanano nakoso o Yesus asa o nyawa magena wisiloha , eko hiwa . Manga edekati Una iwitailako de Awi sala yasari la iwikalaki .

text: And he saith unto the man which had the withered hand , Stand forth .
text2: So Una wotemo o nyawa awi gia isosoneka gena , " Nahino kanena manga simaka . " So igogou una magena wahino .

text: And he saith unto them , Is it lawful to do good on the sabbath days , or to do evil ? to save life , or to kill ? But they held their peace .
text2: De o Yesus kagena onaka wosano , " Nakoso o Sabat ma wangeka ngini gena idodooha . To ngini nia agama ma bobita itemo o kia . Aku o loha niaaka , eko o dorou niaaka . O nyawa niasisalamati , eko o nyawa niatooma . " Duma ona magegena imapopongoka .

text: And when he had looked round about on them with anger , being grieved for the hardness of their hearts , he saith unto the man , Stretch forth thine hand . And he stretched it out : and his hand was restored whole as the other .
text2: Ma ngale manga sininga qatogoi gena Una Awi sininga isusa . So kagena de Una womaginano ona de Awi doosaka , de wotemo o nyawa awi gia ma sononga isosoneka gena , " Ani gia natoano . " De una awi gia watoa , de o orasi magena qabolo awi gia gena qalohaka .

text: And the Pharisees went forth , and straightway took counsel with the Herodians against him , how they might destroy him .
text2: Kagena de o bi Farisika o puji ma tahuno isupu de itagi gila - gila , so de o Herodes awi nyawa yamuruo naga de imatekesikagaro de imatekefakati , la ma ngale o Yesus witooma .

text: But Jesus withdrew himself with his disciples to the sea : and a great multitude from Galilee followed him , and from Judaea ,
text2: Komagena qabolo o Yesus de Awi muri - muri o doku magena yodongosa de yakahika o Galilea ma talagaka , duma o nyawa yadala icarawa gena ka ituo - tuo Una wimote - mote . Ona magena o Galilea ma tonano ,

text: And from Jerusalem , and from Idumaea , and from beyond Jordan ; and they about Tyre and Sidon , a great multitude , when they had heard what great things he did , came unto him .
text2: de lo o Yudea ma daerano , de o Yerusalemno , de o Idumea ma tonano , de o Yordan ma Selera ma sonongano , komagena lo o doku Tirus de o doku Sidonno . Sababu yogiise o kia Una waaaka gena ,

text: For he had healed many ; insomuch that they pressed upon him for to touch him , as many as had plagues .
text2: kiaka o nyawa yasisiri yadala wasilohaka . So kagena de Una wasulo Awi muri - murika , la o deru moi wisidailako , sababu o nyawa yadala poli so done wisidehelo . Sababu o nyawa yasisiri yadala so imatekekajai - jai yahika Unaka , la manga ngale hitilahi iwipaqa .

text: And unclean spirits , when they saw him , fell down before him , and cried , saying , Thou art the Son of God .
text2: So ma orasi o nyawa yadadala de manga tokaka wikelelo Una , gila - gila ibukuku de manga suba yatide de imatoore , " We ! Ngona manena o Gikimoi ma Ngopa ! "

text: And he straitly charged them that they should not make him known .
text2: Duma Una wasibobita de wapoma , upa isingangasu Una gena naguuna .

text: And he goeth up into a mountain , and calleth unto him whom he would : and they came unto him .
text2: So komagena idadika , de o Yesus o tala moiye wodola la waaso o bi nyawa nagoona Una Awi sininga yadahe . So kagena de o bi nyawa ona magena yahino Unaka ,

text: And he ordained twelve , that they should be with him , and that he might send them forth to preach ,
text2: de Una asa wahiri manga sidongirabano yamogiowo de sinoto , ma ngale idadi to Una Awi sosulo . De wotemo onaka , " Ngohi ngini tinihiri ma ngale Ngohi todupa nidodiao , la tinisulo ngini nisihabari o habari qaloloha o Gikimoino ,

text: And to have power to heal sicknesses , and to cast out devils :
text2: de lo ngini ningoduka asa o kuasa tinihike la aku o toka niodusu . "

text: And Simon he surnamed Peter ;
text2: So yamogiowo de sinoto to ona manena manga ronga gena : o Simon ( eko wisironga lo o Petrus ) ;

text: And James the son of Zebedee , and John the brother of James ; and he surnamed them Boanerges , which is , The sons of thunder :
text2: o Yakobus de awi nongoru o Yohanes , ena gena o Zebedeus awi ngopa ( eko ona manena wasironga o Boanerges , ma ngale manga demo idala koloko o diwotu ) ;

text: And Andrew , and Philip , and Bartholomew , and Matthew , and Thomas , and James the son of Alphaeus , and Thaddaeus , and Simon the Canaanite ,
text2: o Andreas ; o Filipus ; o Bartolomeus ; o Matius ; o Tomas ; o Yakobus , o Alfeus awi ngopa ; o Tadeus ; o Simon , gena o Zelot ma nyawa ;

text: And Judas Iscariot , which also betrayed him : and they went into an house .
text2: de o Yudas Iskariot , o nyawa una magena o Yesus wisiiija .

text: And the multitude cometh together again , so that they could not so much as eat bread .
text2: Qabolo de o Yesus woliho o tahuka . Duma o nyawa yadadala yahino kali imatolomu , sidago Una de Awi muri - muri ioqo lo idadiwa .

text: And when his friends heard of it , they went out to lay hold on him : for they said , He is beside himself .
text2: Komagena awi gianongoru yogiise de itemo , " Una magena witogosaka bai ! " So ona itagi iwingoso la wisigiliho .

text: And the scribes which came down from Jerusalem said , He hath Beelzebub , and by the prince of the devils casteth he out devils .
text2: O guru agama yamuruo naga yahino o Yerusalemno , de itemo , " Igogou , Una magena o Beelzebul imasiuhoka ! Ka cawali o Iblis magena , o bi toka wakokolano gena , wihike o buturu la ma ngale o toka wodusu . "

text: And he called them unto him , and said unto them in parables , How can Satan cast out Satan ?
text2: So kagena de Una waaso o bi nyawa yadadala magena , la wadedemo o ade - ade ngai muruo naga , la wasango to ona manga demo magena itemo o Iblis wihike o buturu . De o Yesus wotemo , " O Iblis o toka wodusu waakuwa sababu o bolu moi .

text: And if a kingdom be divided against itself , that kingdom cannot stand .
text2: Nakoso o kolano moi de awi doku - doku la ona magena kanaga imakitinga , cawali o putu de o wange imatekekokangamo , de ma ngale ona manga rimoi gena asa ibiau so isisa .

text: And if a house be divided against itself , that house cannot stand .
text2: Komagena lo nakoso o tahu ma raba moi la imakitinga , cawali o wange de o putu imatekekokangamo , de ma ngale ona manga rimoi gena asa ibiau so isisa .

text: And if Satan rise up against himself , and be divided , he cannot stand , but hath an end .
text2: De kanagali nakoso o Iblis ma pareta ma rabaka la imakitinga de imatekekokudoti , o pareta magena bilasu isisa de qalutu .

text: No man can enter into a strong man ' s house , and spoil his goods , except he will first bind the strong man ; and then he will spoil his house .
text2: O Iblis gena aku positero maro wipoputuru moi . De paakuwa o nyawa moi wipoputuru awi tahu ma rabaka powosa de awi arata pakoora , nakoso o tahu ma duhutu magena wipiliku waasi . So bilasu una o tahu ma duhutu wipoputuru magena powipiliku kasi , de asa potagi la awi arata pakoora . Komagena lo Ngohi , nakoso o bi toka todusu gena , ma ngale ngaroko o Iblis wipoputuru , duma Ngohi masirete wisitura qaboloka .

text: Verily I say unto you , All sins shall be forgiven unto the sons of men , and blasphemies wherewith soever they shall blaspheme :
text2: Ngini tinisingangasu igogou , to ngone nanga dorou paaaka qangodu de nanga demo qatotorou nagoonaka bato gena , o Gikimoi aku wonasiapongu .

text: But he that shall blaspheme against the Holy Ghost hath never forgiveness , but is in danger of eternal damnation :
text2: Duma nakoso o demo ma dorou so posiceke o Gurumi Qatetebi , de ngone magegena o apongu he pamake kawa ma bati sidutu ikakali . Potetemo gena paaka o dorou ikokakali . "

text: Because they said , He hath an unclean spirit .
text2: O Yesus wotemo komagena sababu ona magena iwitemo Una o toka wingosaka , de magena imatero de o Gurumi Qatetebi patemo qatorou .

text: There came then his brethren and his mother , and , standing without , sent unto him , calling him .
text2: Magena qabolo de o Yesus ma awa de Awi gianongoru yahino . So yaado o tahu ma dudu kasi , de o nyawa moi iwisulo Una wiaso .

text: And the multitude sat about him , and they said unto him , Behold , thy mother and thy brethren without seek for thee .
text2: O orasi magena o nyawa yadala imatamiye de o Yesus Una ma dongirabaka , so yotemo , " Tabea , Baba , Ani awa de Ani gianongoru ona inisari Ngona , ona kadoke naga ma duduka itamaha bai ! "

text: And he answered them , saying , Who is my mother , or my brethren ?
text2: Kagena de Una wosango , " Nakoso to Ngohi Ai awa de to Ngohi Ai gianongoru , gena komanena . "

text: And he looked round about on them which sat about him , and said , Behold my mother and my brethren !
text2: Qabolo de Una womaginano o nyawa imatatamiye magena de wotemo , " Hika niakelelo ona manena to Ngohi Ai awa de Ai gianongoru .

text: For whosoever shall do the will of God , the same is my brother , and my sister , and mother .
text2: O nyawa nagoona o Gikimoi Awi dupa yamomanara , ona magena to Ngohi Ai gianongoru , de muna magena to Ngohi Ai awabira , de lo muna magena to Ngohi Ai awa . "

text: And he began again to teach by the sea side : and there was gathered unto him a great multitude , so that he entered into a ship , and sat in the sea ; and the whole multitude was by the sea on the land .
text2: O talaga Galilea ma dateka o Yesus o nyawa yadadala wadoto kali . Sababu o nyawa yahino yadala poli de o deru moi kagena o akeka , so Una wopane de womatamiye . De o nyawa yadadala magena imaooko o talaga ma dateka .

text: And he taught them many things by parables , and said unto them in his doctrine ,
text2: Kagena Una wobicara de to Una Awi ade - ade , ma ngale o dodoto idala gena wadoto . So komagena de Una o ade - ade moi wasibicara onaka ,

text: Hearken ; Behold , there went out a sower to sow :
text2: " He ! Ngini ningodu niise ! Kanaga wototoro moi wotagi awi gisisi wosihaja .

text: And it came to pass , as he sowed , some fell by the way side , and the fowls of the air came and devoured it up .
text2: So de una wosihaja gena ma sononga itura o ngekoku , so o namo yahino de yaoqoka .

text: And some fell on stony ground , where it had not much earth ; and immediately it sprang up , because it had no depth of earth :
text2: Ma sonongali itura o tona qatetetoku de ma tona ka ma cunu . So o gisisi magena ma goho isupu qatai , sababu ma tona ilamowa so imasingutu qatai .

text: But when the sun was up , it was scorched ; and because it had no root , it withered away .
text2: Duma ma ngutu ka ma cunu , so de o wange yodisiwa de o goho magena qamalai so isoneka .

text: And some fell among thorns , and the thorns grew up , and choked it , and it yielded no fruit .
text2: De ma sonongali itura o tona qatototopoku . La o gisisi magena ioho imatekekangaho de o totopo so o totopo magena yalalo so isoneka de isopowa .

text: And other fell on good ground , and did yield fruit that sprang up and increased ; and brought forth , some thirty , and some sixty , and some an hundred .
text2: O gisisi ma sonongali asa itura o tona qalolohaku . So ioho ma goho ifero qaloha de ma hutu ilamo so isopo . Ma sopo kanaga qaloha sidago ma dala ma para moruwange , de ma binuka qaloha sidago ma para moributanga , de ma binukali qaloha sidago lo ma para ratu moi . "

text: And he said unto them , He that hath ears to hear , let him hear .
text2: So wajarita qaboloka , de wotemo , " He ! Ngini de nia ngauka tanu niise la nianako . Sidago kanena . "

text: And when he was alone , they that were about him with the twelve asked of him the parable .
text2: Ma dongoho o Yesus wodoto qabolo so ka womatengoka , de Awi muri - muri yamogiowo de sinoto de o nyawa wimomote yamuruo naga imasano Unaka , tanu Awi ade - ade ma ngale gena wasingangasu onaka .

text: And he said unto them , Unto you it is given to know the mystery of the kingdom of God : but unto them that are without , all these things are done in parables :
text2: So Una wotemo onaka , " O kia ngini niananakowa sidago o orasi manena , o Gikimoi winihiri la winihike o ade - ade ma ngale , so qangodu aku nianako ma ngale idodooha Una wokolano de wopareta . Duma nakoso o nyawa Ngohi imomote waasi la tadoto bilasu de Ai ade - ade .

text: That seeing they may see , and not perceive ; and hearing they may hear , and not understand ; lest at any time they should be converted , and their sins should be forgiven them .
text2: La asa idadi maro o kia isilelefo o Gikimoi Awi Jaji ma Buku ma rabaka , ' Ona magena kanaga de manga lakoka , duma o ade - ade ma ngale gena yasahewa , de lo cawali de manga ngauka , duma imasigisewa eko isidodoguwa . Sababu nakoso yanako asa manga dorou yodongosa de imatoba , de o Gikimoi asa wahike o apongu onaka , duma ona asa yanakowa . ' "

text: And he said unto them , Know ye not this parable ? and how then will ye know all parables ?
text2: So qabolo de o Yesus wotemo kali onaka , " We ! Ngini nisidodoguwa o ade - ade magena . Nako komagena , de ngini nisidodoguwa o ade - ade ma somoali . So o ade - ade magena ma ngale komanena :

text: The sower soweth the word .
text2: O nyawa wototoro o gisisi wosihahaja , ena gena o nyawa o Gikimoi Awi demo wosihohabari .

text: And these are they by the way side , where the word is sown ; but when they have heard , Satan cometh immediately , and taketh away the word that was sown in their hearts .
text2: O gisisi ma binuka itutura o ngekoka o namo yaoqo , gena imatero bato o nyawa yoiseka o Gikimoi Awi demo , duma gila - gila o Iblis yahino de wakoora to ona manga sininga ma rabano so isisaka .

text: And these are they likewise which are sown on stony ground ; who , when they have heard the word , immediately receive it with gladness ;
text2: O gisisi ma binuka itutura o tona qatetetoka ioho duma qamalaika , gena imatero bato o nyawa yoise o habari qaloloha de gila - gila yaqehe de manga sininga isosanangi .

text: And have no root in themselves , and so endure but for a time : afterward , when affliction or persecution ariseth for the word ' s sake , immediately they are offended .
text2: Duma koloko ma ngutu iluku kuwa , so ona yopiricaya itekawa . So de o susa yamake de ma ngale o habari qaloloha so yasisangisara , de gila - gila ona o Gikimoi wipalako so imakiliho de ikafirika .

text: And these are they which are sown among thorns ; such as hear the word ,
text2: O gisisi ma binuka itutura o tona qatototopoku so o totopo yalalo so isoneka , gena imatero bato o nyawa o habari qaloloha magena yoiseka .

text: And the cares of this world , and the deceitfulness of riches , and the lusts of other things entering in , choke the word , and it becometh unfruitful .
text2: Duma ona magena isihawateri ma ngale manga oho , de lo yodupa yokaya , de lo o bi moi - moi qangodu yonyafusu . Komagena o Gikimoi Awi demo yosingou kawa , de o manara qaloloha lo yodupa kawa .

text: And these are they which are sown on good ground ; such as hear the word , and receive it , and bring forth fruit , some thirtyfold , some sixty , and some an hundred .
text2: De o gisisi itutura o tona qalolohaku ioho qaloha , gena imatero bato o nyawa o Gikimoi Awi demo magena yoiseka , de imagese de manga sininga ma rabaka imadiahi , so igogou o manara qaloloha yaaka . Kanaga manga manara qaloha sidago ma sopo ma para moruwange , kanaga manga manara qaloloha sidago ma sopo ma para moributanga , de kanaga lo manga manara qaloloha sidago ma sopo ma para ratu moi . Sidago kanena . "

text: And he said unto them , Is a candle brought to be put under a bushel , or under a bed ? and not to be set on a candlestick ?
text2: Kagena de o Yesus woade - ade ma ngale o poci imatero de o Gikimoi Awi habari qaloloha , de wotemo onaka , " Ngini o poci niatupuka de niaaho gena , upa o kula nisitalakeka , eko upa o dangi ma litimika niahado , duma bilasu niahado o poci ma dadamika la ma nita yakelelo .

text: For there is nothing hid , which shall not be manifested ; neither was any thing kept secret , but that it should come abroad .
text2: Sababu igogou o kia naga yaiihu , magena qangodu o nyawa manga simaka done asa ka isikelelo , de lo o kia naga itotalake , magena qangodu done asa ka ipelenga .

text: If any man have ears to hear , let him hear .
text2: O nyawa nagoona de manga ngauka tanu iise la yanako . "

text: And he said unto them , Take heed what ye hear : with what measure ye mete , it shall be measured to you : and unto you that hear shall more be given .
text2: Kagena de una wotemo kali , " Ma ngale o kia ngini niiiseka bilasu ngini nimasitiari . Sababu o duduga kiaka ngini o nyawa niasituga , maro komagena lo asa o Gikimoi winituga nginika de ma boloika .

text: For he that hath , to him shall be given : and he that hath not , from him shall be taken even that which he hath .
text2: Sababu nagoona o Gikimoi Awi demo yoise la imadiahi manga siningaka , done Awi demo magena asa wasidogo manga siningaka la yosihoda itiai . Duma nagoona Awi demo gena yoholu , ngaroko Awi demo kanaga manga siningaka la ka ma cunu , done asa ka waqehe kali . "

text: And he said , So is the kingdom of God , as if a man should cast seed into the ground ;
text2: Kagena de o Yesus Awi bicara wadofa kali , de wotemo , " O Gikimoi wopareta maro o kolano moi gena , posiade - ade imatero maro o nyawa moi o gisisi wosihaja awi doroka .

text: And should sleep , and rise night and day , and the seed should spring and grow up , he knoweth not how .
text2: O puputu womaiduka , so qaginita una womomi . De o orasi magena o gisisi magena ioho so idadi ilamo de ikuruka . Duma una wosidodoguwa idodooha o gisisi magena ioho sidago ilamo .

text: For the earth bringeth forth fruit of herself ; first the blade , then the ear , after that the full corn in the ear .
text2: O tonaka maena ioho masirete so isisupu ma noma - noma ma uma , bolo de ileru , de lo isopo .

text: But when the fruit is brought forth , immediately he putteth in the sickle , because the harvest is come .
text2: So de o tamo magena qaosaka , gila - gila o nyawa una magena wautu sababu o gugutu ma orasi yaadoka . "

text: And he said , Whereunto shall we liken the kingdom of God ? or with what comparison shall we compare it ?
text2: Qabolo de o Yesus wotemo kali , " O Gikimoi wopareta maro o kolano moi gena , posiade - ade

text: It is like a grain of mustard seed , which , when it is sown in the earth , is less than all the seeds that be in the earth :
text2: koloko o sasawi ma sopo ngai moi o tonaku podato . Ngaroko o sasawi ma sopo magena ifoloi qaceke de o sopo ma somoa o dunia manena ma qokuka ,

text: But when it is sown , it groweth up , and becometh greater than all herbs , and shooteth out great branches ; so that the fowls of the air may lodge under the shadow of it .
text2: duma nako o sopo magena posihaja la ioho , ma goho asa ilamo ifoloi de o ngangaru ma somoa , de iuma - uma so kagena ma umaka o bi namo asa yahino imaigu de imataru ma litimika . "

text: And with many such parables spake he the word unto them , as they were able to hear it .
text2: O ade - ade idala ma rabaka maro komanena isingangasu o Gikimoi Awi habari qaloloha o nyawaka , imamote de to ona manga sininga ma buturu la yasahe de yanako .

text: But without a parable spake he not unto them : and when they were alone , he expounded all things to his disciples .
text2: Ka cawali o ade - ade maro komanena o Yesus wadoto o nyawa ona magenaka , duma o ade - ade ma ngale magena to Una Awi muri - murika wasingangasu wasitotiaika .

text: And the same day , when the even was come , he saith unto them , Let us pass over unto the other side .
text2: O ade - ade wosibicara qabolo o deru ma rabaka so imaqa - maqa , de o Yesus wasigaro Awi muri - muri , " Hino la ngone pomasisihito o talaga ma sonongaka . "

text: And when they had sent away the multitude , they took him even as he was in the ship . And there were also with him other little ships .
text2: Kagena de Awi muri - muri lo yopane o deruku . De o nyawa yadadala yadongosaku o talaga ma dateka . De o deru ma somoa lo kagenasi . Duma Una de Awi muri - muri imajoboka .

text: And there arose a great storm of wind , and the waves beat into the ship , so that it was now full .
text2: So asa yahika o talaga ma dongirabaka , de o paro de o rato qasosihilo de o moku - moku imasidiado so manga deruku o ake yobane sidago manga deru he ikiloro .

text: And he was in the hinder part of the ship , asleep on a pillow : and they awake him , and say unto him , Master , carest thou not that we perish ?
text2: Kagena de Awi muri - muri ihawateri , duma Una asa womaidu womagerenaye o deru ma doduuruka so wikioloka . So yotagi iwisimomi de ona imasigaso , " Ya , Baba ! Ya , Guru ! Qadoohaso nomiqohaka . Done ngone inasigiloro ! "

text: And he arose , and rebuked the wind , and said unto the sea , Peace , be still . And the wind ceased , and there was a great calm .
text2: So Una womomi so wotemo o paroka , " Noogo ! " De o moku - mokuka wotemo , " Norihi ! " De gila - gila o paro magena iogoka , de o talaga magena lo irihika .

text: And he said unto them , Why are ye so fearful ? how is it that ye have no faith ?
text2: De wotemo onaka , " Ngini nimodo ilamo ! He ! To ngini nia piricaya ka ma cunu . "

text: And they feared exceedingly , and said one to another , What manner of man is this , that even the wind and the sea obey him ?
text2: Komagena so Awi muri - muri de manga modo ma raba kasi , de ona imatekebicara moi de moika de yotemo , " Wewe ! O nyawa Una manena naguuna , so o bi moi - moi qangodu sidago lo o paro de o moku - moku lo ka wisigise . "

text: And they came over unto the other side of the sea , into the country of the Gadarenes .
text2: O Yesus de Awi muri - muri o Galilea ma talaga ma dongirabaka de yakahisa o talaga ma sonongaka , so imasidiado o Gerasa ma daeraka .

text: And when he was come out of the ship , immediately there met him out of the tombs a man with an unclean spirit ,
text2: Kagena de Una o deruku wouti de imakamake o nyawa wikokitoka moi , wotagi wokahoko o sone ma diaruno wosupu .

text: Because that he had been often bound with fetters and chains , and the chains had been plucked asunder by him , and the fetters broken in pieces : neither could any man tame him .
text2: O wange isigeto - geto de wikokitoka magena awi goge o diaruka . Ma para idala nako o bobiliku de o rate wisipiliku de ka watola . Iwipiliku yaaku kawa de wirateka lo idadiwa . Iwisirihi lo yaakuwa , sababu una foloi wiputuru .

text: And always , night and day , he was in the mountains , and in the tombs , crying , and cutting himself with stones .
text2: O wange eko o putu lo o talaka de o diaruka womatotoore de o teto wacoho de womasisisika la womaqabo .

text: But when he saw Jesus afar off , he ran and worshipped him ,
text2: So o deruku youti waasi , de wikokitoka una wakelelo ona magena so womagogora wahoko o Yesusko , de wosuba wobukuku .

text: For he said unto him , Come out of the man , thou unclean spirit .
text2: Duma o Yesus wosulo wikokitoka una magenaka , de wotemo , " He , toka ! O nyawa una manenano nisupu . " Kagena de o nyawa una magena asa womatoore de wotemo , " Yesus , o Gikimoi Wikukuruye ma Ngopa , noidooha ngohika ! Togolo o Gikimoika nojaji , kodo , upa noisangisara ! "

text: And he asked him , What is thy name ? And he answered , saying , My name is Legion : for we are many .
text2: De wosano , " Ani ronga naguuna . " Wikokitoka una magena wosango , " Ai ronga Dala , sababu ngomi manena o toka midadalaka . "

text: And he besought him much that he would not send them away out of the country .
text2: De awi toka gena igolo o Yesuska , la upa o daera magenenano wasisupu .

text: Now there was there nigh unto the mountains a great herd of swine feeding .
text2: O orasi magena de o titi o cala sinoto o tala ma ngunu magenaka o ino imasari .

text: And all the devils besought him , saying , Send us into the swine , that we may enter into them .
text2: De o toka imagolo Unaka , " Nako qaloha , de o titika nomidusulo la asa o titika miwosa . "

text: And forthwith Jesus gave them leave . And the unclean spirits went out , and entered into the swine : and the herd ran violently down a steep place into the sea , ( they were about two thousand ; ) and were choked in the sea .
text2: Magena de wasimaha so o toka idadala gena isupu o nyawano de widongosaka , de yowosa o titika . O titi ma duduo magena iloqa de kugena o dirasuku itura , so qangodu o talagaku qalutu de isoneka .

text: And they that fed the swine fled , and told it in the city , and in the country . And they went out to see what it was that was done .
text2: Imaaka komagena , de o titi yasosowohi gena yoloqa de itagi o doku de o soaka isihabari . So o nyawa yokokisupu yahino la o kia idadadika gena yatailako .

text: And they come to Jesus , and see him that was possessed with the devil , and had the legion , sitting , and clothed , and in his right mind : and they were afraid .
text2: Kagena de ona yaado o Yesuska , de o nyawa iqomaka wikokitoka una magena witogosa kawa , so womarihi - rihi de womabajuka , de lo awi sininga itiaika . O bi nyawa ona magena iwikelelo de yamodo .

text: And they that saw it told them how it befell to him that was possessed with the devil , and also concerning the swine .
text2: De ona o Yesus Awi manara yakokelelo gena yacarita idodooha so o nyawa wikokitoka magena wisilohaka , de lo ma ngale o bi titi magegena .

text: And they began to pray him to depart out of their coasts .
text2: Komagena so o Yesus iwisimahawa kagena wogogoge so iwisulo Una wosupu manga daerano .

text: And when he was come into the ship , he that had been possessed with the devil prayed him that he might be with him .
text2: Kagena de o Yesus manga deruku wopaneka , de o nyawa wisilolohaka una magena igogou - gogou wogolo o Yesuska , la tanu iwimote .

text: Howbeit Jesus suffered him not , but saith unto him , Go home to thy friends , and tell them how great things the Lord hath done for thee , and hath had compassion on thee .
text2: Duma wisimahawa , so wisulo de wotemo , " Noliho kasi , de nodedemo ani nyawaka o Jou Gikimoi Awi manara ilalamo waaka ngonaka . "

text: And he departed , and began to publish in Decapolis how great things Jesus had done for him : and all men did marvel .
text2: So o nyawa magena womajobo de wotagi o Dekapolis ma daeraka wosihabari ma ngale o Yesus Awi manara qaloloha unaka , de o nyawa yangodu yogogiise gena yohairani icarawa .

text: And when Jesus was passed over again by ship unto the other side , much people gathered unto him : and he was nigh unto the sea .
text2: O Yesus wokahino kali o talaga ma sonongano . Kagena de o nyawa yadadala yahino imatolomu Una o talaga ma dateka wisigiloli .

text: And , behold , there cometh one of the rulers of the synagogue , Jairus by name ; and when he saw him , he fell at his feet ,
text2: De o nyawa moi o puji ma tahu wapopareta o doku magenaka , awi ronga o Yairus , una magena o Yesus wikelelo de wahino Awi simaka , wosuba wobukuku ,

text: And besought him greatly , saying , My little daughter lieth at the point of death : I pray thee , come and lay thy hands on her , that she may be healed ; and she shall live .
text2: de wogolo ifoloi Unaka , " Baba , ai ngopa o ngopeqeka moi tomisiboboso ami siri qatubuso poli . Tanu nahino noimote de hiti nomipaqa , la ami siri qatotubuso magenena itogu la upa mosone . "

text: And Jesus went with him ; and much people followed him , and thronged him .
text2: Magena de o Yesus wotagi o Yairus wimote . De o nyawa yadadala lo imote de o Yesus iwisidehelo .

text: And a certain woman , which had an issue of blood twelve years ,
text2: Kagena manga sidongirabano , o ngopeqeka moi mopanyake o au mosidagi de itekaka , duma itogu waasi ma deka o taungu mogiowo de sinoto qabolo .

text: And had suffered many things of many physicians , and had spent all that she had , and was nothing bettered , but rather grew worse ,
text2: O dokterka gena yadalaka motagi momasou de ami sangisara yodogo , so ka o sou momasibangu sidago lo ami pipi qamata . Duma kodo milohawa , salanta mipanyake gena foloi idogo .

text: For she said , If I may touch but his clothes , I shall be whole .
text2: De o ngopeqeka magena mogiise o Yesus wakahino . De muna ami sininga ma rabaka motemo , " Hitilahi Awi jubaka tomasimaho bato , la ngohi asa isiloha . " So muna o nyawa yadadala manga sidongirabano Una mowidalate de Awi duduno mototuuru de momasimaho Awi juba ma pigika .

text: And straightway the fountain of her blood was dried up ; and she felt in her body that she was healed of that plague .
text2: De o orasi magena qabolo de o au mosidagi kawa . Kagena de muna momamalo ami siri magena qalohaka .

text: And Jesus , immediately knowing in himself that virtue had gone out of him , turned him about in the press , and said , Who touched my clothes ?
text2: Komagena de o orasi magena qabolo Una wamalo Awi buturu isupu to Una Awi roheno . De womakiliho de wasano o nyawa yadadalaka , " Nagoona Ai juba yatigi . "

text: And his disciples said unto him , Thou seest the multitude thronging thee , and sayest thou , Who touched me ?
text2: De Una Awi muri - muri itemo , " We ! Baba , ngona nakelelo masirete . O nyawa ma dala magena imatekesidehelo , de Ngona he nosano nagoona Ani jubaka yatigi . "

text: And he looked round about to see her that had done this thing .
text2: Duma Una womaginano hika de hino wasari nagoona Awi jubaka yatigi .

text: But the woman fearing and trembling , knowing what was done in her , came and fell down before him , and told him all the truth .
text2: Kagena de o ngopeqeka muna magena momanako ami siri magena qalohaka . So mohawateri de mitirine , so Awi simaka mosuba mobukuku , de momasingangasu ma gogou , " Ngohi Ani jubaka tomasimaho de gila - gila ai siri qalohaka . "

text: And he said unto her , Daughter , thy faith hath made thee whole ; go in peace , and be whole of thy plague .
text2: Kagena de Una wotemo o ngopeqeka muna magenaka , " He , Ai ngopa ! Sababu ngona noipiricaya , so ngona nilohaka . Notagi de upa nohawateri , sababu to ngona ani dubuso de ani siri lo ihiwaka . "

text: While he yet spake , there came from the ruler of the synagogue ' s house certain which said , Thy daughter is dead : why troublest thou the Master any further ?
text2: So de Una ka wobobicarasi , de o Yairus awi tahuno o sosulo yamuruo naga yahino . De ona magena wisibubusu o Yairuska , de itemo , " Upa ngona ma Baba Guru nowigolo kali , sababu ani ngopa mosoneka . "

text: As soon as Jesus heard the word that was spoken , he saith unto the ruler of the synagogue , Be not afraid , only believe .
text2: La de o Yesus woise , de ka wotemo o Yairuska , " Upa ani sininga itura , de nopiricaya bato . "

text: And he suffered no man to follow him , save Peter , and James , and John the brother of James .
text2: De o nyawa ma somoa wasimahawa , ka cawali o Petrus , de lo o Yakobus de o Yohanes ona yasinoto ria de nongoru , ona magena wasimaha iwimote o Yairus awi tahuka .

text: And he cometh to the house of the ruler of the synagogue , and seeth the tumult , and them that wept and wailed greatly .
text2: So de ona imasidiado de o Yesus wadaheno , o nyawa yadadala yahika yahino so ikalala de lo yododora manga ili yapoputuruka , sababu mosoneka .

text: And when he was come in , he saith unto them , Why make ye this ado , and weep ? the damsel is not dead , but sleepeth .
text2: Kagena de Una wowosa de wotemo onaka , " O ngopa muna manena mosonewa , duma mikioloka , so upa niari . "

text: And they laughed him to scorn . But when he had put them all out , he taketh the father and the mother of the damsel , and them that were with him , and entereth in where the damsel was lying .
text2: Duma o nyawa yadadala magena iminako o ngopa muna magena mosoneka , so yangodu Una wisiihe . De o nyawa yangodu magena wasulo so isupuka , de Una wangaho o ngopa magena ma awa de ma baba de Awi muri yaruwange , so o ngihi kiaka o ngopa magena ami bake yahado kagena iwosa .

text: And he took the damsel by the hand , and said unto her , Talitha cumi ; which is , being interpreted , Damsel , I say unto thee , arise .
text2: Qabolo de Una wacoho o ngopa magena ami giaka , de wotemo munaka , " Talita kumi ! " O Yahudika manga demo magena ma ngale , " He , Ai ngopa ! Nomomi ! "

text: And straightway the damsel arose , and walked ; for she was of the age of twelve years . And they were astonished with a great astonishment .
text2: O ngopa ami umuru o taungu mogiowo de sinoto magena gila - gila momomi de motagi . Yangodu mikelelo momomi de motagi gena ka yohairani icarawa .

text: And he charged them straitly that no man should know it ; and commanded that something should be given her to eat .
text2: Duma Una wapoma , la ona upa lo isihabari o hali magegena bai nagoonaka bato . De wosulo onaka , la muna o ino imihike la mooqo .

text: And he went out from thence , and came into his own country ; and his disciples follow him .
text2: O Yesus de Awi muri - muri imajobo so itagi to Una Awi soa de Awi dokuka .

text: And when the sabbath day was come , he began to teach in the synagogue : and many hearing him were astonished , saying , From whence hath this man these things ? and what wisdom is this which is given unto him , that even such mighty works are wrought by his hands ?
text2: O Sabat ma wangeka de Una wodoto o puji ma tahuka . Kagena o Nazaret ma nyawa yadala yoise to Una Awi dodoto de ona yohairani so itemo , " Nagoona widoto so to Una Awi pade de Awi cawaro maro komagena . De to Una Awi kuasa kiano wamake so aku waaka o nonako ihahairani .

text: Is not this the carpenter , the son of Mary , the brother of James , and Joses , and of Juda , and Simon ? and are not his sisters here with us ? And they were offended at him .
text2: Igogou ! Una manena cawali o tahu woaaka moi , ma awa gena ongo Maria , de Awi nongoru o Yakobus , o Yoses , o Yudas de o Simon . De Awi bira lo kanena igoge so pomasihie moi . " So ona yodupa kawa yoise maro o kia Una wotetemo gena .

text: But Jesus said unto them , A prophet is not without honour , but in his own country , and among his own kin , and in his own house .
text2: Kagena de Una wotemo onaka , " O nabi moi asa iwisihoromati gena o bi doku de o bi soa ma somoaka , duma ka cawali awi doku de awi soaka de awi gianongoru de awi awabira gena iwipiricayawa . "

text: And he could there do no mighty work , save that he laid his hands upon a few sick folk , and healed them .
text2: Komagena so o riho magenaka o nonako ihahairani idalawa waaka , so ka cawali o nyawa yamuruo naga yasisiri de ka Awi gia wasipaqa de yalohaka .

text: And he marvelled because of their unbelief . And he went round about the villages , teaching .
text2: So Una wohairani qadoohaso ona manga piricaya ihiwa . Magena de o Yesus wotagi o bi doku wakiloli so Una wodoto .

text: And he called unto him the twelve , and began to send them forth by two and two ; and gave them power over unclean spirits ;
text2: Una Awi muri yamogiowo de sinoto waaso imatolomu Unano la o kuasa wahikeka , la aku o toka yodusu de wasulo la itagi yasosinoto .

text: And commanded them that they should take nothing for their journey , save a staff only ; no scrip , no bread , no money in their purse :
text2: Duma Una o siminiko wadedemo kasi , wotemo komanena , " Nia dodagi ma rabaka upa lo o kia naga nimagaho , cawali ka o didiki . Upa o maru nimagaho , o karong , eko lo o pipi .

text: But be shod with sandals ; and not put on two coats .
text2: Nia tarupa nimasitibaku de nia baju gena ka nia roheka .

text: And he said unto them , In what place soever ye enter into an house , there abide till ye depart from that place .
text2: Nakoso o doku moika niwosa de ka o tahu moika nimasidodogu , de upa nimatotuluru ma bati o doku magena niodongosa .

text: And whosoever shall not receive you , nor hear you , when ye depart thence , shake off the dust under your feet for a testimony against them . Verily I say unto you , It shall be more tolerable for Sodom and Gomorrha in the day of judgment , than for that city .
text2: De lo nakoso o riho moika la nitulu , de ona ngini iniholu sidago nia demo o habari qaloloha magena lo yoise iholu , o riho magena niodongosa . Duma nia qohu ma gaapo niapari kasi la imaaka o nonako moi onaka , igogou ona magena de manga fajaka o Gikimoi Awi simaka . "

text: And they went out , and preached that men should repent .
text2: Kagena de ona itagi isihabari , ena gena o nyawa yangodu bilasu itoba de imatoduba to ona manga dorouno .

text: And they cast out many devils , and anointed with oil many that were sick , and healed them .
text2: Igogou , Una Awi muri - muri o toka idala yodusuka , de o nyawa yasisiri manga saheku o gososo isiese so manga siri lo qalohaka .

text: And king Herod heard of him ; ( for his name was spread abroad : ) and he said , That John the Baptist was risen from the dead , and therefore mighty works do shew forth themselves in him .
text2: Ma orasi magena ma Kolano Herodes Antipas woise ma ngale o Yesus de Awi nonako ihahairani , sababu kagena o nyawa yadadala yaaka idadi manga uru ma beto . Sidago yaado o doku de o soaka so o bi nyawa itemo , " O Yesus gena o Yohanes Wooosi de Una asa wooho kali ! Ma sababu magegena Una wamake o buturu la waaka o nonako ihahairani . "

text: Others said , That it is Elias . And others said , That it is a prophet , or as one of the prophets .
