text2: So kagena de o Yesus o ade - ade magena wosijarita qabolo de wasano wotemo , " So o raki ma duhutu una magena asa o kia una waaka . Bilasu una wahino de watooma o bi nyawa imomanara ona magena , de gila - gila o raki magena wosisewa kali o nyawa imomanara ma somoaka .

text: And have ye not read this scripture ; The stone which the builders rejected is become the head of the corner :
text2: Ngini ningodu lo niabaca qabolo de niawosaka o gimina manena o Gikimoi Awi Jaji ma Buku ma rabaka , ' O teto o tukang yahoholu de yapapakewa magena done asa isiaka de idadi o tahu ma sosoqe ma teto ma nonoma .

text: This was the Lord ' s doing , and it is marvellous in our eyes ?
text2: Magena o Jou Gikimoi Awi manara igogou de ka qaloha poli . ' "

text: And they sought to lay hold on him , but feared the people : for they knew that he had spoken the parable against them : and they left him , and went their way .
text2: O Yahudika manga roriri to Una Awi ade - ade gena yoise , de ona yanako Una wasimeta onaka . So kagena de ona imasikadailako la tanu Una iwitago . Duma ma ngale ona yamodo o bi nyawa yadadala , so ona itagi de Una ka wiqohaka .

text: And they send unto him certain of the Pharisees and of the Herodians , to catch him in his words .
text2: Kagena de o Yahudika manga roriri ona magena o Farisika de o Herodes awi nyawa yamuruo naga yasulo itagi la o Yesus iwisabatolo de o sosano moi .

text: And when they were come , they say unto him , Master , we know that thou art true , and carest for no man : for thou regardest not the person of men , but teachest the way of God in truth : Is it lawful to give tribute to Caesar , or not ?
text2: So ona magena yahino de itemo Unaka , " Baba Guru , ngomi mininako Ngona o nyawa nototiai moi , de Ngona namodowa nagoona bato . Ngaroko ona magena o nyawa yalalago , Ngona de Ani sininga igogou nasidoto maro o kia o Gikimoi Awi dupa bilasu paaka . Komagena so hika nomisingangasu , ka qaloha o balastengi pofangu ma Kolano Wilalamo ma Kaisarka , eko upa . Bilasu ngomi mifangu eko upa . "

text: Shall we give , or shall we not give ? But he , knowing their hypocrisy , said unto them , Why tempt ye me ? bring me a penny , that I may see it .
text2: Duma o Yesus wanako to ona manga sihaga so wotemo ona magenaka , " Awadede ! Qadoohaso Ngohi nisabatolo . Hika niaahono o pipi ngai moi la Ngohi tanano . "

text: And they brought it . And he saith unto them , Whose is this image and superscription ? And they said unto him , Caesar ' s .
text2: Kagena de o pipi ngai moi yaaho so yahike Unaka . Bolo , de Una wasano onaka , " Ma dulada de ma lefo to naguuna manena . " De ona yosango itemo , " To ma Kaisar awi dulada de awi lefo . "

text: And Jesus answering said unto them , Render to Caesar the things that are Caesar ' s , and to God the things that are God ' s . And they marvelled at him .
text2: Kagena de Una wotemo , " So o kia naga la igogou to ma Kaisar gena bilasu niahike ma Kaisarka , de o kia naga la igogou to Gikimoi magena bilasu niahike o Gikimoika . " Magena de to Una Awi demo magena yoise qabolo de ona yangodu yohairani .

text: Then come unto him the Sadducees , which say there is no resurrection ; and they asked him , saying ,
text2: So o Sadukika ma nyawa yamuruo naga yahino o Yesuska , ma ngale manga edekati Una wisabatolo . Ona magena yopiricayawa o dodoto maro o nyawa isoneka de asa ioho kali , de manga edekati o dodoto magena isiceke so wisano Unaka , de itemo komanena ,

text: Master , Moses wrote unto us , If a man ' s brother die , and leave his wife behind him , and leave no children , that his brother should take his wife , and raise up seed unto his brother .
text2: " Baba Guru , o bobita o Musa walelefo ma ngale ngone inangoduka , nakoso yanau moi la wosone de o ngopa wamake waasi , bilasu ma nongoruku asa womikawi kali ma ria ma balo muna magena , la o ngopa yamake de o ngopa magena wisikagena imatero de ka ma ria wososone awi buo .

text: Now there were seven brethren : and the first took a wife , and dying left no seed .
text2: Kanaga idadika ona magena o gianongoru yatumudingika . Woriria wokawi qabolo duma awi ngopa ihiwasi de wosoneka .

text: And the second took her , and died , neither left he any seed : and the third likewise .
text2: Bolo , de ma nongoruku womikawi kali ma ria ma balo magena , duma o ngopa yamake waasi , de ma nongoruku magena wosone kali . Komagena idadi de imaaka imakoketero sidago ma nongoru yaruwange ,

text: And the seven had her , and left no seed : last of all the woman died also .
text2: de itagi gila - gila sidago ma bati awi gianongoru yatumudingi ma kawi ma mata - mataka , duma o ngopa yamake waasi . De ma dodoguku o ngopeqeka muna magena lo mosoneka .

text: In the resurrection therefore , when they shall rise , whose wife shall she be of them ? for the seven had her to wife .
text2: So ma orasi imasidiado o nyawa isosone ioho kali , done naguuna womasipeqeka . Ena momongo , yatumudingi magena yangodu makawika . "

text: And Jesus answering said unto them , Do ye not therefore err , because ye know not the scriptures , neither the power of God ?
text2: Kagena de Una wosango wotemo , " Igogou , ngini ka nisosomoa ! Ma sababu gena ngini niasahewa o Gikimoi Awi Jaji ma Buku ma rabaka ma demo de lo niasahewa Awi kuasa .

text: For when they shall rise from the dead , they neither marry , nor are given in marriage ; but are as the angels which are in heaven .
text2: Sababu o nyawa isosoneka la ioho kali , maro o malaikat o soroga ma rabaka gena ikakawiwa , komagena lo ona magena asa ikawi kawa .

text: And as touching the dead , that they rise : have ye not read in the book of Moses , how in the bush God spake unto him , saying , I am the God of Abraham , and the God of Isaac , and the God of Jacob ?
text2: De ma ngale lo igogou o nyawa isosoneka yasioho kali , ce , nagala magena ngini niawosaka o buku ma rabaka o Musa wosilelefoka o kia ngini niabaca de nimadotoka . Ena gena , o jarita ma ngale o ngangaru de o uku ma sora duma o ngangaru magena qaukuwa . Ma orasi magegena o Gikimoi wotemo o Musaka , ' Ngohi manena qabolo o Abraham awi Gikimoi , o Ishak awi Gikimoi , de o Yakub awi Gikimoi . ' So bilasu o demo magena niasahe o Abraham , o Ishak , de lo o Yakub ngaroko iqoqomaka yosoneka , duma ona ka yooho .

text: He is not the God of the dead , but the God of the living : ye therefore do greatly err .
text2: Sababu upa o nyawa isosone la o Gikimoi wisuba , duma o nyawa iooho gena ka wisuba - subasi . So nakoso nitemo o nyawa isosone manga Gikimoi , ngini magena ka nisosomoa bai ! "

text: And one of the scribes came , and having heard them reasoning together , and perceiving that he had answered them well , asked him , Which is the first commandment of all ?
text2: Kagena de o guru agama moi wosigigise o Yesus de o Sadukika ma nyawa imatekebobicara de imatekekokasango . Ma guru agama magena wanano o Sadukika manga bicara qangodu Una gena wasango qaloha icarawa , so una wahino la o Yesus wisano , " O bobita kiaka foloi ilamo de o Gikimoi Awi bobita qangodu manena . "

text: And Jesus answered him , The first of all the commandments is , Hear , O Israel ; The Lord our God is one Lord :
text2: De o Yesus wosango wotemo , " O bobita ma nonomaka , ena gena , ' He , o Israel ma nyawa ! Tanu niise ! O Gikimoi , to ngone nanga Jou , Una magena ka o Gikimoi womatetengoka .

text: And thou shalt love the Lord thy God with all thy heart , and with all thy soul , and with all thy mind , and with all thy strength : this is the first commandment .
text2: Bilasu nowidodara o Gikimoi , to ngona ani Jou , dede ani sininga ma buturu de ani pade ma buturu qangodu nosikomote . '

text: And the second is like , namely this , Thou shalt love thy neighbour as thyself . There is none other commandment greater than these .
text2: De o bobita ma sinotoka gena , ' Bilasu nadodara ani dodiao maro ka to ngona ani rohe masirete . ' O bobita ma somoa asa ihiwa de foloisi ilamo de o bobita ngai sinoto magena . "

text: And the scribe said unto him , Well , Master , thou hast said the truth : for there is one God ; and there is none other but he :
text2: Kagena de ma guru agama magena wotemo o Yesuska , " Igogou de itero , Baba Guru ! Sababu o kia ngona notetemo o Gikimoi Una magena ka womatengo so o giki ma somoa gena ihiwa .

text: And to love him with all the heart , and with all the understanding , and with all the soul , and with all the strength , and to love his neighbour as himself , is more than all whole burnt offerings and sacrifices .
text2: De lo o nyawa bilasu o Gikimoi widodara dede manga sininga ma buturu de manga pade ma buturu qangodu isikomote , de ona lo yadodara manga dodiao maro ka to ona manga rohe masirete . Magena foloi qaloha de o gaso yatutupu eko o bi gaso ma somoa isimeta o Gikimoika . "

text: And when Jesus saw that he answered discreetly , he said unto him , Thou art not far from the kingdom of God . And no man after that durst ask him any question .
text2: O Yesus iwitailako ma guru agama magena awi sango qaloha icarawa , so wotemo unaka , " Ngona manena lo he nadumu o Gikimoi Awi paretaka . " So qabolo de o nyawa moi lo yobarani kawa o kia naga de wisano Unaka .

text: And Jesus answered and said , while he taught in the temple , How say the scribes that Christ is the Son of David ?
text2: Ma orasi o Yesus wodoto o Gikimoi Awi Tahu ma lolohaka , de Una womasano , " Qadoohaso o bi guru agama magena aku itemo o Salamati ma Kolano Una magena Awi sihino o Daud awi ahelino .

text: David therefore himself calleth him Lord ; and whence is he then his son ? And the common people heard him gladly .
text2: Salanta o Daud masirete lo de o Gurumi Qatetebi ma kuasa sidago wiaso Una ma Jou , wotemo komanena , ' O Jou Gikimoi wotemo ai Jouka : Nomatamiye to Ngohi Ai girinaka la Ai horomati namake sidago Ani saturu taaka la yahino inisuba Ngonaka . ' So nakoso igogou o Daud wiaso Una awi Jou , done imaaka idodooha so ona itemo , o Salamati ma Kolano Awi aheli ma sihino o Daudno . " O nyawa yadala kagena de ona magena yodupa yoise o Yesus wodoto .

text: And he said unto them in his doctrine , Beware of the scribes , which love to go in long clothing , and love salutations in the marketplaces ,
text2: So Una wotemo onaka , " Nimasisitiari de o bi guru agama ona magena . Ona yodupa manga juba ikukuruku imasitibaka , de itagi yakahika o pasarka la o nyawa yahoromati .

text: And the chief seats in the synagogues , and the uppermost rooms at feasts :
text2: Ona magena lo yodupa imatami ma simaka o puji ma tahuka de lo o rarame ma rabaka , la ma ngale o nyawa yakelelo bai !

text: Which devour widows ' houses , and for a pretence make long prayers : these shall receive greater damnation .
text2: Ona magena o ngopeqeka ibabalo yasihaga de o damato yasiosi so ma duuru de manga tahu lo yakooraka . Ma ngale manga sala de manga dorou yodidu , so ona isumbayang de ma demo yakuru - kuru la o nyawa yasigiliri . Igogou , done to ona manga manara magena o Gikimoi wafanggali qatubuso icarawa . "

text: And Jesus sat over against the treasury , and beheld how the people cast money into the treasury : and many that were rich cast in much .
text2: Ma orasi magena o Yesus o Gikimoi Awi Tahu ma rabaka womatamiye so o suba ma borua worisimaka , de watailako o bi nyawamoi - nyawamoi manga suba yongado ma boruaku . O nyawa ikakaya yadala manga suba o pipi yongado o boruaku ,

text: And there came a certain poor widow , and she threw in two mites , which make a farthing .
text2: de kagena o ngopeqeka mobabalo moi de mosususa lo mahino . Muna lo ami suba matota , kodo , cawali o pipi o tembaga o sengi sinoto de ma ragani lo ka ma cunu .

text: And he called unto him his disciples , and saith unto them , Verily I say unto you , That this poor widow hath cast more in , than all they which have cast into the treasury :
text2: Kagena de Una Awi muri - muri watolomu de wotemo onaka , " Niakelelo ! Nginika tinisingangasu igogou , mobabalo mosususa magena mongado foloi ilamo , nako positetero de o nyawa yangodu manga suba o boruaku yongangado gena .

text: For all they did cast in of their abundance ; but she of her want did cast in all that she had , even all her living .
text2: Sababu ona magena yahike ma sihino to ona manga arata eko manga pipi yadodiahi ma soohuka . Duma mobabalo muna magena ami arata ihiwa , so cawali kamagena de ma ngale ami oho so magena lo mahikeka . "

text: And as he went out of the temple , one of his disciples saith unto him , Master , see what manner of stones and what buildings are here !
text2: Ma orasi o Yesus o Gikimoi Awi Tahu ilalamo wodongosa , de Awi muri moi manga sidongirabano wotemo , " Baba Guru , hika nanano o bi tahu - tahu manena . De natailako nosidodiahi o bi teto magegena . Pei ! Qaloha icarawa ! "

text: And Jesus answering said unto him , Seest thou these great buildings ? there shall not be left one stone upon another , that shall not be thrown down .
text2: Una wosango wotemo , " Iteroka , ngona nanano gena o tahu magena ilamo de qaloha . Duma done o tahu - tahu magena ma teto o ngai moi lo asa imalapangawa de o teto ma somoa , sababu qangodu magena asa iruba de ituraba . "

text: And as he sat upon the mount of Olives over against the temple , Peter and James and John and Andrew asked him privately ,
text2: Kagena de o Yesus wotagi o Zaitun ma Talaka so ma qokuka wogogeku , de o Gikimoi Awi Tahu magena worisimaka . De Una ka womatengoka , de o Petrus , o Yakobus , o Yohanes de o Andreas yahino ma ngale imasano .

text: Tell us , when shall these things be ? and what shall be the sign when all these things shall be fulfilled ?
text2: Ona wisano Unaka itemo , " Baba , hika nomisingangasu muruoka asa o hali notetemo magena idadi . De lo nomisidumu o nonako o kia nakoso ma orasi imasidiado . "

text: And Jesus answering them began to say , Take heed lest any man deceive you :
text2: Una wasango onaka wotemo , " Nimasitiari qaloha , upa sidago o nyawa inisihaga .

text: For many shall come in my name , saying , I am Christ ; and shall deceive many .
text2: Sababu o nyawa yadadala asa yahino de itemo , ' Ngohi manena qabolo o Salamati ma Kolano , ' so asa o nyawa yadadala yasihaga de yasisa .

text: And when ye shall hear of wars and rumours of wars , be ye not troubled : for such things must needs be ; but the end shall not be yet .
text2: So nakoso niise kadoke o dupuru ma ili de kadoka o kudoti ma habari , upa lo nia rohe qatora . O moi - moi magena bilasu idadi iqoma , duma upa nitemo magena o dunia ma dodogu ma orasi imasidiadoka .

text: For nation shall rise against nation , and kingdom against kingdom : and there shall be earthquakes in divers places , and there shall be famines and troubles : these are the beginnings of sorrows .
text2: O bangsa moi yasaturu o bangsa ma somoa , o kolano moi asa yakudoti o kolano ma somoa . Kiaka o dunia ma qokuka asa idadi kiaka bato o osu de o diwotu , de lo o bare so o ino asa ihiwa . Qangodu magena asa ka o bi sangisara ma nonomaka bato , koloko o ngopeqeka moi mitotilibu de ami siri ma nonomaka so matamaha ma orasi muna he mopuo .

text: But take heed to yourselves : for they shall deliver you up to councils ; and in the synagogues ye shall be beaten : and ye shall be brought before rulers and kings for my sake , for a testimony against them .
text2: Duma ngini bilasu nimasitiari ifoloi , sababu ngini done nitago de ningaho o bi agama ma bobita yacocohoka . De ngini asa ningapo o puji ma bi tahu ma rabaka . De lo ngini asa ningaho o bobaretaka eko o kolanoka ma sababu ngini to Ngohi Ai nyawa nimomote . So magena to ngini nia orasi qaloloha moi la ma ngale Ngohi de o habari qaloloha gena niasingangasu onaka .

text: And the gospel must first be published among all nations .
text2: Duma o dunia ma dodogu yaado waasi , de o habari qaloloha o Gikimoino gena bilasu isihabari kasi sidago o dunia ma pupuku ihaka .

text: But when they shall lead you , and deliver you up , take no thought beforehand what ye shall speak , neither do ye premeditate : but whatsoever shall be given you in that hour , that speak ye : for it is not ye that speak , but the Holy Ghost .
text2: So nakoso ngini nitago la ningaho o bobaretaka , upa lo nimodo ma ngale o kia bilasu ngini nisango . Sababu ma orasi magena de o kia naga itiai la nidedemo gena , o Gikimoi masirete asa winihike .

text: And ye shall be hated of all men for my name ' s sake : but he that shall endure unto the end , the same shall be saved .
text2: Ma orasi asa imasidiado , de ngini manena o nyawa yangodu asa niduhudu sababu ngini Ngohi nimomote . Done asa idadi o bi nyawa manga gianongoru yasidoa o nyawa ma somoaka la yatooma . Komagena idadi de imaaka o baba de o ngopa . De lo o bi ngopa asa yalawangi manga baba de manga awa , so yasidoa o nyawa ma somoaka la yatooma . Duma nagoona manga piricaya Ngohika qaputuru sidago o dunia ma dodogu imasidiado , igogou ona magena done asa manga dorouno isalamati . "

text: But when ye shall see the abomination of desolation , spoken of by Daniel the prophet , standing where it ought not , ( let him that readeth understand , ) then let them that be in Judaea flee to the mountains :
text2: " Ma orasika asa niakelelo o kia naga moi isironga ' O Dorou Ilalamo ' gena isituraba o Gikimoi Awi Tahu . ( Nako niabaca gena bilasu niatailako nisidodiahi o demo manena ma ngale . ) So nakoso niakelelo , de nagoona o Yudea ma daeraka bilasu yoloqa o talaye .

text: And let him that is on the housetop not go down into the house , neither enter therein , to take any thing out of his house :
text2: So nagoona la kanaga manga tahu ma ngihi iqoqokuka lo upa iwosa la manga kia naga moi yaqehe , duma ka youti de yodoloqa .

text: And let him that is in the field not turn back again for to take up his garment .
text2: De nagoona kanaga manga doroka lo upa yoliho la manga baju yaqehe , duma ka yodoloqa .

text: But woe to them that are with child , and to them that give suck in those days !
text2: De yasibodito ilamo o bi ngopeqeka yatotilibuka de o bi awa la manga ngopa ka yasusususi . Kodo ! Isusa ona yoloqa .

text: And pray ye that your flight be not in the winter .
text2: Hika nigolo o Gikimoika , la o moi - moi magena upa idadi o alo ma orasika so isusa ngini niloqa .

text: For in those days shall be affliction , such as was not from the beginning of the creation which God created unto this time , neither shall be .
text2: Sababu igogou ma orasi magena asa idadi de imaaka o sangisara gena pakokelelo waasi , ka ma solano o Gikimoi o dunia wosidadi sidago o orasi manena de lo o orasi ma simaka asa idadi - dadi kawa .

text: And except that the Lord had shortened those days , no flesh should be saved : but for the elect ' s sake , whom he hath chosen , he hath shortened the days .
text2: Duma o Gikimoi ma orasi magena watimisi , sababu nakoso ma orasi watimisiwa , igogou o nyawa moi lo iohowa . So ma ngale o Gikimoi Awi nyawa wahihirika , sidago o sangisara ma orasi magena gena ka watimisi .

text: And then if any man shall say to you , Lo , here is Christ ; or , lo , he is there ; believe him not :
text2: So o orasi magegena nako o bi nyawa itemo nginika , ' Niakelelo , o Salamati ma Kolano kanena naga ! ' de ma somoa itemo , ' Hiwa , kadoke naga ! ' upa lo niapiricaya o nyawa ona magena .

text: For false Christs and false prophets shall rise , and shall shew signs and wonders , to seduce , if it were possible , even the elect .
text2: Sababu o bi Salamati ma Kolano ikokulai de o bi nabi ikokulai asa yahino de yaaka o nonako ihahairani la o nyawa yadala gena yakulai . Nako yaaku , o nyawa la o Gikimoi Awi nyawa wahihiri ona magena lo yakulai .

text: But take ye heed : behold , I have foretold you all things .
text2: So bilasu nimasitiari qaloha ! Sababu o moi - moi qangodu manena Ngohi tinisingangasu iqomaka la ngini nianakoka ngaroko idadi waasi . "

text: But in those days , after that tribulation , the sun shall be darkened , and the moon shall not give her light ,
text2: " La ma orasi o susa de o sangisara magena ipasaka , de o wange de o ngoosa isiwa kawa so qapuputuka .

text: And the stars of heaven shall fall , and the powers that are in heaven shall be shaken .
text2: So o dipa lo ihiti so o moi - moi qangodu o dipaka ma dodagi he yamote kawa , de o bi ngoma lo asa o dipaku itura .

text: And then shall they see the Son of man coming in the clouds with great power and glory .
text2: O orasi magenaka de asa o bi nyawa yangodu ikelelo Ngohi , o Nyawa ma Duhutu , tahino o lobi - lobi ma rabaku touti de to Ngohi Ai mulia ma siwa he tomasisaoka de Ai kuasa ma buturu .

text: And then shall he send his angels , and shall gather together his elect from the four winds , from the uttermost part of the earth to the uttermost part of heaven .
text2: To Ngohi Ai malaikat tasulo la itagi yatolomu to Ngohi Ai nyawa yangodu o Gikimoi wahihirika , o dunia ma pupuku ihaka sidago o dunia de o dipa ma batika . "

text: Now learn a parable of the fig tree ; When her branch is yet tender , and putteth forth leaves , ye know that summer is near :
text2: " Ngini bilasu o simodoto nimagese , ena gena o ara ma hutuka . Nakoso o ara ma hutu ma umaka la niakelelo itoori de lo iboboko , magena inisinonako o ogo ilalamo idumuka .

text: So ye in like manner , when ye shall see these things come to pass , know that it is nigh , even at the doors .
text2: Komagena lo nakoso o susa de o sangisara qangodu Ngohi tododedemoka la idadi gena , nianako Ai hino ma orasi he idumuka .

text: Verily I say unto you , that this generation shall not pass , till all these things be done .
text2: So igogou tinisingangasu nginika , o nyawa yangodu iooho manena isone waasi , de o bi sangisara ma hali moi - moi manena done asa idadi de imaaka .

text: Heaven and earth shall pass away : but my words shall not pass away .
text2: So o dipa de o tona asa isisa de qalutu , duma Ai demo de Ai dodoto asa itagi gila - gila de ma dodogu ihiwa . "

text: But of that day and that hour knoweth no man , no , not the angels which are in heaven , neither the Son , but the Father .
text2: " Ngaroko komagena , o nyawa moi lo asa yanakowa to Ngohi o Nyawa ma Duhutu Ai hino ma orasi eko ma wange . Salanta o malaikat o sorogaka lo yanakowa de Ngohi Awi Ngopa masirete lo tanakowa , ka cawali Ai Baba masirete wanakoka .

text: Take ye heed , watch and pray : for ye know not when the time is .
text2: So ngini bilasu nimajaga de nimasidailakoka , sababu ngini nisidodoguwa muruoka de Ngohi asa tahino .

text: For the Son of man is as a man taking a far journey , who left his house , and gave authority to his servants , and to every man his work , and commanded the porter to watch .
text2: Magena posiade imatero maro o nyawa ma tuangi moi awi tahu wodongosa de wotagi o doku ma soa ikukuruka . Una magena womajobo waasi , de wileleleani wasulo awi tahu yojajaga so moi - moi de to ona manga manara awi tahu ma rabaka . O tahu ma ngora wojajagaka wobeseso wotemo , ' Nojaga nosidodiahi . '

text: Watch ye therefore : for ye know not when the master of the house cometh , at even , or at midnight , or at the cockcrowing , or in the morning :
text2: Komagena so bilasu nimajaga de nia dailakoka , sababu ngini nisidodoguwa muruoka de o tahu ma duhutu magena wakahino kali awi tahuno , so nagala qamaqa - maqa , nagala o putu itongiraba , nagala he qaginita eko nagala o goginitano .

text: Lest coming suddenly he find you sleeping .
text2: La upa sidago Ngohi tahino tinisitodokano de tinisitodadaheno ngini o gogiolo ma rabaka .

text: And what I say unto you I say unto all , Watch .
text2: So o kia bato Ngohi asa tinidodedemo nginika , magena lo todedemo o nyawa yangoduka : La bilasu imajaga imasidodiahi ! "

text: After two days was the feast of the passover , and of unleavened bread : and the chief priests and the scribes sought how they might take him by craft , and put him to death .
text2: Midirika de o Paskah ma Wange ma Rarame imasidiado komagena lo o Roti ma Ragi Ihihiwa ma Rarame gena isitodaaka . O imamka ma bi sahe de o bi guru agama manga edekati ma ngeko gena isipongoka , ma ngale o Yesus witago de witooma .

text: But they said , Not on the feast day , lest there be an uproar of the people .
text2: Duma ona magena itemo , " Upa lo paaka ma orasi o rarame ma rabaka , sababu done o gangamo posigoko . "

text: And being in Bethany in the house of Simon the leper , as he sat at meat , there came a woman having an alabaster box of ointment of spikenard very precious ; and she brake the box , and poured it on his head .
text2: Ma moiku o Yesus wooqo o Betania ma dokuka , kagena o Simon awi tahuka , una magena iqoqoma wipapado . Kagena asa o ngopeqeka moi mahino o Yesusno , de o gososo qabobou de ihahali o rube moi o teto ihahalino maaho , o gososo magena yaaka o bi ngutu qabobouno . Gila - gila o rube ma tolo magena mapolote so o gososo qabobou gena moguse Awi saheku de mowisiqahu .

text: For it might have been sold for more than three hundred pence , and have been given to the poor . And they murmured against her .
text2: Magegena de o nyawa yamuruo naga kagenadahu asa yatoosa so itemo moi de moika , " Ce ! O gososo qabobou magena qapoosa ! " O nyawa ona magena mingamo , " Kiaso nofuma komagena ! " De itemo kali moi de moika , " Ce ! Qadoohaso muna mapoosa . We , ma ngale ka maumo ! Nakoso o gososo qabobou magena posiija , de ma ija pahali - haliku la ma pipi de asa o nyawa isususaka pahike . "

text: And Jesus said , Let her alone ; why trouble ye her ? she hath wrought a good work on me .
text2: Duma Una wotemo , " He ! Nimiqohaka . Muna maakaka o manara qaloloha - loha moi Ngohika . Duma ngini ka nimisisusa . Boloka !

text: For ye have the poor with you always , and whensoever ye will ye may do them good : but me ye have not always .
text2: O bi nyawa isususa , o wange isigeto - geto nako niadupa de ngini aku niariwo isususa ona magena , sababu ona salalu kanaga igoge to ngini nia sidongirabaka . Duma Ngohi de ngini asa pomakangaho iteka kawa .

text: She hath done what she could : she is come aforehand to anoint my body to the burying .
text2: O manara ilalamo moi o ngopeqeka muna magena aku maaka , o gososo qabobou magena mosiqahu Ai saheku , so muna asa Ai rohe mosidailako qabolo ma ngale Ngohi done bilasu tosone de ipoosu .

text: Verily I say unto you , Wheresoever this gospel shall be preached throughout the whole world , this also that she hath done shall be spoken of for a memorial of her .
text2: Ngini tinisingangasu igogou , o ngopeqeka ami manara manena lo done asa ka yapetoka maro o sosininga moi munaka , kekiaka bato o Gikimoi Awi habari qaloloha asa isihabari o dunia manena ma rabaka . "

text: And Judas Iscariot , one of the twelve , went unto the chief priests , to betray him unto them .
text2: La o Yudas Iskariot o muri moi , o Yesus Awi muri yamogiowo de sinoto manga dongirabano , awi edekati qatorou . So wotagi o imam ma bi saheka la wasibicara ma ngale o Yesus iwisiija .

text: And when they heard it , they were glad , and promised to give him money . And he sought how he might conveniently betray him .
text2: So ona magena manga sininga imore de qanali de witolabutu , de wisijaji asa o pipi wihike unaka . So de kagena de una wosolano o ngeko wosisari la o Yesus wisiija .

text: And the first day of unleavened bread , when they killed the passover , his disciples said unto him , Where wilt thou that we go and prepare that thou mayest eat the passover ?
text2: O wange ma nonomaka o Roti ma Ragi Ihihiwa ma Rarameka , orasi magena o Paskah ma duba - duba ma goho yatola . O Yesus Awi muri - muri yosano Unaka , " Baba , kiaka mitagi la ngomi misidailako to ngone nanga Paskah ma ino . "

text: And he sendeth forth two of his disciples , and saith unto them , Go ye into the city , and there shall meet you a man bearing a pitcher of water : follow him .
text2: So Una wosulo o muri yasinotoka , " Nitagi kadoka o dokuka done o nyawa moi niwimake o rube de ma akeka waaho . Una magena niwimote ,

text: And wheresoever he shall go in , say ye to the goodman of the house , The Master saith , Where is the guestchamber , where I shall eat the passover with my disciples ?
text2: o tahu kiaka wowosa de nitemo o tahu ma duhutu magenaka , ' Baba Guru wosano , o ngihi kiaka Una de Awi muri - muri asa ioqo o Paskah ma ino . '

text: And he will shew you a large upper room furnished and prepared : there make ready for us .
text2: So o nyawa una magena asa wasidumu kadaku ma qokuka o ngihi moi ilalamo . Nako ma ngihi magena isidiahi de isidailako qaboloka , ma meja de ma bako lo isifatoka . Kagena o ino nisidailako ma ngale ngone inangodu . "

text: And his disciples went forth , and came into the city , and found as he had said unto them : and they made ready the passover .
text2: Kagena de Awi muri yasinoto yotagi o dokuka , de kadoka ona yamake maro o kia Una wotetemo . So ona asa isidailako o Paskah ma ino magena .

text: And in the evening he cometh with the twelve .
text2: La qaputuku Una de Awi muri yamogiowo de sinoto yahino .

text: And as they sat and did eat , Jesus said , Verily I say unto you , One of you which eateth with me shall betray me .
text2: So kagena ona imatamiye ioqo , de Una wotemo onaka , " Ngini tinisingangasu igogou , o orasi manena o nyawa moi to ngini nia sidongirabano , Ai dateka de wooqo dede Ngohi , done asa Ngohi woisiija . "

text: And they began to be sorrowful , and to say unto him one by one , Is it I ? and another said , Is it I ?
text2: O demo magena yoise , so Awi muri - muri manga sininga isusa so ona moi - moi imasano Unaka , " Baba , ngaroko lo ngohiwa o kia notetemo gena ! "

text: And he answered and said unto them , It is one of the twelve , that dippeth with me in the dish .
text2: So kagena de Una wosango , " Una magenena nimogiowo de sinoto nia sidongirabano , naguuna awi roti o lelengaku asa wotono dede Ngohi , una magenena asa Ngohi woisiija .

text: The Son of man indeed goeth , as it is written of him : but woe to that man by whom the Son of man is betrayed ! good were it for that man if he had never been born .
text2: Igogou , Ngohi o Nyawa ma Duhutu manena asa tosone maro o kia isilelefo o Gikimoi Awi Jaji ma Buku ma rabaka . Duma naguuna woisiiija Ngohi o Nyawa ma Duhutu manena , kodo , o nyawa una magena awi bodito qatubuso ! Lebelaha o nyawa una magena upa lo wisibuo . "

text: And as they did eat , Jesus took bread , and blessed , and brake it , and gave to them , and said , Take , eat : this is my body .
text2: De ma orasi ona imatamiye yooqo , o Yesus o roti waqehe so Awi sukuru watide o Gikimoiye . Qabolo de o roti magena watepi - tepi de to Una Awi gia , de gila - gila Awi muri - murika wasitoku de wotemo , " Niaqehe . Manena to Ngohi Ai rohe . "

text: And he took the cup , and when he had given thanks , he gave it to them : and they all drank of it .
text2: Kagena de Una o anggur ma udo - udo waqehe de Awi sukuru idola o Gikimoiye . De o udo - udo magena wahike Awi muri - murika , de ona magena moi - moi o anggur magena yaudo .

text: And he said unto them , This is my blood of the new testament , which is shed for many .
text2: Yaudo qabolo de Una wotemo , " Manena to Ngohi Ai au , inisinako igogou o Gikimoi Awi jaji la Ai au ikokopola manena ma meta o nyawa yadadalaka ma ngale o dorou ma apongu .

text: Verily I say unto you , I will drink no more of the fruit of the vine , until that day that I drink it new in the kingdom of God .
text2: Duma o orasi manena ngini tinisingangasu igogou , Ngohi done o anggur manena taudo kawa , sidago ma orasi imasidiadoka o Gikimoi wodadi o kolano o dunia qamomuane ma rabaka , de asa Ngohi o anggur qamomuane taudo kali . "

text: And when they had sung an hymn , they went out into the mount of Olives .
text2: Qabolo de ona yangodu yonyanyi wigiliri o Gikimoika . So qabolo de ona isupu de itagi o Zaitun ma Talaka .

text: And Jesus saith unto them , All ye shall be offended because of me this night : for it is written , I will smite the shepherd , and the sheep shall be scattered .
text2: Kagena yahika de o Yesus wotemo Awi muri - murika , " Ngini ningodu manena done niloqa so Ngohi nidongosaka , sababu kanaga o Gikimoi Awi Jaji ma Buku ma rabaka asa isilefoka wotemo , ' Ngohi asa ma sowohi towitooma so ma duba iloqa imakokitingaka . '

text: But after that I am risen , I will go before you into Galilee .
text2: Duma ma orasi Ngohi manena tooho kali isosone manga sidongirabano , de Ngohi asa totagi toqoma o Galilea ma tonaka . "

text: But Peter said unto him , Although all shall be offended , yet will not I .
text2: De o Petrus wotemo , " Hiwa , Baba ! Ngaroko ai dodiao ona Ngona nidoloqaka , duma ma bati tosone ngohi tonidongosawa , Baba . "

text: And Jesus saith unto him , Verily I say unto thee , That this day , even in this night , before the cock crow twice , thou shalt deny me thrice .
text2: So kagena de o Yesus wotemo o Petruska , " Ngona tonisingangasu igogou , o putu manena o toko isore ma sinoto waasi gena , ngona he ma para ma saange nomanosu notemo Ngohi noinakowa . "

text: But he spake the more vehemently , If I should die with thee , I will not deny thee in any wise . Likewise also said they all .
text2: O Petrus wosango de wotemo , " Hiwa , Baba ! Ngaroko ngohi tosone dede Ngona , duma igogou ngohi tomanosuwa . " De Awi muri - muri ma binuka lo manga demo komagena .

text: And they came to a place which was named Gethsemane : and he saith to his disciples , Sit ye here , while I shall pray .
text2: Ona imasidiado o doro moika ma ronga Getsemani , de o Yesus wotemo Awi muri - murika , " Kanena nigogeku la totagi tosumbayang . "

text: And he taketh with him Peter and James and John , and began to be sore amazed , and to be very heavy ;
text2: De Una wasigaro ona yaruwange o Petrus , o Yakobus , de o Yohanes so ona itagi dede Una . O orasi magena de wamalo Awi raba itonga .

text: And saith unto them , My soul is exceeding sorrowful unto death : tarry ye here , and watch .
text2: Kagena de Una wotemo onaka , " Ai sininga ma sangisara qatubuso , tamalo gena maro he tosone . Ngini kanena nigogoge la nimajaga . "

text: And he went forward a little , and fell on the ground , and prayed that , if it were possible , the hour might pass from him .
text2: La Una womatinga sutu ikuruka , de o tonaku wobukuku de wosumbayang . Awi gogolo ma rabaka tanu witide la iwisitilaku o sone ma ngeko manena .

text: And he said , Abba , Father , all things are possible unto thee ; take away this cup from me : nevertheless not what I will , but what thou wilt .
text2: De wotemo , " Ya Baba , qangodu aku naaka de idadi , so tanu natide la noisitilaku o sangisara ma ngeko manena . Duma upa namote to Ngohi Ai sininga ma dupa manena , la tanu idadi de imaaka ka to Ngona Ani sininga ma dupa . "

text: And he cometh , and findeth them sleeping , and saith unto Peter , Simon , sleepest thou ? couldest not thou watch one hour ?
text2: Qabolo de Una wokahino de wamake ona yaruwange yakioloka . De Una wotemo , " Petrus , o kiaso nikioloka , orasi moi bato de nomajaga naakuwa . "

text: Watch ye and pray , lest ye enter into temptation . The spirit truly is ready , but the flesh is weak .
text2: De Una wotemo onaka , " Nimajaga de nisumbayang la upa o babajaku nitura . Ngaroko nia siningaka igogou imode , duma nia rohe qamomoqoka . "

text: And again he went away , and prayed , and spake the same words .
text2: Ma moili Una wotagi wosumbayang de Awi demo ka imatero de ma nonoma .

text: And when he returned , he found them asleep again , ( for their eyes were heavy , ) neither wist they what to answer him .
text2: Qabolo de Una wokahino Awi muri - murino , de wamake ona yakiolo kali , sababu ona ikakadu poli . So ona isimakewa itemo o kia Unaka .

text: And he cometh the third time , and saith unto them , Sleep on now , and take your rest : it is enough , the hour is come ; behold , the Son of man is betrayed into the hands of sinners .
text2: So kagena de Una wakahino kali ma para ma saangeka , de wotemo onaka , " He ! So ngini nimasiwomasi de nikiolosi ? Boloka ! Ma orasi imasidiadoka , Ngohi o Nyawa ma Duhutu manena isidoa o nyawa ma dorou manga gia ma sohaka .

text: Rise up , let us go ; lo , he that betrayeth me is at hand .
text2: Nimomi ! Niakelelo , o nyawa Ngohi woisiiija una womasidiadoka . Hino la potagi pomakamake ! "

text: And immediately , while he yet spake , cometh Judas , one of the twelve , and with him a great multitude with swords and staves , from the chief priests and the scribes and the elders .
text2: Ma orasi o Yesus wobobicarasi , de o Yudas , o Yesus Awi muri moi yamogiowo de sinoto manga dongirabano , womasidiado . Una magena wahino de o nyawa yadadala manga giaka o sumarangi de o gogipongo ilalamo . Ona magena o imamka ma bi sahe , de o bi guru agama , de lo o Yahudika ma roriri gena to ona manga nyawa yasusulo .

text: And he that betrayed him had given them a token , saying , Whomsoever I shall kiss , that same is he ; take him , and lead him away safely .
text2: Ma nonomasi una gena o nonako moi wahikeka , wotemo komanena , " O nyawa naguuna ngohi towihahame gena , Una magena qabolo . Una niwitago de niwingaho , de lo niwijaga nisidodiahi . "

text: And as soon as he was come , he goeth straightway to him , and saith , Master , master ; and kissed him .
text2: Ma orasi o Yudas womasidiado , gila - gila o Yesuska wotagi de wotemo , " Baba Guru ! " De gila - gila wikololo de wihame .

text: And they laid their hands on him , and took him .
text2: So kagena de o nyawa yadadala , de o Yudas imakokangaho magena , o Yesus iwitago de wipiliku .

text: And one of them that stood by drew a sword , and smote a servant of the high priest , and cut off his ear .
text2: Duma o nyawa moi kagena manga sidongirabano awi sumarangi walia de wisioto ma Imam Wilalamo awi gilalo moika , so awi ngau lo waturaka .

text: And Jesus answered and said unto them , Are ye come out , as against a thief , with swords and with staves to take me ?
text2: De o Yesus wotemo onaka , " Qadoohaso ngini niaka maro Ngohi o nyawa ma dorou , sidago niahino o gogipongo de o sumarangi nigaho la Ngohi nitago .

text: I was daily with you in the temple teaching , and ye took me not : but the scriptures must be fulfilled .
text2: O wange isigeto - geto Ngohi todoto o Gikimoi Awi Tahuka de to ngini nia simaka , de qadoohaso Ngohi nitagowa . Duma igogou bilasu komagena , sidago idadi de imaaka maro o kia isilelefo o Gikimoi Awi Jaji ma Buku ma rabaka . "

text: And they all forsook him , and fled .
text2: Kagena de Awi muri - muri yamodo so yoloqa de Una widongosaka .

text: And there followed him a certain young man , having a linen cloth cast about his naked body ; and the young men laid hold on him :
text2: Cawali kanaga o gohiduuru moi o Yesus wimomote de o baro womasikolorono . So una lo o nyawa yadadala yodupa witago ,

text: And he left the linen cloth , and fled from them naked .
text2: duma to una awi baro waumo de woloqa awi rohe ka imawatoka .

text: And they led Jesus away to the high priest : and with him were assembled all the chief priests and the elders and the scribes .
text2: O Yesus iwingaho ma Imam Wilalamo awi tahuka . Kagena de o imamka ma bi sahe , de o Yahudika manga roriri , de lo o bi guru agama yangodu imatolomu .

text: And Peter followed him afar off , even into the palace of the high priest : and he sat with the servants , and warmed himself at the fire .
text2: O Petrus manga duduno wototuuru o Yesus iwimote sidago wowosa ma Imam Wilalamo awi tahu ma lolohaka . Kadoke una wogogeku , de wialo so womarahu womasicapuka de o bi jojaga .

text: And the chief priests and all the council sought for witness against Jesus to put him to death ; and found none .
text2: Kagena ma Imam Wilalamo awi tahuka , o imamka ma bi sahe de o Mahkamah Agama yangodu o Yesus iwitailako de isisari ma ngeko la wisisala , sidago Una bilasu wisosone . Duma o sala moi lo yamakewa .

text: For many bare false witness against him , but their witness agreed not together .
text2: O saksi yadala yahino yodedemo to ona manga gulai de manga damato , so moi - moi manga bicara imaketerowa .

text: And there arose certain , and bare false witness against him , saying ,
text2: De o saksi yamuruo naga imaoko de isibicara to ona manga damato ma ngale Unaka ,

text: We heard him say , I will destroy this temple that is made with hands , and within three days I will build another made without hands .
text2: komanena yotemo , " Ngomi miiseka o nyawa Una magena wotemo , ' Ngohi done o Gikimoi Awi Tahu manena de o nyawa manga gia isiaaka asa taruba de tabiau , de o wange saangeka Ngohi asa tosigoko kali qamomuane , duma o nyawa manga gia isiaakawa . ' "

text: But neither so did their witness agree together .
text2: Duma o nyawa isasaksi magena manga demo moi - moi imaketerowa .

text: And the high priest stood up in the midst , and asked Jesus , saying , Answerest thou nothing ? what is it which these witness against thee ?
text2: So ma Imam Wilalamo manga simaka womaokoye de Unaka wisano , " To ona manga demo de manga sosano ma dala komagena Ngonaka , qadoohaso nasangowa . "

text: But he held his peace , and answered nothing . Again the high priest asked him , and said unto him , Art thou the Christ , the Son of the Blessed ?
text2: Duma Una womarihika bato , qangodu wabisangowa . La ma Imam Wilalamo wisano kali Unaka , " Igogou , Ngona o Salamati ma Kolano de o Gikimoi Wilalamo ma Ngopa ? "

text: And Jesus said , I am : and ye shall see the Son of man sitting on the right hand of power , and coming in the clouds of heaven .
text2: Kagena de Una wosango wotemo , " Igogou , Ngohi manena Una . De ngini asa nikelelo Ngohi o Nyawa ma Duhutu tomatamiye o Gikimoi Wokokuasa Awi girinaka , de lo asa nikelelo o sorogaka de tokahino touti o lobi - lobi ma rabaku . "

text: Ye have heard the blasphemy : what think ye ? And they all condemned him to be guilty of death .
text2: So magena yoise , de ma Imam Wilalamo awi juba waraca de wotemo , " Ce ! Ngini ningodu niise masirete , Awi demo - demo qangodu o Gikimoi wisikudahu ! Upa he o saksi posari kali . Orasi manena o kia niodupa la ngone paaka Unaka . " De yangodu itemo , " O Yesus de wisala ! " De imatoore , " Bilasu Una wisosone ! "

text: And some began to spit on him , and to cover his face , and to buffet him , and to say unto him , Prophesy : and the servants did strike him with the palms of their hands .
text2: Gila - gila ona yamuruo naga Una wihobi , de Awi lako yapoku de wingapo , de yotemo , " Hika nomisingangasu naguuna woningapo ! " De o bi jojaga imasimote Una wipopoka .

text: And as Peter was beneath in the palace , there cometh one of the maids of the high priest :
text2: Ma orasi magena de o Petrus ka o loloha kasi , de o ngopeqeka moi moleleleani ma Imam Wilalamoka mahino kagena .

text: And when she saw Peter warming himself , she looked upon him , and said , And thou also wast with Jesus of Nazareth .
text2: De mowikelelo o Petrus o uku ma dateka womarahu . Muna mowikelelo de mowisibilatu awi jamani , de motemo , " He ! Ngona manena lo igogou o Yesus , o Nazaret ma nyawa gena , nowimomote . "

text: But he denied , saying , I know not , neither understand I what thou sayest . And he went out into the porch ; and the cock crew .
text2: Duma una womanosu de wotemo moleleleanika , " Ngohi tanakowa de tasahewa o kia ngona notetemo gena ! " Gila - gila una wotagi o loloha ma ngora ma dateka .

text: And a maid saw him again , and began to say to them that stood by , This is one of them .
text2: Kagena de muna una mowikelelo de mosingangasu o bi nyawa kagenadahu motemoli , " Cedeke ! O nyawa una magena lo to ona manga sidongirabano . "

text: And he denied it again . And a little after , they that stood by said again to Peter , Surely thou art one of them : for thou art a Galilaean , and thy speech agreeth thereto .
text2: Duma una womanosu kali . Itekawa , de o orasi magena o bi nyawa kagena itemo o unaka , " We ! Ngona upa nomanosu ! Igogou , ngona manena to ona manga dodiao moi , sababu ngona o Galilea ma nyawa . "

text: But he began to curse and to swear , saying , I know not this man of whom ye speak .
text2: Kagena de una gila - gila wosasi wotemo , " Ngaroko tosone , duma igogou ngohi towinakowa o nyawa Una magena maro o kia ngini nitetemo gena ! "

text: And the second time the cock crew . And Peter called to mind the word that Jesus said unto him , Before the cock crow twice , thou shalt deny me thrice . And when he thought thereon , he wept .
text2: O orasi magena qabolo o toko isore kali ma para ma sinotoka . De o Petrus gena womasininga igogou ma nonomasi o Yesus asa wisitemo unaka , " O toko isore ma sinoto waasi , de ngona he nomanosu nosipara ma saange . " La una woari wosodu - sodu .

text: And straightway in the morning the chief priests held a consultation with the elders and scribes and the whole council , and bound Jesus , and carried him away , and delivered him to Pilate .
text2: Ma orasi o goginita nosi , ona o Mahkamah Agama yangodu de o imamka ma bi sahe , de o Yahudika manga roriri , de lo o bi guru agama imatolomu de jai - jai imatekefakati . So o Yesus wipipilikuka , de gila - gila wingaho de witota ma Gubernur Pilatuska .

text: And Pilate asked him , Art thou the King of the Jews ? And he answering said unto him , Thou sayest it .
text2: So kagena de o Pilatus wisano Unaka , " So igogou Ngona manena o Yahudika manga kolano ? " De Una wotemo , " Iteroka , maro o kia ngona notetemoka . "

text: And the chief priests accused him of many things : but he answered nothing .
text2: O imamka ma bi sahe manga galaki idala ma ngale Una .

text: And Pilate asked him again , saying , Answerest thou nothing ? behold how many things they witness against thee .
text2: So o Pilatus wisano kali Unaka , " Qadoohaso nosango noholu . Hika nakelelo o galaki ma dala magena inisitemo Ngonaka . "

text: But Jesus yet answered nothing ; so that Pilate marvelled .
text2: Duma Una ka o demo moi lo wosangowa , sidago o Pilatus ka wohairani .

text: Now at that feast he released unto them one prisoner , whomsoever they desired .
text2: O Paskah ma Rarame isigeto - geto ma biasa o Pilatus o nyawa moi o bui ma rabano wisisupu de wipalako , yamote yadadala to ona manga ngongiri .

text: And there was one named Barabbas , which lay bound with them that had made insurrection with him , who had committed murder in the insurrection .
text2: Kagena o bui ma rabaka yasingosaka , ma orasi ona icanga qabolo o Roma ma bobaretaka , ena gena o nyawa itotooma yamuruo naga kanaga manga sidongirabano wimoi awi ronga o Barabas .

text: And the multitude crying aloud began to desire him to do as he had ever done unto them .
text2: O nyawa yadadala imatolomuno de imagolo o Pilatuska , wamote awi biasa ma ngale o nyawa moi wipalako o bui ma tahuno .

text: But Pilate answered them , saying , Will ye that I release unto you the King of the Jews ?
text2: Kagena de o Pilatus wasisano onaka , " Niodupa la ngohi towipalako Una niwisiaaso ' O Yahudika manga Kolano ' la ma ngale tinihike nginika ? "

text: For he knew that the chief priests had delivered him for envy .
text2: O Pilatus wotemo komagena , sababu wosihoda o Yesus Awi sala ihiwa , ena momongo ma ngale manga sininga ma siri Unaka , so o imamka ma bi sahe Una iwitota .

text: But the chief priests moved the people , that he should rather release Barabbas unto them .
text2: Duma o imamka ma bi sahe ona magena o nyawa yadadala yasigaro la igolo o Pilatuska , ma ngale o Barabas wipalako de wahike onaka .

text: And Pilate answered and said again unto them , What will ye then that I shall do unto him whom ye call the King of the Jews ?
text2: De o Pilatus wotemo o nyawa yadadalaka magena , " Nako komagena , de ngini niodupa ngohi o kia taaka kiaka ngini niwiaaso Una manena o Yahudika manga kolano . "

text: And they cried out again , Crucify him .
text2: De ona yangodu imatoore itemo , " Una bilasu iwisidasangahadi ! "

text: Then Pilate said unto them , Why , what evil hath he done ? And they cried out the more exceedingly , Crucify him .
text2: Duma o Pilatus wotemo onaka , " Asitagala ! Awi dorou o kia . " Duma ona ifoloi imatotoore , " Bilasu iwisidasangahadi ! "

text: And so Pilate , willing to content the people , released Barabbas unto them , and delivered Jesus , when he had scourged him , to be crucified .
text2: So kagena de una o nyawa yadadala manga sininga wosimote so o Barabas wisisupu de wihike onaka . De una wasulo awi prajurit - prajuritka ma ngale o Yesus wingangapo , qabolo de gila - gila Una wisidoa onaka la iwisidasangahadi .

text: And the soldiers led him away into the hall , called Praetorium ; and they call together the whole band .
text2: So o bi prajurit o Yesus wingaho ma gubernur awi mahkamah ma riho o kadato ma rabaka , de awi baru - baru qangodu imatolomu o Yesus iwisigilolino .

text: And they clothed him with purple , and platted a crown of thorns , and put it about his head ,
text2: Kagena de ona o juba qauungu maro o bi kolano manga juba wisitibaku , de ona lo o bi gota ma daara qatototopo yaaka koloko to Una Awi mahkota moi so Awi saheku isitalake .

text: And began to salute him , Hail , King of the Jews !
text2: Qabolo de ona itemo Unaka , " Suba , Jou ! O Yahudika manga kolano ! "

text: And they smote him on the head with a reed , and did spit upon him , and bowing their knees worshipped him .
text2: De gila - gila Una Awi saheko o didiki isingangapo , de lo Awi bioko yahohobi de yobukuku isuba Unaka .

text: And when they had mocked him , they took off the purple from him , and put his own clothes on him , and led him out to crucify him .
text2: So wisimamaqe qabolo , de Awi juba qauungu yahoi de wisitiba kali to Una Awi juba masirete . De asa wituda wisisupu so itagi la iwisidasangahadi .

text: And they compel one Simon a Cyrenian , who passed by , coming out of the country , the father of Alexander and Rufus , to bear his cross .
text2: Kagena de ona itagi so yahika o ngeko ma soaka , de o Kirene ma nyawa moi , o Aleksander de o Rufus manga baba , awi ronga o Simon wimake . O nyawa una magena asa o soano wokahino de wokahika o kotaka , de wigegego o Yesus Awi sangahadi wamoku .

text: And they bring him unto the place Golgotha , which is , being interpreted , The place of a skull .
text2: Itekawa , de o Yesus wingaho o riho moi ma ronga o Golgota , ma ngale " O Sahe ma Papala ma Riho " .

text: And they gave him to drink wine mingled with myrrh : but he received it not .
text2: So kagena yahika , de ona wihike Unaka o anggur de o sou o gososo qabobou isicapuka la Awi siri isikurangi , duma Una woholu waudo .

text: And when they had crucified him , they parted his garments , casting lots upon them , what every man should take .
text2: So kagena de gila - gila ona wisidasangahadi de Awi baju imatekesikotoku yaaka moi - moi de manga gimina yamote o undi ma rabaka .

text: And it was the third hour , and they crucified him .
text2: Ma orasi wisidasangahadi gena o goginitano o cako siwo .

text: And the superscription of his accusation was written over , THE KING OF THE JEWS .
text2: Awi sangahadi ma qokuka yalefo o galaki ma demo itemo : UNA MANENA O YAHUDIKA MANGA KOLANO .

text: And with him they crucify two thieves ; the one on his right hand , and the other on his left .
text2: O orasi magena Una de ikokoora yasinoto yasidasangahadi ka o wange moi , so moi Una Awi girinaka de moili Awi gubalika .

text: And the scripture was fulfilled , which saith , And he was numbered with the transgressors .
text2: [ La komagena imaaka so itero de itiaika maro o kia isilelefo o Gikimoi Awi Jaji ma Buku ma rabaka , ena gena , " Una wisitero koloko o bi nyawa ma dorou . " ]

text: And they that passed by railed on him , wagging their heads , and saying , Ah , thou that destroyest the temple , and buildest it in three days ,
text2: O bi nyawa nogena yakokahino la wikelelo de ona manga sahe yagiwi de wisimaqe itemo , " Cedekele ! Temo Ngona gena o Gikimoi Awi Tahu aku naruba de nabiau , duma o wange saangeka de naoko kali .

text: Save thyself , and come down from the cross .
text2: Nako igogou , de hika o sangahadiku nouti la Ani rohe nasisalamati . "

text: Likewise also the chief priests mocking said among themselves with the scribes , He saved others ; himself he cannot save .
text2: Komagena lo o imamka ma bi sahe de o bi guru agama Una wisimaqe de itemo moi de moika , " Cedeke ! O nyawa ma somoa wasisalamati , de Una Awi rohe masirete duma wosisalamati waakuwa .

text: Let Christ the King of Israel descend now from the cross , that we may see and believe . And they that were crucified with him reviled him .
text2: Nakoso igogou Una o Israel ma Kolano de lo o Salamati ma Kolano , qaloha ilaku de o orasi manena Una o sangahadiku wouti la ngomi miwingaku de miwipiricaya ka cawali Una ! " De o nyawa yasinoto yasisasangahadi ona lo imasimote Una wisimaqe .

text: And when the sixth hour was come , there was darkness over the whole land until the ninth hour .
text2: La o wange itotiai , de o doku ma sigilolino magegena qapuputuku ma deka o orasi saange .

text: And at the ninth hour Jesus cried with a loud voice , saying , Eloi , Eloi , lama sabachthani ? which is , being interpreted , My God , my God , why hast thou forsaken me ?
text2: Sidago o cako saangeka de o Yesus womatoore , Awi ili wapoputuru , " Eli , Eli , lama sabakhtani ! " Gena o Yahudika manga demo ma ngale gena , " Ai Gikimoi , Ai Gikimoi , qadoohaso Ngona noidongosa Ngohi ! "

text: And some of them that stood by , when they heard it , said , Behold , he calleth Elias .
text2: O bi nyawa ngo kagena yogiise o gore magena , de itemo , " Niisesi ! Una ma nabi Elia wiaso . "

text: And one ran and filled a spunge full of vinegar , and put it on a reed , and gave him to drink , saying , Let alone ; let us see whether Elias will come to take him down .
text2: O nyawa moi to ona manga sidongirabano womatai - tai so o bunga moi koloko o kaka waqehe , so o anggur qakokiopiku watonoka , de o gota ma ideka wosisuruka , de watubo la ma ngale o Yesus wapipi , de wotemo , " Mahasi ! La hika ngone pakelelo nakoso o Elia igogou wahino de wisiguti o sangahadiku . "

text: And Jesus cried with a loud voice , and gave up the ghost .
text2: Ma dodoguka , o Yesus womatoore de wosoneka .

text: And the veil of the temple was rent in twain from the top to the bottom .
text2: Ato imatodoka o baro isifafati o Gikimoi Awi Tahu ma rabaka iraca de ileta sinotoka kadaku ma bati kudahu .

text: And when the centurion , which stood over against him , saw that he so cried out , and gave up the ghost , he said , Truly this man was the Son of God .
text2: Ma kapita moi , womaokoye o sangahadi woririsima gena , wakelelo idodooha o Yesus Awi sone ma ngeko de ma kapita magena wotemo , " We ! O nyawa Una manena igogou o Gikimoi ma Ngopa ! "

text: There were also women looking on afar off : among whom was Mary Magdalene , and Mary the mother of James the less and of Joses , and Salome ;
text2: Kagenadahu lo o bi ngopeqeka yamuruo naga yakelelo ma soa sutu ikuruka . Manga sidongirabaka kanaga ongo Salome , ongo Maria Magdalena , de lo ongo Maria , o Yakobus o gohiduuru magena de lo o Yoses to ona manga awa .

text: ( Who also , when he was in Galilee , followed him , and ministered unto him ; ) and many other women which came up with him unto Jerusalem .
text2: Ma orasi iqomaka o Yesus o Galilea ma bi dokuka de o bi ngopeqeka ona manena Una wimomote de wiriwoka . De kanagasi o ngopeqeka ma somoa o Yerusalemno yahihino imakangaho de o Yesus .

text: Joseph of Arimathaea , and honourable counseller , which also waited for the kingdom of God , came , and went in boldly unto Pilate , and craved the body of Jesus .
text2: Orasi magena he qamaqa - maqa , so ilangi o Sabat ma wange , o nyawa moi awi ronga o Yusuf o Arimateama ma dokuno wahino . Una magena o Mahkamah Agama moi wihohoromati , una lo wododamaha o Gikimoi Awi orasi wopareta maro o kolano moi . O Sabat ma wange idumuka , so ma ngale magegena o Yusuf womabarani wahika o Pilatuska , de wagolo o Yesus Awi sone ma bake .

text: And Pilate marvelled if he were already dead : and calling unto him the centurion , he asked him whether he had been any while dead .
text2: O Pilatus wogiise o Yesus wosoneka , de una wohairani so una o nyawa wasulo itagi ma kapita wiaso la wisano , " Igogou , o Yesus Awi woma itola itekaka ? "

text: And when he knew it of the centurion , he gave the body to Joseph .
text2: La ma kapita wodedemo o Pilatuska , " Igogou , " de o Pilatus o Yusuf wisimaha o Yesus Awi sone ma bake magena waaho .

text: And he bought fine linen , and took him down , and wrapped him in the linen , and laid him in a sepulchre which was hewn out of a rock , and rolled a stone unto the door of the sepulchre .
text2: So kagena de o Yusuf o baro qaaare woija so o Yesus Awi sone ma bake magena wosiguti o sangahadiku , la wosisangi de o baro qaaare magena . Qabolo de o sone ma bake magena wapoosu , kiaka o boosu magena yaaaka o teto ma rabaka . Qabolo de una o teto ilalamo moi walolo o boosu ma ngora magena wosiperesu .

text: And Mary Magdalene and Mary the mother of Joses beheld where he was laid .
text2: Orasi magena lo ongo Maria Magdalena de ongo Maria o Yoses ma awa ona lo yananano o riho kiaka o Yesus wipoosu .

text: And when the sabbath was past , Mary Magdalene , and Mary the mother of James , and Salome , had bought sweet spices , that they might come and anoint him .
text2: Ma orasi o Sabat ma wange ipasaka , de ongo Maria Magdalena , ongo Maria o Yakobus ma awa , de lo ongo Salome itagi o bi rapa iija ma ngale o Yesus Awi sone ma bake isimuja .

text: And very early in the morning the first day of the week , they came unto the sepulchre at the rising of the sun .
text2: O Nahadi ma wangeka o goginita nosi o wange asa ibao , de ona itagi o boosuka .

text: And they said among themselves , Who shall roll us away the stone from the door of the sepulchre ?
text2: Yahika o ngeko ma soaka , de itemo moi de moika , " O boosu ma boberesu o teto magena nagoona asa inariwo yatinga . "

text: And when they looked , they saw that the stone was rolled away : for it was very great .
text2: Duma ma orasi kagena imasidiado o teto ilalamo magena ona yakelelo iloloka .

text: And entering into the sepulchre , they saw a young man sitting on the right side , clothed in a long white garment ; and they were affrighted .
text2: So kagena de ona gila - gila iwosa o boosu ma aru ma rabaka , de ona imaginano o girinaka , de yakelelo o gohiduuru moi awi juba qaaare womatamiye , so ona isawangi de yamodo .

text: And he saith unto them , Be not affrighted : Ye seek Jesus of Nazareth , which was crucified : he is risen ; he is not here : behold the place where they laid him .
text2: O gohiduuru magena wotemo , " Upa nimodo ! Ngohi tininako ngini niwisari o Yesus , o Nazaret ma nyawa , kekiaka Una wisisasangahadika gena . Hika nianano masirete kanena Awi riho de kanena Una iwihahado . Duma ngo kanena wihiwaka . Una wooho kali !

text: But go your way , tell his disciples and Peter that he goeth before you into Galilee : there shall ye see him , as he said unto you .
text2: So nimatai - tai nitagi nisingangasu to Una Awi muri - murika , komagena lo o Petruska . Nisingangasu Una wotagi woqomaka o Galileaka . Kadoka ngini asa Una niwikelelo , maro o kia ma nonoma ngini winidedemoka . "

text: And they went out quickly , and fled from the sepulchre ; for they trembled and were amazed : neither said they any thing to any man ; for they were afraid .
text2: So kagena de ona isupu o boosuno , gila - gila iloqa imagogora sababu imasidotirineku de yosawangi icarawa . Sababu yamodo poli so o nyawa moika lo ona isingangasuwa .

text: Now when Jesus was risen early the first day of the week , he appeared first to Mary Magdalene , out of whom he had cast seven devils .
text2: La o Nahadi ma goginitano , o Yesus wooho kali o nyawa isosone manga sidongirabano , de Una womasimane ma noma - noma ongo Maria Magdalenaka , muna iqoqoma Una asa wodusu to muna manena ami toka ngai tumudingi .

text: And she went and told them that had been with him , as they mourned and wept .
text2: So muna magena motagi mosihabari Una Awi dodiaoka , mamake ona idodora de iari isodu - sodu .

text: And they , when they had heard that he was alive , and had been seen of her , believed not .
text2: La o orasi magena ona yogiise ongo Maria motemo mowikeleloka o Yesus wooho kali , duma ona yopiricayawa .

text: After that he appeared in another form unto two of them , as they walked , and went into the country .
text2: Komagena qabolo de o Yesus womasimane kali wimomote yasinotoka , ma ngeko Awi jamani watagali . Magena idadi ma orasi wimomote yasinoto magena manga dodagi ma rabaka o Yerusalemno isupu yakahika o doku moika .

text: And they went and told it unto the residue : neither believed they them .
text2: Kagena de ona iliho gila - gila isihabari o hali magena manga dodiaoka , duma ona yopiricayawa .

text: Afterward he appeared unto the eleven as they sat at meat , and upbraided them with their unbelief and hardness of heart , because they believed not them which had seen him after he was risen .
text2: Ma dodoguka , o Yesus womasimane kali Awi muri yamogiowo de moika , ma orasi magena imatamiye yooqo . Una wasidapano ona magena , sababu manga piricaya ka ma cunu de manga sahe qatogoi so ona yapiricayawa , kiaka o nyawa isingangasu o Yesus ona wikelelo masirete Una wooho kali .

text: And he said unto them , Go ye into all the world , and preach the gospel to every creature .
text2: So kagena de Una wasulo onaka , " Nitagi ma bati o bi doku o dunia ma ngoguka , de nisihabari o habari qaloloha o Gikimoino ma meta o dunia ma nyawaka .

text: He that believeth and is baptized shall be saved ; but he that believeth not shall be damned .
text2: La o nyawa nagoona yopiricayawa o Gikimoi Awi habari qaloloha , done wafanggali de o dorou . Duma o nyawa nagoona yopiricaya o Gikimoi Awi habari qaloloha de yaoosika , done o salamati yamake .

text: And these signs shall follow them that believe ; In my name shall they cast out devils ; they shall speak with new tongues ;
text2: La o nyawa yopipiricaya ona magena tahike Ai kuasa la o nonako ihahairani aku yaaka . Komagena lo de to Ngohi Ai ronga aku o toka yodusu , de ona lo asa isibicara o bi bahasa ma somoa ,

text: They shall take up serpents ; and if they drink any deadly thing , it shall not hurt them ; they shall lay hands on the sick , and they shall recover .
text2: de nakoso ona o ngihia yacoho eko o raci yaudo , asa ona isiboditowa , de lo nakoso to ona manga gia yasipaqa o nyawa yasisirika , o nyawa ona magena asa yaloha kali . "

text: So then after the Lord had spoken unto them , he was received up into heaven , and sat on the right hand of God .
text2: So de o Jou Yesus wobicara qabolo , gila - gila Una asa witide o sorogaye , so kadaku womatamiye o Gikimoi Awi girinaka la Awi horomati wamake .

text: And they went forth , and preached everywhere , the Lord working with them , and confirming the word with signs following . Amen .
text2: Kagena de Awi muri - muri itagi isihabari o Gikimoi Awi habari qaloloha sidago ma bati o bi doku o dunia ma ngoguka . De o Jou lo womote to ona manga manara ma rabaka sidago aku yaaka o nonako ihahairani , la nagoona isigogigise to ona manga dodoto magena asa yanako itero de igogou .

text: Forasmuch as many have taken in hand to set forth in order a declaration of those things which are most surely believed among us ,
text2: Ai dodiao o Teofilus tonihohoromati , O nyawa yadala isidailako o Yesus Awi oho ma jarita magena yalefo , imatero maro o bi moi - moi kia naga idadadi iqomaka to ngone nanga sidongirabaka .

text: Even as they delivered them unto us , which from the beginning were eyewitnesses , and ministers of the word ;
text2: O kia naga yalelefoka , gena imatero maro o jarita kanaga inadedemo ngoneka , gena igogou ka ma nonomasi o kia naga idadadi magena qangodu o nyawa de manga lako masirete yosikeleloka , so o Jou Awi demo gena yosihabarika .

text: It seemed good to me also , having had perfect understanding of all things from the very first , to write unto thee in order , most excellent Theophilus ,
text2: Mutuwade kanaga o bi moi - moi qangodu idadadika , ma gola kiano gena , ngohi tatailako tosidodiahika , qabolo de ngohi ai sininga ma rabaka asa tositatapu bilasu o jarita magena , ma fato de ma fara itotiai magena , talefo de tonihike ngonaka .

text: That thou mightest know the certainty of those things , wherein thou hast been instructed .
text2: La ma ngale ngona asa aku nanako itiai o bi moi - moi qangodu , inidodoto ngonaka gena , igogou de itero .

text: There was in the days of Herod , the king of Judaea , a certain priest named Zacharias , of the course of Abia : and his wife was of the daughters of Aaron , and her name was Elisabeth .
text2: Ma orasi o Herodes wopareta maro ka o kolano moi o Yudea ma daeraka , de kanaga o imam moi awi ronga o Zakharia . Una magena o imam moi o bi imam o bolu moi manga topora o Abia gena manga sidongirabano . Una awi peqeka ami ronga ongo Elisabet , de muna ami topora lo gena manga sihino o imam moili .

text: And they were both righteous before God , walking in all the commandments and ordinances of the Lord blameless .
text2: Yasinoto magena o Gikimoi Awi simaka manga sigogise qaloha Awi bobita qangoduka , de yacoho itiai so manga sala o nyawa moi lo akuwa yamake .

text: And they had no child , because that Elisabeth was barren , and they both were now well stricken in years .
text2: Duma manga ngopa ihiwasi , sababu ma peqeka magena morohewa de lo yasinoto gena yaperekika .

text: And it came to pass , that while he executed the priest ' s office before God in the order of his course ,
text2: Ma moiku , de o imam o bolu moi manga topora o Abia gena manga orasi imanara so kagena o Gikimoi Awi Tahuka o Zakharia o imam manga manara waaka ,

text: According to the custom of the priest ' s office , his lot was to burn incense when he went into the temple of the Lord .
text2: de ma dongoho magena yaundi , maro manga biasa , la de magena iwisidumu una asa wodahe o Gikimoi Awi Tahu ma rabaka wowosa la o manyanyi watupu .

text: And the whole multitude of the people were praying without at the time of incense .
text2: So done ma orasi imasidiadoka ma ngale o manyanyi gena watupu , so una wowosa o Gikimoi Awi Tahu ma rabaka , de ma duduka kanaga o nyawa yadadala imatolomu isumbayang .

text: And there appeared unto him an angel of the Lord standing on the right side of the altar of incense .
text2: Kagena de o Jou Awi malaikat moi yahino de imaokoye o suba o manyanyi yatutupu ma riho ma girinaka .

text: And when Zacharias saw him , he was troubled , and fear fell upon him .
text2: Ato o malaikat magena wakelelo , de una wosawangi de foloi wimodo .

text: But the angel said unto him , Fear not , Zacharias : for thy prayer is heard ; and thy wife Elisabeth shall bear thee a son , and thou shalt call his name John .
text2: Duma o malaikat magena iwitemo , " Zakharia , upa nimodo ! Sababu ani gogolo gena o Jou woiseka . Ani peqeka ongo Elisabet magena done asa o ngopa yanau moi mowisibuo . Ngona bilasu o ngopa magena nowisironga o Yohanes .

text: And thou shalt have joy and gladness ; and many shall rejoice at his birth .
text2: Igogou ! De ani ngopa una magena asa ngona nomasagaga de ani nali de ani moreka . Ma ngale ani ngopa wisibuo , so o nyawa yadadala lo asa imasagaga de manga nalika .

text: For he shall be great in the sight of the Lord , and shall drink neither wine nor strong drink ; and he shall be filled with the Holy Ghost , even from his mother ' s womb .
text2: Sababu una done asa wodadi o nyawa wilalamo moi o Jou Awi simaka . Una womasimahawa o anggur eko o dalu woudo , de ka wisibuo kusi una gena o Gurumi Qatetebi ma kuasa qaasu - asu wiparetaka .

text: And many of the children of Israel shall he turn to the Lord their God .
text2: O Israel awi ngopa de awi danoku ona yadadala una asa wadoto so ona imakiliho la manga Jou Gikimoi , kiaka iqomaka manga topora wisusuba , Una magena wipiricaya kali .

text: And he shall go before him in the spirit and power of Elias , to turn the hearts of the fathers to the children , and the disobedient to the wisdom of the just ; to make ready a people prepared for the Lord .
text2: Ani ngopa una magena asa wodadi o sosulo moi la kanaga woqomano , o Jou Awi hino wosidailako , so una asa kanaga de o Gikimoi Awi Gurumi ma kuasa , maro iqoqomaka ma nabi Elia , ma ngale done o baba awi sininga ma loha asa iuti ma ngopaku . De o bi nyawa o Jou wisigisewa , ona magena asa una watuda la aku imakiliho de manga siningaka yodupa o ngeko ibobolowo yanonu . Waaka komagena , so wosidailako la o bi nyawa yadadala magena asa iwisigise ka o Jouka . Done idadi komagena . "

text: And Zacharias said unto the angel , Whereby shall I know this ? for I am an old man , and my wife well stricken in years .
text2: Kagena de o Zakharia wotemo o malaikat magenaka , " Pei ! Idodooha sidago ngohi topiricaya ani demo magena igogou de itiai . Sababu ngohi iperekika , de ai peqeka lo miperekika . "

text: And the angel answering said unto him , I am Gabriel , that stand in the presence of God ; and am sent to speak unto thee , and to shew thee these glad tidings .
text2: So o malaikat magena wotemo , " Ngohi manena Gabriel , o Gikimoi Awi sosulo o sorogano . Una ngohi woisulo la tahino kanena de o habari magena todedemo de tonisingangasu ngonaka .

text: And , behold , thou shalt be dumb , and not able to speak , until the day that these things shall be performed , because thou believest not my words , which shall be fulfilled in their season .
text2: O kia ngohi tonidedemo ngonaka , igogou magena asa idadi de imaaka ma orasi kiaka isitatapu qaboloka . Duma nako ngona gena , ma ngale ai demo magena ngona nopiricayawa , so maha la o orasi manena qabolo de ngona he naaku kawa nobicara , sidago o kia tonidedemoka magena igogou idadi kasi . "

text: And the people waited for Zacharias , and marvelled that he tarried so long in the temple .
text2: O Zakharia widahe o Gikimoi Awi Tahu ma rabaka , de o nyawa yadadala ona magena ma duduka iwidamahasi , de ona yohairani qadoohaso maro o Gikimoi Awi Tahu ma rabaka de una awi deka komagena .

text: And when he came out , he could not speak unto them : and they perceived that he had seen a vision in the temple : for he beckoned unto them , and remained speechless .
text2: Ma orasi una wosupuno , de waaku kawa wobicara onaka . Una ka cawali de awi gia wositumu - tumu koloko imomou de wobicara he waakuwa . So o nyawa magena yanako o Gikimoi Awi Tahu ma rabaka de o gogelelo o Gikimoino wamakeka .

text: And it came to pass , that , as soon as the days of his ministration were accomplished , he departed to his own house .
text2: Ipasaka , so ma orasi una awi manara o Gikimoi Awi Tahuka gena wosiboloka , de una woliho awi tahuka .

text: And after those days his wife Elisabeth conceived , and hid herself five months , saying ,
text2: Itekawa , de igogou ma peqeka gena asa moroheka . So ma deka he o ngoosa motoha gena o tahu ma rabano lo mosupuwa , de motemo ,

text: Thus hath the Lord dealt with me in the days wherein he looked on me , to take away my reproach among men .
text2: " We ! Manena o Jou Awi laha ngohika . Una ngohi woiriwo la o ngopa tamake , so ma ngale ngohi gena o nyawa isimaqe kawa . "

text: And in the sixth month the angel Gabriel was sent from God unto a city of Galilee , named Nazareth ,
text2: Ongo Elisabet gena morohe ma deka he o ngoosa butanga qabolo , de o Gikimoi wosulo so o malaikat Gabriel gena una wotagi o Nazaretka , o doku moi o Galilea ma tonaka ,

text: To a virgin espoused to a man whose name was Joseph , of the house of David ; and the virgin ' s name was Mary .
text2: ma ngale o jojaru moi ami ronga ongo Maria gena imarimake . Muna magena mobobaika de o gohiduuru moi , awi ronga o Yusuf , gena ma Kolano Daud awi ngopa de awi dano moiku .

text: And the angel came in unto her , and said , Hail , thou that art highly favoured , the Lord is with thee : blessed art thou among women .
text2: O malaikat magena wahika munaka , de womitemo , " Tabea ! Igogou , ngona manena o Jou Awi laha wonisicatu ifoloi , de Una kanaga dede ngona . "

text: And when she saw him , she was troubled at his saying , and cast in her mind what manner of salutation this should be .
text2: Moise awi demo magena de muna ami sininga isusa , de ma rabaka awi salam ma demo gena momasipongoka de ka matagapisi ma ngale o kia .

text: And the angel said unto her , Fear not , Mary : for thou hast found favour with God .
text2: De una wotemo kali , " Upa nimodo , Maria , sababu ngona manenaka asa o Gikimoi Awi laha wonisicatu .

text: And , behold , thou shalt conceive in thy womb , and bring forth a son , and shalt call his name JESUS .
text2: Ngona asa norohe so done asa o ngopa yanau moi nowisibuo . De o ngopa Una magena ngona bilasu nowisironga o Yesus .

text: He shall be great , and shall be called the Son of the Highest : and the Lord God shall give unto him the throne of his father David :
text2: Una asa wodadi wolamo o nyawa manga simaka de lo Una wisiaso o Gikimoi Wikukuruye ma Ngopa . De Una magena o Jou Gikimoi asa witide la Una wodadi o kolano moi maro ma Kolano Daud , Awi topora iqoqomaka .

text: And he shall reign over the house of Jacob for ever ; and of his kingdom there shall be no end .
text2: Una asa wokolano o Yakub awi ngopa de awi danoku wapareta ka ikakali , de Awi pareta gena ma bati lo ihiwa . "

text: Then said Mary unto the angel , How shall this be , seeing I know not a man ?
text2: De muna motemo , " We ! Idodooha so o hali magena idadi , salanta ngohi tokawi waasi de tomaidu waasi dede yanau . "

text: And the angel answered and said unto her , The Holy Ghost shall come upon thee , and the power of the Highest shall overshadow thee : therefore also that holy thing which shall be born of thee shall be called the Son of God .
text2: O malaikat gena wotemo , " O Gurumi Qatetebi asa wouti de wahino ngonaka , so o Gikimoi Wikukuruye Awi kuasa ma buturu lo asa igoge ngonaka . Komagena so o ngopa moi asa nowisibuo Una magena witebi , de wisiaso o Gikimoi ma Ngopa .

text: And , behold , thy cousin Elisabeth , she hath also conceived a son in her old age : and this is the sixth month with her , who was called barren .
text2: He ! Nanako ani ria ongo Elisabet muna magena , ngaroko miperekika de o nyawa miaso ami ngopa ihiwaka , duma morohe he o ngoosa butanga qabolo . Igogou , muna lo done asa o ngopa yanau moi mowisibuo .

text: For with God nothing shall be impossible .
text2: Sababu o kia bato o Gikimoi wotemo , magena bilasu idadi . "

text: And Mary said , Behold the handmaid of the Lord ; be it unto me according to thy word . And the angel departed from her .
text2: So muna motemo , " Ngohi manena tosidailako o Jou towileleani , ma ngale Awi edekati ngohika maro o kia noidedemoka , tanu asa idadi komagena . " Qabolo de o malaikat gena wotagika so muna womidongosaku .

text: And Mary arose in those days , and went into the hill country with haste , into a city of Juda ;
text2: Kagena de ongo Maria momajobo mokahika o doku moi o Yudea ma daera ma bi talaka .

text: And entered into the house of Zacharias , and saluted Elisabeth .
text2: Motagi momasidiado o Zakharia awi tahuka , de mowosa de ami salam momisidiado ongo Elisabetka .

text: And it came to pass , that , when Elisabeth heard the salutation of Mary , the babe leaped in her womb ; and Elisabeth was filled with the Holy Ghost :
text2: De komagena ami salam gena ongo Elisabet moise , de to muna ami ngopa ami roheka magena imahiti , de o Gurumi Qatetebi Awi kuasa qaasu - asu asa iwosa munaku de wopareta .

text: And she spake out with a loud voice , and said , Blessed art thou among women , and blessed is the fruit of thy womb .
text2: So muna momatoore , ami ili mapoputuru , motemo ongo Mariaka , " Igogou , o ngopeqeka manga sidongirabaka cawali ngona manena o Gikimoi Awi laha wonisicatu ifoloi , de ani pokoka o ngopa Una magena lo Awi laha wisicatuka bai !

text: And whence is this to me , that the mother of my Lord should come to me ?
text2: We ! Ngohi manena nagoona sidago ngona gena , ai Jou ma awa , de nahino kanena ngohi noikurumi .

text: For , lo , as soon as the voice of thy salutation sounded in mine ears , the babe leaped in my womb for joy .
text2: Ato ani salam toise , de o ngopa ai poko ma rabaka gena imahiti de ma nalika .

text: And blessed is she that believed : for there shall be a performance of those things which were told her from the Lord .
text2: Ngona nososanangi , sababu o Jou Awi demo gena nopiricayaka , de Awi demo ngonaka magena igogou asa idadi . "

text: And Mary said , My soul doth magnify the Lord ,
text2: De ongo Maria magena motemo , " Ngohi ai sininga ma rabaka o Jou towigiliri .

text: And my spirit hath rejoiced in God my Saviour .
text2: Ai sininga imore de qanali o Gikimoika , sababu Una ai dorouno woisisalamati .

text: For he hath regarded the low estate of his handmaiden : for , behold , from henceforth all generations shall call me blessed .
text2: Una ngohi woisiningaka , ngohi gena Awi gilalo so tomahadoku . O orasi manena de isikahika , o bi nyawa ona yangodu asa itemo , ngohi manena o ngopeqeka moi o Gikimoi Awi laha woisicatu .

text: For he that is mighty hath done to me great things ; and holy is his name .
text2: Sababu o Gikimoi Wokokuasa to Una Awi kuasa gena woisikelelo ngohika . Una Awi ronga magena qatebi bai !

text: And his mercy is on them that fear him from generation to generation .
text2: Una Awi galusiri gena kanaga o nyawa yangodu hitilahi ona wisusuba , gena sidago manga ngopa de manga danoka .

text: He hath shewed strength with his arm ; he hath scattered the proud in the imagination of their hearts .
text2: Una de Awi kuasa so awi manara moi - moi ikokuasa aku waaka , ena gena o nyawa imasihie ona magena wasikitinga la manga edekati gena upa idadi .

text: He hath put down the mighty from their seats , and exalted them of low degree .
text2: Una aku o bi kolano ona magena manga kuasa wasisa . Una aku o bi nyawa imahadoku ona magena watide .

text: He hath filled the hungry with good things ; and the rich he hath sent empty away .
text2: Una aku o nyawa yasasapi ona magena wasipunu de o kia naga qaloloha . Una aku o nyawa ikakaya wadusu de ona itagi ka manga kia - kia lo waali .

text: As he spake to our fathers , to Abraham , and to his seed for ever .
text2: Una wawosawa o kia naga iqoqomaka wojaji nanga ete de nanga toporaka gena o Abraham de lo awi ngopa de awi danoka . Maro komagena so Una wonariwo ngone nanga ete de nanga topora iqoqomaka , ena gena wileleani o Israel de lo to una awi ngopa de awi danoku . De ngone manena o Abraham awi ngopa de awi dano inangodu asa Una wonagalusiri ka sidutu ikakali . Sidago kagena . "

text: And Mary abode with her about three months , and returned to her own house .
text2: So ongo Maria kagena mogogogesi de ongo Elisabet ma deka o ngoosa saange , qabolo de asa moliho ami tahuka .

text: Now Elisabeth ' s full time came that she should be delivered ; and she brought forth a son .
text2: Ongo Elisabet ami orasi yaadoka , de muna ami ngopa yanau moi mowisibuo .

text: And her neighbours and her cousins heard how the Lord had shewed great mercy upon her ; and they rejoiced with her .
text2: O nyawa imakokadateku de ami gianongoru ona magena lo asa yanali dede muna , sababu yoise igogou o ngopa una magena kanaga lo o Jou Awi galusiri ilalamo wosikelelo munaka .
