Komagena lo Ai hinoli o duniaka , upa tahino tomasipongoka , duma asa ka nianako . "

text: And he spake a parable unto them to this end , that men ought always to pray , and not to faint ;
text2: Qabolo de o Yesus o ade - ade moi wadoto Awi muri - murika , la ona magena bilasu yosumbayang ikaeli de upa manga sininga qaceke .

text: Saying , There was in a city a judge , which feared not God , neither regarded man :
text2: Una wotemo , " O doku moika kanaga o hakim moi o Gikimoi wimodowa de lo nagoona bato wasidoohawa .

text: And there was a widow in that city ; and she came unto him , saying , Avenge me of mine adversary .
text2: Kanagali o doku magenaka mobabalo moi mosidadu - dadu mowirisima o hakim una magenaka , mogolo motemo , ' Kodo , noiriwo la to ngohi ai lawangi towisiholu itiai . '

text: And he would not for a while : but afterward he said within himself , Though I fear not God , nor regard man ;
text2: Ma nonomaka , o hakim magena munaka gena womiriwo woholu . Duma ma duuruka , awi sininga ma rabaka wotemo , ' Ngaroko ngohi o Gikimoi towimodowa de lo nagoona bato tasidoohawa ,

text: Yet because this widow troubleth me , I will avenge her , lest by her continual coming she weary me .
text2: duma muna gena foloi mokaeli mahino , so lebelaha mobabalo muna magena ka tomiriwo so o sala munaka gena tositiai , la o susa upa moihike ngohika . ' "

text: And the Lord said , Hear what the unjust judge saith .
text2: Qabolo de o Jou Yesus wotemo , " Niise o kia ma hakim magena wotetemo . Ngaroko awi sininga gena itiaiwa , duma wodupa womiriwo mobabalo muna magena , sababu mogolo mosidadu - dadu .

text: And shall not God avenge his own elect , which cry day and night unto him , though he bear long with them ?
text2: De ma boboloika , o Gikimoi lo wodupa winiriwo itiai nginika de lo o nyawa ma somoali ningodu winihihirika , kiaka nagoona o putu de o wange igolo ikaeli Unaka . Igogou , Una ma orasi asa wodamahawa ,

text: I tell you that he will avenge them speedily . Nevertheless when the Son of man cometh , shall he find faith on the earth ?
text2: duma Una womacapati la ona wariwo bai ! Ngaroko komagena , done o orasi ma simaka Ngohi tahino kali , de Ngohi o Nyawa ma Duhutu manena asa o duniaka tamake o bi nyawa nagala yadalawa , kiaka ipipiricaya Ngohika . "

text: And he spake this parable unto certain which trusted in themselves that they were righteous , and despised others :
text2: Qabolo de o Yesus o ade - ade moili wadoto so wosijarita kiaka o nyawa kanaga yadoduhudu o nyawaka de itemo ka ona masirete gena manga sininga itiai .

text: Two men went up into the temple to pray ; the one a Pharisee , and the other a publican .
text2: Una wotemo , " Kanaga o nyawa yasinoto yotagi o Gikimoi Awi Tahuka la kagena yosumbayang . Wimoi o Farisi ma nyawa de wimoi o balastengi wototolomu .

text: The Pharisee stood and prayed thus with himself , God , I thank thee , that I am not as other men are , extortioners , unjust , adulterers , or even as this publican .
text2: O Farisi ma nyawa una magena womaokoye de wosumbayang , awi sininga ma rabaka wotemo , ' Ya Gikimoi , ngohi ai sukuru tatide Ngonaka , sababu ngohi manena maro o nyawa ma somoawa , ena gena yototosi , o nyawa o dorou yaaaka , eko lo yosusundali de komagena lo ngohi imaterowa maro o balastengi wototolomu una magena .

text: I fast twice in the week , I give tithes of all that I possess .
text2: Ngohi manena o nahadi moi o wange sinoto tooqowa de toudowa , de lo ai moi - moi kanaga ngohika magena taregu mogiowoka so o regu moi gena tosisuba Ngonaka . '

text: And the publican , standing afar off , would not lift up so much as his eyes unto heaven , but smote upon his breast , saying , God be merciful to me a sinner .
text2: Duma o balastengi wototolomu una magena ka ikuruka womaokoye , de una woholu o dipaye womamataga de lo ma ngale awi beleso so awi mamata masirete wangangapoka , de wotemo , ' Ya Gikimoi , tanu ngohi noigalusiri , ngohi manena o nyawa ma dorou . ' "

text: I tell you , this man went down to his house justified rather than the other : for every one that exalteth himself shall be abased ; and he that humbleth himself shall be exalted .
text2: O Yesus Awi demo sidago kagena de wotemoli , " Ngohi totemo , igogou o Farisi ma nyawa wisowo , duma o balastengi wototolomu una magena ma orasi woliho awi tahuka , de awi sininga asa idadi itiai o Gikimoi Awi simaka . Sababu o nyawa la kanaga imasihie , ona magena o Gikimoi asa wasiceke , duma o nyawa la kanaga imasiceke , ona magena o Gikimoi asa wasilamo . "

text: And they brought unto him also infants , that he would touch them : but when his disciples saw it , they rebuked them .
text2: O wange moiku o bi nyawa manga ngopa yacecekesi o Yesuska yaaho la wapaqa de wogolo tanu o Gikimoi Awi laha wasicatu onaka , duma Awi muri - muri yakelelo , de yatoosa so yadogore ona magenaka , " Upa niahika ! "

text: But Jesus called them unto him , and said , Suffer little children to come unto me , and forbid them not : for of such is the kingdom of God .
text2: Kagena de o Yesus o ngopa - ngopa magena waaso de wotemo Awi muri - murika , " Niaqohaka , la o bi ngopa ona magena yahino Ngohino . Upa lo niafati de lo niasimahawa . Sababu o bi nyawa imatero maro o ngopa ona manena asa yaaku iwosa o Gikimoi Awi paretaka .

text: Verily I say unto you , Whosoever shall not receive the kingdom of God as a little child shall in no wise enter therein .
text2: So ngini tinisingangasu igogou , nakoso ngini niholu o Gikimoi ngini winipareta maro ka o ngopa , ngini magena akuwa niamake o Gikimoi Awi pareta . "

text: And a certain ruler asked him , saying , Good Master , what shall I do to inherit eternal life ?
text2: O wange moiku o puji ma tahu wapopareta moi womasano o Yesuska , " Baba Guru , Ani sininga qaloloha , ngohi bilasu o kia taaka la tamake o oho ikokakali . "

text: And Jesus said unto him , Why callest thou me good ? none is good , save one , that is , God .
text2: " Qadoohaso ngona notemo Ngohi Ai sininga qaloha . Kanena moiwa manga sininga qaloloha , cawali o Gikimoi masirete .

text: Thou knowest the commandments , Do not commit adultery , Do not kill , Do not steal , Do not bear false witness , Honour thy father and thy mother .
text2: Ngona nanakoka o Gikimoi Awi bobita , ' Upa ngona nosundali , upa ngona notooma , upa ngona notosi , upa de o galaki ani dodiaoka gena ikokulai de lo nahoromati ani baba de ani awa . ' "

text: And he said , All these have I kept from my youth up .
text2: De una wosango wotemo , " Baba Guru , o bobita qangodu magena tamoteka ma orasi ngohi ka togogohiduuru kasi . "

text: Now when Jesus heard these things , he said unto him , Yet lackest thou one thing : sell all that thou hast , and distribute unto the poor , and thou shalt have treasure in heaven : and come , follow me .
text2: O Yesus woise komagena , de wotemo , " Cawali o ngai moisi naaka waasi . Notagi kasi la ani ronga moi ani tahu ma rabaka nosiija de ma pipi o nyawa isususaka nasitoku , la ngona asa namake o arata ma duhutu o sorogaka . Qaboloka , de nahino la noimote Ngohi . "

text: And when he heard this , he was very sorrowful : for he was very rich .
text2: Woise o Yesus wotemo komagena , so kagena de o nyawa una magena awi sininga ipeleso , sababu una magena foloi wokaya .

text: And when Jesus saw that he was very sorrowful , he said , How hardly shall they that have riches enter into the kingdom of God !
text2: La o Yesus winano una awi sininga ipeleso , so wotemo , " Igogou ! Isusa icarawa o nyawa ikakaya o Gikimoi iwisigise la iwosa Awi pareta ma rabaka .

text: For it is easier for a camel to go through a needle ' s eye , than for a rich man to enter into the kingdom of God .
text2: Lebelaha o unta moi asa iwosa o yaiti ma kupeka , nako positero de o nyawa wokakaya moi wowosa o Gikimoi Awi pareta ma rabaka . "

text: And they that heard it said , Who then can be saved ?
text2: O nyawa o Yesus Awi demo gena yoise , de ona itemo , " We ! Nako igogou komagena , done nagoona asa aku isalamati la yamake o oho ka sidutu ikakali . "

text: And he said , The things which are impossible with men are possible with God .
text2: Kagena de Una wotemo , " Nakoso maha de o nyawa manga manara o duniaka , gena idadiwa . Duma nakoso maha de o Gikimoi Awi manara , de ka idadi . "

text: Then Peter said , Lo , we have left all , and followed thee .
text2: De o Petrus wotemo , " He ! Ngomi manena mia moi - moi lo qangodu miodongosaka so Ngona minimoteka , so o kia asa miamake . "

text: And he said unto them , Verily I say unto you , There is no man that hath left house , or parents , or brethren , or wife , or children , for the kingdom of God ' s sake ,
text2: O Yesus wotemo , " Nginika tinisingangasu igogou , o nyawa nagoona manga tahu de manga peqeka yodongosaka , eko manga gianongoru de manga awa de lo manga baba , eko lo manga ngopa - ngopa sababu ma ngale o Gikimoi ona wapareta maro o kolano moi ,

text: Who shall not receive manifold more in this present time , and in the world to come life everlasting .
text2: o orasi manena ona magena asa yamake foloi idala . De o orasi ma simaka asa ona yamake ma fanggali o oho qaloloha de ikokakali . "

text: Then he took unto him the twelve , and said unto them , Behold , we go up to Jerusalem , and all things that are written by the prophets concerning the Son of man shall be accomplished .
text2: O Yesus Awi muri - muri watolomu so imatingaka , de wotemo onaka , " Niise la nianako . Ngone manena pokahie nanga meta o Yerusalem ma dokuka . So kagena o bi moi - moi ma ngale o Nyawa ma Duhutu Ngohi manena iqomaka o bi nabi isilelefo gena , qangodu bilasu idadi .

text: For he shall be delivered unto the Gentiles , and shall be mocked , and spitefully entreated , and spitted on :
text2: Ngohi asa isidoa o nyawa ona magena o Yahudika ma nyawa yasowo , la ona magena igagaka isiihe , isimaqe , ihobi ,

text: And they shall scourge him , and put him to death : and the third day he shall rise again .
text2: de ingangapo de lo itooma . Duma o wange saangeka de Ngohi asa tooho kali . "

text: And they understood none of these things : and this saying was hid from them , neither knew they the things which were spoken .
text2: Duma ma ngale o kia Una wotetemo gena , qangodu igogou Awi muri - muri asa yanakowa , sababu Awi demo ma ngale gena kanaga isingangasu waasi , so idadiwa ona yanako .

text: And it came to pass , that as he was come nigh unto Jericho , a certain blind man sat by the way side begging :
text2: De o Yesus he wadumu o Yerikhoka , de kagena o nyawa moi wopipilo o ngeko ma dateka wogogeku de wogogolo .

text: And hearing the multitude pass by , he asked what it meant .
text2: Orasi magena una wogiise o nyawa yadadala yakahino , de una wasano , " O kia naga . "

text: And they told him , that Jesus of Nazareth passeth by .
text2: De ona itemo unaka , " O Yesus o Nazaret ma nyawa nonena wokahino . "

text: And he cried , saying , Jesus , thou Son of David , have mercy on me .
text2: Una woise komagena , de una womatoore , " Ya Yesus ! O Daud awi ngopa de awi dano moiku , kodo ! Noigalusiri ngohi ! "

text: And they which went before rebuked him , that he should hold his peace : but he cried so much the more , Thou Son of David , have mercy on me .
text2: De o nyawa o Yesus Awi simaka itagi ona magena iwingamo unaka itemo , " He ! Nomapopongo ! " Duma una gena ka foloisi womatotoore , " O Daud awi ngopa de awi dano moiku , kodo ! Noigalusiri ngohi ! "

text: And Jesus stood , and commanded him to be brought unto him : and when he was come near , he asked him ,
text2: Kagena de o Yesus womatogu de wosulo wotemo , " Wopipilo una magena niwingaho nonena Ngohika ! " So iwingahoka , de kagena womasidiado de o Yesus wisano una wopipiloka ,

text: Saying , What wilt thou that I shall do unto thee ? And he said , Lord , that I may receive my sight .
text2: " O kia nodupa Ngohi taaka ngonaka . " De una wopipilo gena wosango wotemo , " Ya , Jou ! Ngohi todupa tomasigelelo . "

text: And Jesus said unto him , Receive thy sight : thy faith hath saved thee .
text2: Kagena de o Yesus wotemo , " Nako komagena , hika nomasigelelo ! Sababu de to ngona ani piricaya Ngohika asa nisilohaka . "

text: And immediately he received his sight , and followed him , glorifying God : and all the people , when they saw it , gave praise unto God .
text2: De o orasi magena qabolo wopipilo asa womasigeleloka . Kagena de wotagi o Yesus iwimote - mote , de lo o Gikimoi wisigiliri de wihoromati . De ma orasi o kia naga idadadi magena o nyawa yakelelo , de ona yangodu lo iwisigiliri o Gikimoika .

text: And Jesus entered and passed through Jericho .
text2: Ma orasi o Yesus womasidiado o Yerikhoka , de Una wotagi gila - gila o doku magena wakiloli .

text: And , behold , there was a man named Zacchaeus , which was the chief among the publicans , and he was rich .
text2: O doku magenaka kanaga wokakaya moi , o balastengi itotolomu manga sahe , una magena awi ronga o Zakheus .

text: And he sought to see Jesus who he was ; and could not for the press , because he was little of stature .
text2: Una wodupa wikelelo o Yesus Una magena naguuna , duma idadiwa iwikelelo , sababu o nyawa yadala poli de una ka witimisi .

text: And he ran before , and climbed up into a sycomore tree to see him : for he was to pass that way .
text2: So kagena de una womagogora o nyawa manga sima watola de woqomaka , de o gota o hutu moiye wadola , la ma orasi o Yesus done nogena wakahino , de idadi Una magena iwikelelo .

text: And when Jesus came to the place , he looked up , and saw him , and said unto him , Zacchaeus , make haste , and come down ; for to day I must abide at thy house .
text2: So ma orasi o Yesus wakahino nogena , de Una magena womamataga de wotemo , " Zakheus , taika nouti ! Sababu o wange manena ani tahuka bilasu Ngohi totulu . "

text: And he made haste , and came down , and received him joyfully .
text2: So o Zakheus una magena womatai - tai wouti de awi tahuka o Yesus wiqehe qaloha de awi nali de awi more ilamo .

text: And when they saw it , they all murmured , saying , That he was gone to be guest with a man that is a sinner .
text2: Ma orasi o nyawa yangodu yakelelo igogou o Yesus wotagi o Zakheus awi tahuka , de ona magena imaridemo yotemo , " Awadede ! Una wotagi wikurumi o nyawa ma dorou moi awi tahuka . "

text: And Zacchaeus stood , and said unto the Lord ; Behold , Lord , the half of my goods I give to the poor ; and if I have taken any thing from any man by false accusation , I restore him fourfold .
text2: Kagena de o Jou Yesus waado o Zakheus awi tahuka , de o Zakheus una magena womaokoye de wotemo Unaka , " Jou , to ngohi ai arata ma sononga asa ngohi tahike o bi nyawa isususaka , de lo nagoona tasihaga , so manga pipi taqeheka , asa ngohi tatagali de tosigiliho onaka sidago ma para iha . "

text: And Jesus said unto him , This day is salvation come to this house , forsomuch as he also is a son of Abraham .
text2: De o Yesus wotemo , " O wange manena qabolo ngona de ani tahu ma rabaka lo ningodu o Gikimoi asa winisisalamati , sababu igogou ngona manena lo o Abraham awi ngopa de awi dano moiku .

text: For the Son of man is come to seek and to save that which was lost .
text2: Ma sababu magena , so Ngohi o Nyawa ma Duhutu manena tahino . Ngohi tahino la o nyawa dede o Gikimoi imakitingaka , ona magena tasari de o dorou ma rabano tapalako , maro o duba isisisa tasari sidago tosisalamati . "

text: And as they heard these things , he added and spake a parable , because he was nigh to Jerusalem , and because they thought that the kingdom of God should immediately appear .
text2: O orasi magena o Yesus Awi dodagi ma rabaka so o Yerusalem he wadumuka , de o bi nyawa Awi demo yoiise ona magena kanaga manga sininga ma rabaka itemo , nagala ma orasi he yaadoka o Gikimoi asa wopareta maro o kolano moi o duniaka . So Una Awi demo magena wosidofa de o ade - ade moili wadoto onaka .

text: He said therefore , A certain nobleman went into a far country to receive for himself a kingdom , and to return .
text2: Una wotemo , " Kanaga o tuangi moi awi doku wodongosa de wotagi o doku ma soa ikukuruka , la kagena aku iwitide wodadi o kolano moi , qabolo de asa woliho kali .

text: And he called his ten servants , and delivered them ten pounds , and said unto them , Occupy till I come .
text2: So una magena womajobo waasi , de ileleleani unaka yamogiowo waaso la wasulo , de o pipi o guraci wahike moi - moi pipi ngai moi . O tuangi una magena wotemo , ' Ngohi totagisi de o pipi manena aku nimasiiija hika de hino . '

text: But his citizens hated him , and sent a message after him , saying , We will not have this man to reign over us .
text2: Duma ma tuangi awi doku ma rabaka kanaga lo o nyawa iwiduhudu unaka . Ato womajoboka , ona iwidoduhudu magena manga nyawa yasulo la itagi ituuruno de isingangasu itemo , ' Ngomi manena miwiholu o tuangi una magena wodadi mia kolano . '

text: And it came to pass , that when he was returned , having received the kingdom , then he commanded these servants to be called unto him , to whom he had given the money , that he might know how much every man had gained by trading .
text2: Ngaroko manga demo komagena , duma una magena iwitideka wodadi manga kolano , qabolo de woliho awi dokuka . Womasidiadoka , de una asa womatai - tai ileleleani yamogiowo ona magena waaso la wirisima , ma ngale o pipi ma utungu ma lamo o kiamoi ona yamamakeka magena aku wanako .

text: Then came the first , saying , Lord , thy pound hath gained ten pounds .
text2: Woleleleani ma nonomaka , una magena wahino wirisima de wotemo , ' Tuangi , iqomaka o pipi o guraci moi noihihike ngohika , magena ma dogo gena ngai mogiowoli . '

text: And he said unto him , Well , thou good servant : because thou hast been faithful in a very little , have thou authority over ten cities .
text2: Ma tuangi gena wotemo , ' Igogou qaloha ! Ngona ani leleani manena qaloha . Ma ngale ngona o kia naga ma cunu gena aku naaturu nokaeli , so ngohi lo asa tonitide la nodadi o kota mogiowo manga bobareta . '

text: And the second came , saying , Lord , thy pound hath gained five pounds .
text2: De woleleleani ma sinotoka , una magena wahino de wotemo , ' Tuangi , iqomaka o pipi o guraci moi noihihike ngohika , magena ma dogo gena ngai motohali . '

text: And he said likewise to him , Be thou also over five cities .
text2: Ma tuangi gena wotemoli , ' Ngona asa nodadi o kota motoha manga bobareta . '

text: And another came , saying , Lord , behold , here is thy pound , which I have kept laid up in a napkin :
text2: Qabolo de woleleleani moili wahino de wotemo , ' Tuangi , manena ani pipi . Ngohi tadiahi qaloha ai lenso ma rabaka tosisaoka .

text: For I feared thee , because thou art an austere man : thou takest up that thou layedst not down , and reapest that thou didst not sow .
text2: Ngohi tonimodoka , sababu ngohi tanakoka ngona gena o nyawa moi nimatobangamo . Komagena o sopo kiaka nadadatowa aku ka nautu , de lo o kia naga namomanarawa aku ka namake . '

text: And he saith unto him , Out of thine own mouth will I judge thee , thou wicked servant . Thou knewest that I was an austere man , taking up that I laid not down , and reaping that I did not sow :
text2: Kagena de ma tuangi gena wotemo , ' Ngona gena o leleani ma dorou bai ! So nakoso ngona nanakoka , ngohi gena itobangamo o sopo kiaka todadatowa aku ka tautu de lo o kia naga tamomanarawa aku ka tamake ,

text: Wherefore then gavest not thou my money into the bank , that at my coming I might have required mine own with usury ?
text2: de qadoohaso sidago ngona lo ai pipi gena he nadiahiwa o bankka , la ma ngale ipuo la ngohi tolihono de ma dogo gena aku tamakeli . '

text: And he said unto them that stood by , Take from him the pound , and give it to him that hath ten pounds .
text2: Ma tuangi o nyawa kagena imakokadateka wotemoli , ' O pipi ngai moi magena niaqehe unano de niwihike woleleleani moika , kiaka una magenaka o pipi ma dogo mogiowoka . '

text: ( And they said unto him , Lord , he hath ten pounds . )
text2: Duma o nyawa ona magena yotemo , ' Awalele ! Tuangi , una o pipi ngai mogiowo qabolo wamakeka . '

text: For I say unto you , That unto every one which hath shall be given ; and from him that hath not , even that he hath shall be taken away from him .
text2: Ma tuangi wotemoli , ' Ngohi totemo , igogou nagoona to ona manga dogo yamamake gena de maenaka , done asa yadogo ifoloi onaka . Duma nagoona manga dogo la yamakewa , done ka ma cunu onaka gena asa ngohi taqehe kali .

text: But those mine enemies , which would not that I should reign over them , bring hither , and slay them before me .
text2: De o orasi manena ai saturu kiaka ihoholu ngohi todadi to ona manga kolano , ona magena niangaho nonena . La ona yangodu niatooma ai simaka . ' "

text: And when he had thus spoken , he went before , ascending up to Jerusalem .
text2: So o Yesus Awi ade - ade wadedemoka , de Una woqoqoma manga simaka wotagi wokahika o Yerusalemka .

text: And it came to pass , when he was come nigh to Bethphage and Bethany , at the mount called the mount of Olives , he sent two of his disciples ,
text2: Ma orasi ona yadumuka o doku Betfage de o doku Betania o Tala Zaitunka , kagena de o muri yasinoto wasulo itagi iqoma .

text: Saying , Go ye into the village over against you ; in the which at your entering ye shall find a colt tied , whereon yet never man sat : loose him , and bring him hither .
text2: De Una wotemo onaka , " Nitagi o doku magenaka . La kagena o dokuka niwosa , de ngini asa niakelelo o keledai ma goho moi yapilikuka . De o nyawa moi lo waasi o keledai magena yobane . Ma bobiliku niasose de niaahono kanena .

text: And if any man ask you , Why do ye loose him ? thus shall ye say unto him , Because the Lord hath need of him .
text2: Nakoso o nyawa nisano nginika , ' Qadoohaso o keledai magena niaqehe , ' de nitemo onaka , ' O Jou wodupa wapake . ' "

text: And they that were sent went their way , and found even as he had said unto them .
text2: Qabolo de Una Awi muri yasinoto magena itagi , de ona asa yamake maro o kia Una wotetemo onaka .

text: And as they were loosing the colt , the owners thereof said unto them , Why loose ye the colt ?
text2: La o keledai ma bobiliku yasose de ma duhutu wakelelo de wasano onaka , " He ! Ngini magena nidooha . Qadoohaso o keledai ma bobiliku niasose de niaqehe . "

text: And they said , The Lord hath need of him .
text2: De o muri yasinoto yosango , " O Jou wodupa wapake bai ! "

text: And they brought him to Jesus : and they cast their garments upon the colt , and they set Jesus thereon .
text2: So ona o keledai magena yaaho Unaka , de manga juba yahoi so isinaho o keledai ma duduku . Kagena de Una wisidola so womatamiye ma qokuka .

text: And as he went , they spread their clothes in the way .
text2: So ona ka itatagi yokahika o Yerusalemka . Una asa wogila - gila , de kogena o ngekoko o nyawa yadadala manga juba isinaho , ma ngale Una iwisihoromati .

text: And when he was come nigh , even now at the descent of the mount of Olives , the whole multitude of the disciples began to rejoice and praise God with a loud voice for all the mighty works that they had seen ;
text2: Ma orasi Una he dangade womasidiado o Yerusalemka , o Tala Zaitun ma ngunuku wokahuku , o bi nyawa yadadala Una wimote - mote gena yangodu asa o Gikimoi iwisigiliri . Ona de manga nali imasagaga ma ngale o bi nonako ihahairani qangodu gena yakeleloka .

text: Saying , Blessed be the King that cometh in the name of the Lord : peace in heaven , and glory in the highest .
text2: So itemo , " Igogou ! Ma Kolano wahino de o Jou Awi ronga . So tanu Una magenaka o Gikimoi Awi laha wisicatu . Hino powigiliri o Gikimoi Wikukuruye , sababu Una Awi sininga qaloha ngoneka ! "

text: And some of the Pharisees from among the multitude said unto him , Master , rebuke thy disciples .
text2: Kagena de o Farisi ma nyawa yamuruo naga yadadala manga sidongirabaka iwitemo o Yesuska , " He , Baba Guru ! Ani nyawa nimomote gena nasulo imapopongoka . "

text: And he answered and said unto them , I tell you that , if these should hold their peace , the stones would immediately cry out .
text2: De Una wotemo , " Hiwa ! Sababu nakoso Ai nyawa imomote gena imapopongoka , de o bi teto magena lo asa imasagaga so Ngohi isigiliri bai ! "

text: And when he was come near , he beheld the city , and wept over it ,
text2: Ma orasi o Yesus he womasidiado o Yerusalemka , so o doku magena aku wakelelo , de Una asa wogari .

text: Saying , If thou hadst known , even thou , at least in this thy day , the things which belong unto thy peace ! but now they are hid from thine eyes .
text2: Una wotemo , " Kodo ! Ngini o Yerusalemka , kodo ! Ka qaloha nakoso o wange manena ngini nianako o kia aku o dame inigaho nginika . Duma qangodu magena nisikelelowa .

text: For the days shall come upon thee , that thine enemies shall cast a trench about thee , and compass thee round , and keep thee in on every side ,
text2: Ma orasi done asa imasidiado , de nia saturu asa ngini inilawangi , de nifati inisigilolika kiano bato , sidago o ngeko moi lo ihiwa la ngini aku niloqa .

text: And shall lay thee even with the ground , and thy children within thee ; and they shall not leave in thee one stone upon another ; because thou knewest not the time of thy visitation .
text2: Ona magena asa nia doku de ma raba qangodu yabodito , sidago lo iruba de ituraba so ma teto ngai moi lo asa imalapangawa de o teto ma somoa . Sababu ngini niwimaha - mahawa o Gikimoi Awi hino nginika la ngini winiriwo . "

text: And he went into the temple , and began to cast out them that sold therein , and them that bought ;
text2: Qabolo de o Yesus wotagili o Gikimoi Awi Tahu ma lolohaka , de wasitodadaheno o nyawa yadala kagenadahu imasiiija , so Una wadusu ,

text: Saying unto them , It is written , My house is the house of prayer : but ye have made it a den of thieves .
text2: de wotemo , " O Gikimoi Awi Jaji ma Buku ma rabaka isilelefo Una wotemo komanena , ' To Ngohi Ai tahu manena idadi o bi nyawa manga riho moi la kanena isuba de isumbayang Ngohika . ' De qadoohaso ngini niaaka ikokokoora manga dodutulu ma riho . Ce ! "

text: And he taught daily in the temple . But the chief priests and the scribes and the chief of the people sought to destroy him ,
text2: Kagena o wange isigeto - geto o Gikimoi Awi Tahuka Una wodoto . O imamka ma bi sahe , de o bi guru agama , de lo o Yahudika manga roriri magena o ngeko isisari la o Yesus witago de witooma ,

text: And could not find what they might do : for all the people were very attentive to hear him .
text2: duma o ngeko moi lo yamakewa ma ngale manga edekati magena yaaka , sababu o nyawa yadadala foloi yodupa to Una Awi dodoto yoise .

text: And it came to pass , that on one of those days , as he taught the people in the temple , and preached the gospel , the chief priests and the scribes came upon him with the elders ,
text2: O wange moiku o Yesus wodoto de o habari qaloloha wasihabari o nyawa yadadala kagena o Gikimoi Awi Tahu ma lolohaka . De imatodoka o imamka ma bi sahe , de o bi guru agama , de lo o Yahudika manga roriri yahino Unaka .

text: And spake unto him , saying , Tell us , by what authority doest thou these things ? or who is he that gave thee this authority ?
text2: De ona wisano itemo Unaka , " Hika nomisingangasu ngomika , naguuna wonisulo de naguuna o haku wonihike Ngonaka , so kagunugo o Gikimoi Awi Tahu ma rabaka naaka komagena . "

text: And he answered and said unto them , I will also ask you one thing ; and answer me :
text2: De Una wosango wotemo , " Ngohi lo tinisano kasi . Hika ngini niasango ,

text: The baptism of John , was it from heaven , or of men ?
text2: o Yohanes o nyawa waosi gena naguuna o haku wihike , o nyawano eko o Gikimoino . "

text: And they reasoned with themselves , saying , If we shall say , From heaven ; he will say , Why then believed ye him not ?
text2: Kagena de ona manga sidongirabaka imatekebicara moi de moika itemo , " Nakoso ngone potemo o haku o Gikimoino , done Una wonasitemo , ' Nako komagena , de qadoohaso o Yohanes Wooosi niwipiricayawa . '

text: But and if we say , Of men ; all the people will stone us : for they be persuaded that John was a prophet .
text2: Duma isusali nako potemo de o haku o nyawano , upa sidago o nyawa yadadala de o bi teto gena ngone inasipapaka , sababu ona itemo o Yohanes una magena o nabi moi . "

text: And they answered , that they could not tell whence it was .
text2: So cawali isango itemo , " Ngomi mianakowa o haku magena kiano una wamake . "

text: And Jesus said unto them , Neither tell I you by what authority I do these things .
text2: So kagena de Una wotemo onaka , " Nako komagena , Ngohi lo toholu todedemo nginika de naguuna awi haku so Ngohi taaka o moi - moi qangodu manena . "

text: Then began he to speak to the people this parable ; A certain man planted a vineyard , and let it forth to husbandmen , and went into a far country for a long time .
text2: So komagena qabolo de o Yesus wadoto o bi nyawa yadadalaka , de wotemo onaka to Una Awi ade - ade komanena , " Kanaga o nyawa moi awi anggur raki wosidato . Qabolo de o anggur ma raki magena wosisewaka o nyawa yamuruo naga yamomanaraka , kagena de una womajoboka o doku ma somoaka , de ka iteka poli kagena wogoge .

text: And at the season he sent a servant to the husbandmen , that they should give him of the fruit of the vineyard : but the husbandmen beat him , and sent him away empty .
text2: Ma orasi yaadoka o anggur ma sopo yautu , o nyawa una magena wisidingo awi nyawa wogogilalo moi la wotagi kadoka to una awi raki yamomanaraka de ma ngale waqehe to una awi raki ma gimina . Duma wogogilalo gena awi rakika imomanara ona magena wingangapoka , de wisulo una woliho ka womamuruoye .

text: And again he sent another servant : and they beat him also , and entreated him shamefully , and sent him away empty .
text2: La o raki ma duhutu una magena wisidingo kali o nyawa wogogilalo moili . Duma una magena lo yomomanara ona magena wingangapo kali , gila - gila witotadi de widodoa so wisulo una lo woliho ka womamuruoye .

text: And again he sent a third : and they wounded him also , and cast him out .
text2: O raki ma duhutu una magena wisidingo kali o nyawa wogogilalo ma saangeka , duma una wogogilalo magena iwingangapoli de lo iwiumo o raki ma nokika .

text: Then said the lord of the vineyard , What shall I do ? I will send my beloved son : it may be they will reverence him when they see him .
text2: Kagena de o raki ma duhutu magena wotemo , ' Ngohi o kiali taaka . Ngohi asa tasidingo kali ai ngopa masirete towidododara . Igogou , done ai ngopa masirete so iwihoromati . '

text: But when the husbandmen saw him , they reasoned among themselves , saying , This is the heir : come , let us kill him , that the inheritance may be ours .
text2: Duma imomanara ona magena wikelelo de itemo moi de moika , ' Una magena bai ! Una o warisi ma jojoho . Hino la ngone una powitoomaka , ma ngale ngone pamake to una awi warisi . '

text: So they cast him out of the vineyard , and killed him . What therefore shall the lord of the vineyard do unto them ?
text2: Kagena de o ngopa magena iwisoroma so o raki ma duduka de kagena asa ona iwitoomaka . " So kagena de o Yesus o ade - ade magena wosijarita qabolo de wasano wotemo , " So o raki ma duhutu una magena asa o kia una waaka .

text: He shall come and destroy these husbandmen , and shall give the vineyard to others . And when they heard it , they said , God forbid .
text2: Bilasu una wahino de watooma o bi nyawa imomanara ona magena , de gila - gila o raki magena wosisewa kali o nyawa imomanara ma somoaka . " Ma orasi o nyawa magena o ade - ade manena yoise , de ona itemo , " Upa sidago ka idadi komagena bai ! "

text: And he beheld them , and said , What is this then that is written , The stone which the builders rejected , the same is become the head of the corner ?
text2: Magena de o Yesus wakeri - keri onaka de wotemo , " Nako komagena , de niawosaka o gimina manena o Gikimoi Awi Jaji ma Buku ma rabaka , ' O teto o tukang yahoholu de yapapakewa magena done asa isiaka de idadi o tahu ma sosoqe ma teto ma nonoma . '

text: Whosoever shall fall upon that stone shall be broken ; but on whomsoever it shall fall , it will grind him to powder .
text2: O bi nyawa la kanaga Ngohi iholuka , ona magena imatero maro o rube moi kanaga o tetoku itura so ipoloteka , eko lo o rube moiku kanaga o teto moi yodutura so o rube gena imeremoka . "

text: And the chief priests and the scribes the same hour sought to lay hands on him ; and they feared the people : for they perceived that he had spoken this parable against them .
text2: O bi guru agama de lo o imamka ma bi sahe to Una Awi ade - ade gena yoise , de ona yanako Una wasimeta onaka . So kagena de ona imasikadailako la o orasi magenaka tanu Una iwitago . Duma ma ngale ona yamodo o bi nyawa yadadala , so ona idadi kawa yaaka .

text: And they watched him , and sent forth spies , which should feign themselves just men , that they might take hold of his words , that so they might deliver him unto the power and authority of the governor .
text2: So ona magena o ngeko moi yosari la aku Una witago . Ona asa o nyawa yabaja de yasulo la ona magena itagi imaaka maro o nyawa manga sininga ibolowo , duma de manga edekati Una iwisabatolo de o sosano moi , ma ngale Una iwisisala de iwikalaki ma gubernurka .

text: And they asked him , saying , Master , we know that thou sayest and teachest rightly , neither acceptest thou the person of any , but teachest the way of God truly :
text2: So ona yababaja magena yahino de itemo Unaka , " Baba Guru , ngomi mianako igogou Ngona nadedemo de nasidoto itiai nagoonaka bato maro o kia o Gikimoi Awi dupa bilasu paaka .

text: Is it lawful for us to give tribute unto Caesar , or no ?
text2: Komagena so hika nomisingangasu , ka qaloha o balastengi pofangu ma Kolano Wilalamo ma Kaisarka , eko upa . "

text: But he perceived their craftiness , and said unto them , Why tempt ye me ?
text2: Duma o Yesus wanako to ona manga sihaga so wotemo ona magenaka ,

text: Shew me a penny . Whose image and superscription hath it ? They answered and said , Caesar ' s .
text2: " Hika niaahono la tanano o pipi ngai moi . Ma dulada de ma lefo to naguuna manena . " De ona yosango itemo , " To ma Kaisar awi dulada de awi lefo . "

text: And he said unto them , Render therefore unto Caesar the things which be Caesar ' s , and unto God the things which be God ' s .
text2: Kagena de Una wotemo , " So o kia naga la igogou to ma Kaisar gena bilasu niahike ma Kaisarka , de o kia naga la igogou to Gikimoi magena bilasu niahike o Gikimoika . "

text: And they could not take hold of his words before the people : and they marvelled at his answer , and held their peace .
text2: Kagena o bi nyawa manga simaka de ona Awi saturu magena ka Awi demo moi lo yaakuwa iwisabatolo . Awi demo magena yoise qabolo de ona yangodu yosawangi , so ona ka imapopongoka .

text: Then came to him certain of the Sadducees , which deny that there is any resurrection ; and they asked him ,
text2: O Sadukika ma nyawa yamuruo naga yahino o Yesuska , ma ngale manga edekati Una wisabatolo . Ona magena yopiricayawa o dodoto maro o nyawa isoneka de asa ioho kali , so wisano Unaka , de itemo komanena ,

text: Saying , Master , Moses wrote unto us , If any man ' s brother die , having a wife , and he die without children , that his brother should take his wife , and raise up seed unto his brother .
text2: " Baba Guru , o bobita o Musa walelefo ma ngale ngone inangoduka , nakoso yanau moi la wosone de o ngopa wamake waasi , bilasu ma nongoruku asa womikawi kali ma ria ma balo muna magena , la o ngopa yamake de o ngopa magena wisikagena imatero de ka ma ria wososone awi buo .

text: There were therefore seven brethren : and the first took a wife , and died without children .
text2: Kanaga idadika ona magena o gianongoru yatumudingika . Woriria wokawi qabolo duma awi ngopa ihiwasi de wosoneka .

text: And the second took her to wife , and he died childless .
text2: Bolo , de ma nongoruku womikawi kali ma ria ma balo magena , duma o ngopa yamake waasi de wosone kali .

text: And the third took her ; and in like manner the seven also : and they left no children , and died .
text2: Komagena idadi de imaaka imakoketero sidago ma nongoru yaruwange , de itagi gila - gila sidago ma bati awi gianongoru yatumudingi ma kawi ma mata - mataka , duma o ngopa yamake waasi de wosone kali .

text: Last of all the woman died also .
text2: De ma dodoguku o ngopeqeka muna magena lo mosoneka .

text: Therefore in the resurrection whose wife of them is she ? for seven had her to wife .
text2: So ma orasi imasidiado o nyawa isosone ioho kali done naguuna womasipeqeka . Ena momongo , yatumudingi magena yangodu makawika . "

text: And Jesus answering said unto them , The children of this world marry , and are given in marriage :
text2: Kagena de Una wosango wotemo , " O bi nyawa o dunia manenaka imasipeqeka de lo imasiroka .

text: But they which shall be accounted worthy to obtain that world , and the resurrection from the dead , neither marry , nor are given in marriage :
text2: Duma o nyawa isosoneka la o Gikimoi wahiri itiaika bilasu o orasi ma simaka o dunia qamomuaneka de ioho kali , ona magena he ikawi kawa .

text: Neither can they die any more : for they are equal unto the angels ; and are the children of God , being the children of the resurrection .
text2: Sababu ona magena ioho maro o malaikat , so komagena ona lo asa isone kawa . Ona magena o Gikimoi Awi ngopa - ngopa , sababu Una wasioho kali .

text: Now that the dead are raised , even Moses shewed at the bush , when he calleth the Lord the God of Abraham , and the God of Isaac , and the God of Jacob .
text2: De lo ma ngale o nyawa isosoneka yasioho kali , o Musa awi lefo ma rabaka wosikelelo itiai o nyawa asa ioho kali . Ena gena , o jarita ma ngale o ngangaru de o uku ma sora duma o ngangaru magena qaukuwa . Ma orasi magegena o Jou Gikimoi Una magena wipeto ' o Abraham awi Gikimoi , o Ishak awi Gikimoi , de lo o Yakub awi Gikimoi . '

text: For he is not a God of the dead , but of the living : for all live unto him .
text2: So bilasu o demo magena niasahe o Abraham , o Ishak , de lo o Yakub ngaroko iqoqomaka yosoneka , duma ona ka yooho . Sababu upa o nyawa isosone la o Gikimoi wisuba , duma o nyawa iooho gena ka wisuba - subasi . To Una Awi simaka o bi nyawa yangodu ka yoooho . "

text: Then certain of the scribes answering said , Master , thou hast well said .
text2: So qabolo de o guru agama yamuruo naga yotemo Unaka , " Baba Guru , Ani sango gena foloi qaloha bai ! "

text: And after that they durst not ask him any question at all .
text2: Kagena de o nyawa moi lo yobarani kawa wisano Unaka .

text: And he said unto them , How say they that Christ is David ' s son ?
text2: So o Yesus wotemo o bi guru agama ona magenaka , " Qadoohaso aku nitemo o Salamati ma Kolano Una magena Awi sihino o Daud awi ahelino .

text: David therefore calleth him Lord , how is he then his son ?
text2: Salanta o Daud masirete lo de o Gurumi Qatetebi ma kuasa sidago lo wipeto Unaka ' Ai Jou ' . Kanaga isilefo o Mazmur ma Bukuka o Daud wotemo , ' O Jou Gikimoi wotemo ai Jouka : Nomatamiye to Ngohi Ai girinaka la Ai horomati namake sidago Ani saturu taaka la yahino inisuba Ngonaka . ' So nakoso igogou o Daud wiaso Una awi Jou , done imaaka idodooha so ona itemo , o Salamati ma Kolano Awi aheli ma sihino o Daudno . "

text: Then in the audience of all the people he said unto his disciples ,
text2: Ma orasi o bi nyawa ona magena kanaga o Yesus Awi demo yoise , de Una watemo wimomote ona magenaka ,

text: Beware of the scribes , which desire to walk in long robes , and love greetings in the markets , and the highest seats in the synagogues , and the chief rooms at feasts ;
text2: " Nimasisitiari o bi guru agama ona magena . Ona yodupa manga juba ikukuruku imasitibaka de itagi yakahika o pasarka la o nyawa yahoromati . Ona magena lo yodupa imatami ma simaka o puji ma tahuka de lo o rarame ma rabaka , la ma ngale o nyawa yakelelo bai !

text: Which devour widows ' houses , and for a shew make long prayers : the same shall receive greater damnation .
text2: Ona magena o ngopeqeka ibabalo yasihaga de o damato yasiosi so ma duuru de manga tahu lo yakooraka . Ma ngale manga sala de manga dorou yodidu , so ona isumbayang de ma demo yakuru - kuru la o nyawa yasigiliri . Igogou , totemo nginika ! Done to ona manga manara magena o Gikimoi wafanggali qatubuso icarawa . "

text: And he looked up , and saw the rich men casting their gifts into the treasury .
text2: O Gikimoi Awi Tahu ma rabaka o Yesus watailako o nyawa ikakaya manga suba yongado o boruaku .

text: And he saw also a certain poor widow casting in thither two mites .
text2: De lo womikelelo kagena o ngopeqeka mobabalo moi de mosususa lo mahino . Muna lo ami suba matota , kodo , cawali o pipi o tembaga o sengi sinoto .

text: And he said , Of a truth I say unto you , that this poor widow hath cast in more than they all :
text2: De Una wotemo , " Niakelelo ! Nginika tinisingangasu igogou , mobabalo mosususa magena mongado foloi ilamo , nako positetero de o nyawa yangodu manga suba o boruaku yongangado gena .

text: For all these have of their abundance cast in unto the offerings of God : but she of her penury hath cast in all the living that she had .
text2: Sababu ona magena yahike ma sihino to ona manga arata eko manga pipi yadodiahi ma soohuka . Duma mobabalo muna magena ami arata ihiwa , so cawali kamagena de ma ngale ami oho so magena lo mahikeka . "

text: And as some spake of the temple , how it was adorned with goodly stones and gifts , he said ,
text2: O orasi magena kanaga o nyawa itemo o Yesuska , " Pei ! O Gikimoi Awi Tahu ilalamo manena qaloha icarawa ! O bi teto qaloha idadi ma paramata de lo yadiahi qaloha o bi kia naga isisusuba o Gikimoika . " Komagena so Una wotemo ,

text: As for these things which ye behold , the days will come , in the which there shall not be left one stone upon another , that shall not be thrown down .
text2: " Done ma orasi asa imasidiado , de o bi moi - moi kagena niakokelelo qangodu magena asa iruba de ituraba , so o tahu - tahu magena ma teto o ngai moi lo asa imalapangawa de o teto ma somoa . "

text: And they asked him , saying , Master , but when shall these things be ? and what sign will there be when these things shall come to pass ?
text2: Kagena de o Yesus Awi muri - muri wisano Unaka itemo , " Baba Guru , hika nomisingangasu muruoka asa o hali notetemo magena idadi . De lo nomisidumu o nonako o kia idadi nakoso ma orasi imasidiado . "

text: And he said , Take heed that ye be not deceived : for many shall come in my name , saying , I am Christ ; and the time draweth near : go ye not therefore after them .
text2: Una wasango onaka wotemo , " Nimasitiari qaloha , upa sidago ngini inisihaga . Sababu o nyawa yadadala asa yahino de itemo , ' Ngohi manena qabolo o Salamati ma Kolano , ' de lo ' Ma orasi he idumuka . ' Ngaroko komagena , duma upa ona niamote .

text: But when ye shall hear of wars and commotions , be not terrified : for these things must first come to pass ; but the end is not by and by .
text2: So nakoso niise o habari ma ngale o kudoti de lo o gangamo isigoko gena , upa lo nimodo . O moi - moi magena bilasu idadi iqoma , duma upa nitemo magena o dunia ma dodogu ma orasi imasidiadoka . "

text: Then said he unto them , Nation shall rise against nation , and kingdom against kingdom :
text2: Kagena de Una wosingangasu wotemo , " O bangsa moi yasaturu o bangsa ma somoa , o kolano moi asa yakudoti o kolano ma somoa .

text: And great earthquakes shall be in divers places , and famines , and pestilences ; and fearful sights and great signs shall there be from heaven .
text2: Kiaka o dunia ma qokuka asa idadi o osu de o diwotu de lo kiaka bato o bare so o ino asa ihiwa de lo o panyake qatotubuso . De o dipaka lo asa idadi o bi nonako pomomodo ma bio idala .

text: But before all these , they shall lay their hands on you , and persecute you , delivering you up to the synagogues , and into prisons , being brought before kings and rulers for my name ' s sake .
text2: Duma qangodu magena idadi waasi , de ngini asa nitago , de nisangisara , de lo ningaho o bi puji ma tahuka de o bi buika . De lo ngini asa ningaho o kolanoka eko o bobaretaka ma sababu ngini to Ngohi Ai nyawa nimomote .

text: And it shall turn to you for a testimony .
text2: Gena ka orasi moi la ma ngale to ngini nia piricaya Ngohika gena niasingangasu onaka .

text: Settle it therefore in your hearts , not to meditate before what ye shall answer :
text2: De nia sininga nisiputuru kasi , la ma ngale ngini masirete o kia bato nisinako itiai gena upa he nia sininga isusa .

text: For I will give you a mouth and wisdom , which all your adversaries shall not be able to gainsay nor resist .
text2: Sababu Ngohi masirete asa o demo ma buturu de lo o cawaro gena tinihike itiai nginika , sidago nia saturu moi lo yaakuwa o kia naga nitetemo gena yasango eko isiholu .

text: And ye shall be hated of all men for my name ' s sake .
text2: O orasi magena de ngini manena o nyawa yangodu asa niduhudu sababu ngini Ngohi nimomote . Done asa idadi to ngini nia baba de nia awa , nia gianongoru , de lo nia dodiao inisidoa nia saturuka , de nimuruo naga asa initooma .

text: But there shall not an hair of your head perish .
text2: Duma igogou o kia naga moi lo upa idadi nginika , nia hutu nia saheka ngai moi lo done asa isisawa .

text: In your patience possess ye your souls .
text2: Duma nakoso ngini nia piricaya Ngohika qaputuru sidago o dunia ma dodogu imasidiado , igogou ngini magena done asa o oho ikokakali niamake . "

text: And when ye shall see Jerusalem compassed with armies , then know that the desolation thereof is nigh .
text2: " Ma orasika asa niakelelo o Yerusalem isigilolino gena o saturu ma prajurit , de ngini asa nianako , igogou iteka kawa de o doku manena asa isituraba .

text: Then let them which are in Judaea flee to the mountains ; and let them which are in the midst of it depart out ; and let not them that are in the countries enter thereinto .
text2: So nakoso niakelelo , de nagoona o Yudea ma daeraka bilasu yoloqa o talaye . Nagoona kanaga kota ma rabaka lo bilasu ka yodoloqa , de lo nagoona kanaga o kota ma duduka upa he iwosa o kota ma rabaka .

text: For these be the days of vengeance , that all things which are written may be fulfilled .
text2: Sababu o orasi magena o Gikimoi Awi saturu wasangisara , ena gena ma orasi yaadoka , la o bi moi - moi isilelefo to Una Awi Jaji ma Buku ma rabaka qangodu asa isiganapu .

text: But woe unto them that are with child , and to them that give suck , in those days ! for there shall be great distress in the land , and wrath upon this people .
text2: De yasibodito ilamo o bi ngopeqeka yatotilibuka de o bi awa la manga ngopa ka yasusususi . Kodo ! Isusa ona yoloqa . Sababu igogou asa idadi o sangisara ilalamo o Gikimoino o doku qangodu de lo ma nyawaka .

text: And they shall fall by the edge of the sword , and shall be led away captive into all nations : and Jerusalem shall be trodden down of the Gentiles , until the times of the Gentiles be fulfilled .
text2: Ona ma binuka asa yatooma de o sumarangi . Ma binukali asa yatago de yangaho o bi bangsa ma somoaka , ena gena o Yahudi ma bi nyawa yasowo . De o Yerusalem ma doku magena done asa yasidipito de lo yabidoto , sidago ma orasi o Gikimoi wasitatapu onaka , gena yaado so isiganapuka . "

text: And there shall be signs in the sun , and in the moon , and in the stars ; and upon the earth distress of nations , with perplexity ; the sea and the waves roaring ;
text2: " O orasi magenaka asa o wange , de o ngoosa , de lo o bi ngoma o dipaka kanaga o nonako pakelelo . O bi bangsa yangodu asa manga sininga isusa de lo igamamu icarawa yoise o teoka o moku - moku de o bao imakataga ma kuguru .

text: Men ' s hearts failing them for fear , and for looking after those things which are coming on the earth : for the powers of heaven shall be shaken .
text2: Sidago o nyawa asa yatodoka de yomodo so yosone , yakelelo o kia naga idadadi o dunia ma sigilolika . Sababu o dipa lo ihiti so o moi - moi qangodu o dipaka ma dodagi he yamote kawa .

text: And then shall they see the Son of man coming in a cloud with power and great glory .
text2: Ma orasi magena de asa o bi nyawa yangodu Ngohi , o Nyawa ma Duhutu , ikelelo tahino touti o lobi - lobi ma rabaku de to Ngohi Ai mulia ma siwa tomasisaoka de Ai kuasa ma buturu .

text: And when these things begin to come to pass , then look up , and lift up your heads ; for your redemption draweth nigh .
text2: Nakoso o orasi magena isolano o bi moi - moi qangodu idadi , de ngini nia sininga nisiputuru de lo nimamataga , sababu ma orasi he imasidiado to ngini nia sangisarano asa inipalako . "

text: And he spake to them a parable ; Behold the fig tree , and all the trees ;
text2: Qabolo de o Yesus wosiade - ade wotemo onaka , " Niatailako o ara ma hutu de lo o gota ma hutu ma somoaka .

text: When they now shoot forth , ye see and know of your own selves that summer is now nigh at hand .
text2: Nakoso niakelelo itoori de lo iboboko , magena inisinonako o ogo ilalamo idumuka .

text: So likewise ye , when ye see these things come to pass , know ye that the kingdom of God is nigh at hand .
text2: Komagena lo nakoso o susa de o sangisara qangodu Ngohi tododedemoka la idadi gena , nianako ma orasi he idumuka o Gikimoi asa wopareta maro o kolano moi o duniaka .

text: Verily I say unto you , This generation shall not pass away , till all be fulfilled .
text2: So ngini tinisingangasu igogou , o nyawa yangodu iooho manena isone waasi , de o bi sangisara ma hali moi - moi manena done asa idadi de imaaka .

text: Heaven and earth shall pass away : but my words shall not pass away .
text2: So o dipa de o tona asa isisa de qalutu , duma Ai demo de Ai dodoto asa itagi gila - gila de ma dodogu ihiwa . "

text: And take heed to yourselves , lest at any time your hearts be overcharged with surfeiting , and drunkenness , and cares of this life , and so that day come upon you unawares .
text2: " Nimajaga qaloha , upa sidago ngini nirame - rame ifoloi de nidalu , eko o orasi isigeto - geto niosininga ka nia oho o duniaka , sidago done Ai wange Ngohi tahino kali gena inisitodokano de ngini nimasidailako waasi .

text: For as a snare shall it come on all them that dwell on the face of the whole earth .
text2: Sababu Ai wangeka magena asa o bi nyawa yangoduka yatodoka , maro o haiwani moi qatodoka de o sabatolo .

text: Watch ye therefore , and pray always , that ye may be accounted worthy to escape all these things that shall come to pass , and to stand before the Son of man .
text2: So bilasu ngini salalu nimajaga de nia dailakoka , de lo niwigolo o Gikimoika la ngini asa niamoku niputuru o sangisara qangodu kiaka asa idadadi gena , sidago aku Ngohi o Nyawa ma Duhutuka nirisima . "

text: And in the day time he was teaching in the temple ; and at night he went out , and abode in the mount that is called the mount of Olives .
text2: O orasi magena o wangeka gena o Yesus wodoto o Gikimoi Awi Tahuka , de qaputuku Una womasihoika o kota magenano , de wotagi womasidodogu o Zaitun ma Talaka .

text: And all the people came early in the morning to him in the temple , for to hear him .
text2: De o goginita isigeto - geto o bi nyawa yadadala yotagi o Gikimoi Awi Tahuka imatolomu yodupa yoise to Una Awi dodoto .

text: Now the feast of unleavened bread drew nigh , which is called the Passover .
text2: O Roti ma Ragi Ihihiwa ma Rarame he idumu , gena isironga lo o Paskah ma Wange ma Rarame .

text: And the chief priests and scribes sought how they might kill him ; for they feared the people .
text2: O imamka ma bi sahe de o bi guru agama , sababu yamodo o nyawa yadadalaka , so ona manga edekati o ngeko isisari ma ngale o Yesus witago de witooma .

text: Then entered Satan into Judas surnamed Iscariot , being of the number of the twelve .
text2: Kagena de o Yudas wisironga lo o Iskariot , o muri moi o Yesus Awi muri yamogiowo de sinoto manga dongirabano , una magenaka o Iblis asa wingosa de iwipareta .

text: And he went his way , and communed with the chief priests and captains , how he might betray him unto them .
text2: So wotagi de imatekebicara de o imamka ma bi sahe de lo o Gikimoi Awi Tahu yojojajaga ma ngale ma ngeko idodooha o Yesus iwisiija .

text: And they were glad , and covenanted to give him money .
text2: So ona magena manga sininga imore de qanali de wisijaji asa o pipi wihike unaka .

text: And he promised , and sought opportunity to betray him unto them in the absence of the multitude .
text2: Una wosimote so kagena de wosolano o ngeko wosisari la o Yesus wisiija , de o nyawa yadadala ona magena moiwa yanako .

text: Then came the day of unleavened bread , when the passover must be killed .
text2: O orasi o Roti ma Ragi Ihihiwa ma Rarame imasidiadoka , de o wange ma nonomaka magena o Paskah ma duba - duba ma goho yatola .

text: And he sent Peter and John , saying , Go and prepare us the passover , that we may eat .
text2: O Yesus waaso o Petrus de o Yohanes , de wasulo onaka , " Nitagi la to ngone nanga Paskah ma ino nisidailako . "

text: And they said unto him , Where wilt thou that we prepare ?
text2: De ona yosano Unaka , " Baba , kiaka nodupa ngomi misidailako . "

text: And he said unto them , Behold , when ye are entered into the city , there shall a man meet you , bearing a pitcher of water ; follow him into the house where he entereth in .
text2: So wotemo onaka , " Ma orasi ngini kadoka niwosa o dokuka , done o nyawa moi niwimake o rube de ma akeka waaho . Una magena niwimote - mote sidago o tahu kiaka wowosa ,

text: And ye shall say unto the goodman of the house , The Master saith unto thee , Where is the guestchamber , where I shall eat the passover with my disciples ?
text2: de nitemo o tahu ma duhutu magenaka , ' Baba Guru wosano , o ngihi kiaka Una de Awi muri - muri asa ioqo o Paskah ma ino . '

text: And he shall shew you a large upper room furnished : there make ready .
text2: So o nyawa una magena asa wasidumu kadaku ma qokuka o ngihi moi ilalamo . Nako ma ngihi magena isidiahi de isidailako qaboloka , ma meja de ma bako lo isifatoka . Kagena o ino nisidailako ma ngale ngone inangodu . "

text: And they went , and found as he had said unto them : and they made ready the passover .
text2: Kagena de ona yotagi de kadoka ona yamake maro o kia Una wotetemo . So ona asa isidailako o Paskah ma ino magena .

text: And when the hour was come , he sat down , and the twelve apostles with him .
text2: La qaputuku o tahu magenaka o Yesus de Awi muri yamogiowo de sinoto yogogeku yooqo .

text: And he said unto them , With desire I have desired to eat this passover with you before I suffer :
text2: De Una wotemo onaka , " O susa de o sangisara tamake waasi de Ngohi foloi todupa tooqo o Paskah ma ino manena dede ngini .

text: For I say unto you , I will not any more eat thereof , until it be fulfilled in the kingdom of God .
text2: Sababu Ngohi totemo , igogou Ngohi asa tooqo kawa o Paskah ma ino manena sidago idadi la pooqoli done o orasi ma simaka , nakoso o Gikimoi wopareta maro o kolano moi o duniaka . "

text: And he took the cup , and gave thanks , and said , Take this , and divide it among yourselves :
text2: Kagena de Una o anggur ma udo - udo waqehe de Awi sukuru idola o Gikimoiye , de wotemo Awi muri - murika , " Manena niaqehe de nisitoku ,

text: For I say unto you , I will not drink of the fruit of the vine , until the kingdom of God shall come .
text2: sababu o orasi manena Ngohi totemo nginika , o orasi manena bato Ngohi done o anggur manena taudo kawa , sidago ma orasi imasidiadoka o Gikimoi wodadi o kolano o dunia qamomuane ma raba kasi . "

text: And he took bread , and gave thanks , and brake it , and gave unto them , saying , This is my body which is given for you : this do in remembrance of me .
text2: Qabolo de Una magena kanaga o roti waqehe so Awi sukuru watide o Gikimoiye . Qabolo de o roti magena watepi - tepi de to Una Awi gia , de gila - gila Awi muri - murika wasitoku de wotemo , " Manena to Ngohi Ai rohe ( ( ma ngale ngini gena tinihikeka . Magena niaaka maro o sosininga moi Ngohika . "

text: Likewise also the cup after supper , saying , This cup is the new testament in my blood , which is shed for you .
text2: De komagena lo yooqo qabolo , de Una magena kanaga o anggur ma udo - udo waqehe de wotemo , " O udo - udo manena ma ngale to Ngohi Ai au ikokopola gena ma meta nginika , inisinako igogou o Gikimoi Awi jaji qamomuane . ) )

text: But , behold , the hand of him that betrayeth me is with me on the table .
text2: Duma nianano ! Naguuna done asa woisiiija Ngohi , una magena kanaga Ai dateka de wooqo dede Ngohi bai !

text: And truly the Son of man goeth , as it was determined : but woe unto that man by whom he is betrayed !
text2: Igogou , Ngohi o Nyawa ma Duhutu manena asa tosone maro o kia o Gikimoi wositatapuka . Duma naguuna woisiiija Ngohi , kodo , o nyawa una magena awi bodito qatubuso ! "

text: And they began to inquire among themselves , which of them it was that should do this thing .
text2: O demo magena yoise , so Awi muri - muri imakokasano manga sidongirabano naguuna sidago asa waaka komagena .

text: And there was also a strife among them , which of them should be accounted the greatest .
text2: Kagena de o Yesus Awi muri - muri imatekesikoholu moi de moika , ma ngale to ona manga sidongirabaka naguuna wieto ifoloi wolamo .

text: And he said unto them , The kings of the Gentiles exercise lordship over them ; and they that exercise authority upon them are called benefactors .
text2: So Una wotemo onaka , " Ngini ningodu nianako o Yahudika ma nyawa yasowo manga bobareta to ona manga kawasa yasidipito so manga oho isangisara . De o bobareta ngaroko yosidipito , duma ona magena yodupa ka yaaso ' ona la kanaga de manga sininga ma loha o kawasaka ' .

text: But ye shall not be so : but he that is greatest among you , let him be as the younger ; and he that is chief , as he that doth serve .
text2: Duma ngini upa komagena . Kanaga o ngeko moili , nagoona yodupa yolamo to ngini nia sidongirabaka ona magena bilasu imahadoku . De nagoona yopopareta ona magena bilasu ileleleani nginika .

text: For whether is greater , he that sitteth at meat , or he that serveth ? is not he that sitteth at meat ? but I am among you as he that serveth .
text2: Upa ngini nitemo o nyawa nagoona ifoloi yolamo gena , ona magena la kanaga o nyawa yaleleani , duma igogou ona la yogogogeku o mejaka de yooqo . Ngaroko komagena , duma Ngohi kanaga to ngini nia sidongirabaka maro ka o nyawa ileleleani moi nginika .

text: Ye are they which have continued with me in my temptations .
text2: Ngini manena , to Ngohi Ai susa qangodu ma rabaka ngini salalu dede Ngohi .

text: And I appoint unto you a kingdom , as my Father hath appointed unto me ;
text2: So maro Ai Baba Awi kuasa woihike Ngohika la Ngohi topareta , komagena lo Ngohi Ai kuasa asa tinihike nginika la ngini lo aku nipareta .

text: That ye may eat and drink at my table in my kingdom , and sit on thrones judging the twelve tribes of Israel .
text2: Komagena so done ma orasi Ngohi todadi o Kolano to Ngohi Ai pareta ma rabaka , de ngini lo asa nikoro la nioqo de porarame dede Ngohi , de lo asa nimatamiye o bi pareta ma kursika ma ngale o Israelka manga soa yamogiowo de sinoto gena niapareta . "

text: And the Lord said , Simon , Simon , behold , Satan hath desired to have you , that he may sift you as wheat :
text2: Qabolo de o Jou Yesus wobicara o Simon Petruska wotemo , " Simon , Ngohi tonisingangasu , o Iblis wogolo de o Gikimoi iwisimaha unaka la ngini ningodu winibaja , maro wotototoro moi o tamo wataqo de o tamo ma soora gena asa waumo .

text: But I have prayed for thee , that thy faith fail not : and when thou art converted , strengthen thy brethren .
text2: Duma Ngohi manena tosumbayang ma ngale ngona , la ani piricaya asa upa isisa . So done ani piricaya gena qaputuru kali , de ngona bilasu ani dodiao manga sininga gena nosiputuru . "

text: And he said unto him , Lord , I am ready to go with thee , both into prison , and to death .
text2: De o Petrus wotemo , " Jou , ngaroko ngohi bilasu ibui eko lo itooma , duma ngohi igogou ka tonimote Ngona bai ! "

text: And he said , I tell thee , Peter , the cock shall not crow this day , before that thou shalt thrice deny that thou knowest me .
text2: So kagena de o Yesus wotemo , " Petrus , Ngohi tonisingangasu ngonaka , sutusi qaputuka o toko isore waasi , de igogou ngona asa o nyawa manga simaka nomanosu notemo Ngohi noinakowa sidago lo ma para ma saange . "

text: And he said unto them , When I sent you without purse , and scrip , and shoes , lacked ye any thing ? And they said , Nothing .
text2: Qabolo de o Yesus watemo onaka , " Kangano ma orasi Ngohi tinisulo ngini la nitagi o habari qaloloha nisihabari , de Ngohi asa tinisimahawa ngini nimagaho o pipi , eko lo o baro , eko o tarupa o sabi sinoto . Idodooha ngini kanaga niakurangi . " Ona yosango , " Hiwa ! "

text: Then said he unto them , But now , he that hath a purse , let him take it , and likewise his scrip : and he that hath no sword , let him sell his garment , and buy one .
text2: Kagena de Una wotemo , " Ngaroko komagena , o orasi manena la nagoona kanaga de nia pipi , eko lo o baro de o maru bilasu nimagaho . De lo nagoona la kanaga nia sumarangi ihiwa , hika nia baju nisiija la o sumarangi moi nimaija .

text: For I say unto you , that this that is written must yet be accomplished in me , And he was reckoned among the transgressors : for the things concerning me have an end .
text2: Sababu kanaga isilelefo o Gikimoi Awi Jaji ma Buku ma rabaka itemo , ' Asa o Salamati ma Kolano wieto maro o nyawa ma dorou moi . ' De o kia naga isilelefo gena bilasu idadi Ngohika , sababu o kia naga ma ngale Ngohi manena isingangasu iqomaka isilelefo o Gikimoi Awi Jaji ma Buku ma rabaka , magena o orasi manena he idadi . "

text: And they said , Lord , behold , here are two swords . And he said unto them , It is enough .
text2: De ona itemo , " Jou , nonano kanena naga ngomika o sumarangi ngai sinoto . " Una wotemo , " Qalohaka ! "

text: And he came out , and went , as he was wont , to the mount of Olives ; and his disciples also followed him .
text2: So qabolo de o Yesus o dokuka womahoika , de maro Awi biasa moi so wotagi kali o Zaitun ma Talaka , de lo Awi muri - muri wimote .

text: And when he was at the place , he said unto them , Pray that ye enter not into temptation .
text2: So kagena imasidiadoka , de Una wotemo onaka , " Nisumbayang la nigolo upa sidago o babajaku nitura . "

text: And he was withdrawn from them about a stone ' s cast , and kneeled down , and prayed ,
text2: La Una womatinga sutu ikuruka , de o tonaku wobukuku de wosumbayang ,

text: Saying , Father , if thou be willing , remove this cup from me : nevertheless not my will , but thine , be done .
text2: de wotemo , " Ya Baba , nako yaaku , tanu natide la noisitilaku o sangisara ma ngeko manena . Duma upa namote to Ngohi Ai sininga ma dupa manena , la tanu idadi de imaaka ka to Ngona Ani sininga ma dupa . " ( (

text: And there appeared an angel unto him from heaven , strengthening him .
text2: Kagena de o malaikat moi o sorogano wahino Unaka de iwisiputuru .

text: And being in an agony he prayed more earnestly : and his sweat was as it were great drops of blood falling down to the ground .
text2: Una Awi siningaka wamalo qatubuso de isangisara sidago lo Una bilasu wosumbayang . Una Awi galasahu imatero maro o au itutu - tutu o tonaku . ) )

text: And when he rose up from prayer , and was come to his disciples , he found them sleeping for sorrow ,
text2: Wosumbayang qaboloka , de Una womaokoye de wokahino Awi muri - murino , de wamake ona yakioloka , sababu ma ngale manga sininga foloi ipeleso so ona ikakadu poli .

text: And said unto them , Why sleep ye ? rise and pray , lest ye enter into temptation .
text2: So kagena de Una wotemo onaka , " He ! Kiaso ngini nikiolo . Boloka ! Nimomi , la nisumbayang de nigolo upa sidago o babajaku nitura . "

text: And while he yet spake , behold a multitude , and he that was called Judas , one of the twelve , went before them , and drew near unto Jesus to kiss him .
text2: Ma orasi o Yesus wobobicarasi , de imatodoka o nyawa yadadala imasidiado . De lo o Yudas , Awi muri moi yamogiowo de sinoto manga sidongirabano , una magena ona wangaho . Ona imasidiadoka , de o Yudas wotagi o Yesuska , wodupa witabea de wihame .

text: But Jesus said unto him , Judas , betrayest thou the Son of man with a kiss ?
text2: Duma o Yesus wotemo unaka , " He , Yudas ! So de ani hame gena ngona nodupa noisiija Ngohi , o Nyawa ma Duhutu ! "

text: When they which were about him saw what would follow , they said unto him , Lord , shall we smite with the sword ?
text2: Ma orasi Awi muri - muri ona magena yakelelo o kia naga asa idadi , de ona itemo , " Jou , to ngomi kanaga de mia sumarangi ! "

text: And one of them smote the servant of the high priest , and cut off his right ear .
text2: Ato iwitago , de kagena o nyawa moi wisioto ma Imam Wilalamo awi gilalo moika , so awi ngau ma girinaka lo waturaka .

text: And Jesus answered and said , Suffer ye thus far . And he touched his ear , and healed him .
text2: De o Yesus wotemo , " Boloka ! " So Una wapaqa o nyawa una magena awi ngauka so wosiloha kali .

text: Then Jesus said unto the chief priests , and captains of the temple , and the elders , which were come to him , Be ye come out , as against a thief , with swords and staves ?
text2: Qabolo de o imamka ma bi sahe de lo o Gikimoi Awi Tahu yojajagaka nonena yahino la o Yesus iwitago , de Una wotemo onaka , " Qadoohaso ngini niaka maro Ngohi o nyawa ma dorou , sidago niahino o gogipongo de o sumarangi nigaho la Ngohi nitago .

text: When I was daily with you in the temple , ye stretched forth no hands against me : but this is your hour , and the power of darkness .
text2: O wange isigeto - geto Ngohi todoto o Gikimoi Awi Tahuka de to ngini nia simaka , de qadoohaso Ngohi nitagowa . Duma o orasi manena idadi nginika de o bubutu ma kuasa so o dorou niaaka . "

text: Then took they him , and led him , and brought him into the high priest ' s house . And Peter followed afar off .
text2: So o nyawa ona magena o Yesus iwitago de iwingaho ma Imam Wilalamo awi tahuka . O Petrus manga duduno wototuuru o Yesus iwimote .

text: And when they had kindled a fire in the midst of the hall , and were set down together , Peter sat down among them .
text2: O loloha magena ma sidongirabaka o uku itatahu la ma dateka imarahu isigilolino , de o Petrus lo kagena wogogeku dede ona .

text: But a certain maid beheld him as he sat by the fire , and earnestly looked upon him , and said , This man was also with him .
text2: Kanaga o ngopeqeka moi moleleleani ma Imam Wilalamoka mowikelelo o Petrus kagena womararahu , de mowinako so motemo , " O nyawa una magena o Yesus wimomote moi ! "

text: And he denied him , saying , Woman , I know him not .
text2: Duma una womanosu de wotemo moleleleanika , " Ngohi towinakowa o nyawa Una magena ! "

text: And after a little while another saw him , and said , Thou art also of them . And Peter said , Man , I am not .
text2: Itekawa , de o nyawa moili wikelelo de itemo , " He ! Nagala ngona manena lo Una nowimomote . " Duma o Petrus wotemo kali , " Hiwa ! "

text: And about the space of one hour after another confidently affirmed , saying , Of a truth this fellow also was with him : for he is a Galilaean .
text2: Done nagala o orasi moi ipasaka , de o nyawa moili wotemo , " Igogou , una manena to Yesus Awi dodiao moi , sababu una lo o Galilea ma nyawa . "

text: And Peter said , Man , I know not what thou sayest . And immediately , while he yet spake , the cock crew .
text2: Kagena de o Petrus wotemo , " Ngohi tanakowa o kia ngona notetemo gena ! " O orasi magena qabolo una ka wobicarasi , de o toko isore ,

text: And the Lord turned , and looked upon Peter . And Peter remembered the word of the Lord , how he had said unto him , Before the cock crow , thou shalt deny me thrice .
text2: de o Jou womabulutu de winano o Petruska . De o Petrus gena womasininga igogou ma nonomasi o Jou asa wisitemo qabolo unaka , " O toko isore waasi , de ngona he nomanosu nosipara ma saange . "

text: And Peter went out , and wept bitterly .
text2: La una wosupu de woari wosodu - sodu .

text: And the men that held Jesus mocked him , and smote him .
text2: O bi nyawa o Yesus witatago ona magena iwisiihe de iwingangapo ,

text: And when they had blindfolded him , they struck him on the face , and asked him , saying , Prophesy , who is it that smote thee ?
text2: de to Una Awi lako yapokuka , de yotemo , " Hika , nakoso Ngona o nabi moi , nomisingangasu naguuna woningapo ! "

text: And many other things blasphemously spake they against him .
text2: De kanagali o bi demo ma dorou idala wisiceke Unaka .

text: And as soon as it was day , the elders of the people and the chief priests and the scribes came together , and led him into their council , saying ,
text2: Ma orasi o goginita nosi , o Mahkamah Agama ena gena o imamka ma bi sahe , de o bi guru agama , de lo o Yahudika manga roriri ma binukasi , ona yangodu imatolomuno de o Yesus iwingaho kagena ona manga simaka .

text: Art thou the Christ ? tell us . And he said unto them , If I tell you , ye will not believe :
text2: Ona magena wisano Unaka , " Nomisingangasu ngomika , igogou Ngona manena o Salamati ma Kolano ? " Una wosango , " Ngaroko lo Ngohi tinisingangasu nginika , duma ngini asa nipiricayawa .

text: And if I also ask you , ye will not answer me , nor let me go .
text2: De lo nakoso Ngohi tinisano nginika , de igogou ngini asa nisangowa .

text: Hereafter shall the Son of man sit on the right hand of the power of God .
text2: Duma ma orasi magena yaadoka , Ngohi o Nyawa ma Duhutu asa tomatamiye o Gikimoi Wokokuasa Awi girinaka . "

text: Then said they all , Art thou then the Son of God ? And he said unto them , Ye say that I am .
text2: De ona yangodu yotemo kali , " Nako komagena , de Ngona manena igogou o Gikimoi ma Ngopa ? " Kagena de Una wosango wotemo , " Iya ! Komagena maro kia ngini nitetemo . "

text: And they said , What need we any further witness ? for we ourselves have heard of his own mouth .
text2: De ona yotemo , " Upa he o saksi posari kali bai ! Ngone inangodu poise Awi sala Awi uruno masirete isupu . "

text: And the whole multitude of them arose , and led him unto Pilate .
text2: Qabolo de o Mahkamah Agama ona yangodu imaokoye , de o Yesus wingaho de witota ma Gubernur Pilatuska .

text: And they began to accuse him , saying , We found this fellow perverting the nation , and forbidding to give tribute to Caesar , saying that he himself is Christ a King .
text2: Kagena imasidiadoka , de ona iwikalaki Unaka yotemo , " O nyawa Una manena ngomi miwimake o kawasa wasigaro la o ngeko qasosowo yamote . Wotemo upa o balastengi pofangu ma Kolano Wilalamo ma Kaisarka , de lo wotemo Una masirete gena ma Kristus , ena gena o kolano moi . "

text: And Pilate asked him , saying , Art thou the King of the Jews ? And he answered him and said , Thou sayest it .
text2: So o Pilatus wisano Unaka , " So igogou Ngona manena o Yahudika manga kolano ? " De Una wotemo , " Iteroka , maro o kia ngona notetemoka . "

text: Then said Pilate to the chief priests and to the people , I find no fault in this man .
text2: So kagena de o Pilatus o imamka ma bi sahe de lo o bi nyawa yadadala magenaka wotemo , " O nyawa manena Awi sala ka moi lo tamakewa la bilasu wifanggali de o sangisara . "

text: And they were the more fierce , saying , He stirreth up the people , teaching throughout all Jewry , beginning from Galilee to this place .
text2: Duma ona ifoloi wigegegoli yotemo , " De Awi dodoto Una o kawasa wasigaro o Yahudika ma nyawa manga tona ma sigilolika . Ma nonomaka Una kanaga o Galileaka , duma o orasi manena Una wahino kanena . "

text: When Pilate heard of Galilee , he asked whether the man were a Galilaean .
text2: Magena o Pilatus woise , de una wosano , " O nyawa Una manena o Galilea ma nyawa ? "

text: And as soon as he knew that he belonged unto Herod ' s jurisdiction , he sent him to Herod , who himself also was at Jerusalem at that time .
text2: Ona itemo , " Iya , Una magena o Galilea ma nyawa . " O Pilatus woise komagena , de una awi nyawa wasulo la o Yesus wingaho de witota ma Kolano Herodeska , sababu o Herodes una magena o Galilea ma tona wapopareta , de lo o orasi magena una lo kanaga o Yerusalemka .

text: And when Herod saw Jesus , he was exceeding glad : for he was desirous to see him of a long season , because he had heard many things of him ; and he hoped to have seen some miracle done by him .
text2: O Herodes una magena wosanangi o Yesus wikelelo , sababu ma dekaka ma ngale o Yesus gena una woise de lo wodupa wimake . Una wongongano o Yesus o nonako ihahairani waaka la magena aku wakelelo .

text: Then he questioned with him in many words ; but he answered him nothing .
text2: Komagena so o sano idala wisano o Yesuska , duma o Yesus ka o demo moi lo wosangowa .

text: And the chief priests and scribes stood and vehemently accused him .
text2: O imamka ma bi sahe de lo o bi guru agama kagenadahu lo yongamo manga demo qatubuso ona iwikalaki Una .

text: And Herod with his men of war set him at nought , and mocked him , and arrayed him in a gorgeous robe , and sent him again to Pilate .
text2: Qabolo de o Herodes de awi prajurit - prajurit wikalekono de wisiihe o Yesuska . Ona o bi kolano manga juba iwisitibaku , qabolo de iwisitotali o Pilatuska .

text: And the same day Pilate and Herod were made friends together : for before they were at enmity between themselves .
text2: O wange magenaka idadi o Herodes de o Pilatus ona imatekelolohaka , ngaroko iqoqoma ona imakasaturu .

text: And Pilate , when he had called together the chief priests and the rulers and the people ,
text2: Kagena de o Pilatus watolomu o imamka ma bi sahe de o Yahudika ma roriri de lo ma kawasa ,

text: Said unto them , Ye have brought this man unto me , as one that perverteth the people : and , behold , I , having examined him before you , have found no fault in this man touching those things whereof ye accuse him :
text2: so wotemo onaka , " Ngini o nyawa Una manena niwingaho ngohika , de nitemo Una o kawasa wasigaro la o ngeko qasosowo yamote . O orasi manena to ngini nia simaka ngohi Una towitailako , duma ngohi gena Awi sala moi lo tamakewa maro kia ngini niwikokalakika .

text: No , nor yet Herod : for I sent you to him ; and , lo , nothing worthy of death is done unto him .
text2: Komagena lo o Herodes awi gamake , sababu magegena o Yesus gena wisidingo kali ngomino . Igogou , o nyawa Una manena o kia naga moi lo waakawa de ma ngale wisisala sidago bilasu witooma .

text: I will therefore chastise him , and release him .
text2: So ngohi asa tosulo la Una ka wingangapo , qabolo de bilasu Una towipalako . "

text: ( For of necessity he must release one unto them at the feast . )
text2: Sababu o Paskah ma Rarame imasidiado so bilasu o nyawa moi wipalako o bui ma tahuno , so o Pilatus wotemo asa o Yesus wipalako gena komagena . ) )

text: And they cried out all at once , saying , Away with this man , and release unto us Barabbas :
text2: Duma awi demo komagena yoise de yadadala ona magena imatoore , " Una nowitooma ! O Barabas nowipalako de nomihike ngomika ! "

text: ( Who for a certain sedition made in the city , and for murder , was cast into prison . )
text2: O Barabas una magena o bui ma rabaka wisingosaka , sababu iqomaka o kotaka o nyawa icanga o Roma ma bobaretaka de ma orasi magena una kanaga manga sidongirabaka de lo una wototooma moi .

text: Pilate therefore , willing to release Jesus , spake again to them .
text2: So o Pilatus wodupa o Yesus wipalako so wasano kali yadadala ona magenaka .

text: But they cried , saying , Crucify him , crucify him .
text2: Duma ona imatoore itemo , " Powisidasangahadi ! Powisidasangahadi ! "

text: And he said unto them the third time , Why , what evil hath he done ? I have found no cause of death in him : I will therefore chastise him , and let him go .
text2: Duma ma saangeka una wotemo onaka , " Asitagala ! Awi dorou o kia . Nakoso maro ngohi to Una Awi sala moi lo tamakewa de ma ngale wisisala sidago bilasu witooma . So ngohi asa tosulo la Una ka wingangapo , qabolo de bilasu Una towipalako . "

text: And they were instant with loud voices , requiring that he might be crucified . And the voices of them and of the chief priests prevailed .
text2: Duma ona ifoloi wigegego bilasu o Yesus iwisidasangahadi , sidago ma duuruka de ma ngale imatotoore so ma sopo magena ona aku yamake .

text: And Pilate gave sentence that it should be as they required .
text2: So manga sininga magena una wosimote o Yesus iwisidasangahadi .

text: And he released unto them him that for sedition and murder was cast into prison , whom they had desired ; but he delivered Jesus to their will .
text2: De lo o Barabas ona wigogolo gena wisisupu de wihike onaka , una magena o bui ma rabaka sababu iqomaka wocanga o Roma ma bobaretaka de lo wototooma moi . De o Yesus ka wisidoa o bi prajuritka la iwisidasangahadi , yamote to Yahudi ma nyawa manga dupa .

text: And as they led him away , they laid hold upon one Simon , a Cyrenian , coming out of the country , and on him they laid the cross , that he might bear it after Jesus .
text2: Kagena de o Yesus gena o bi prajurit iwingoso so itagi iwingahoka , so yahika o ngeko ma soaka , de o Kirene ma nyawa moi , awi ronga o Simon wimake . O nyawa una magena asa o soano wokahino de wokahika o kotaka , de wigegego o Yesus Awi sangahadi wamoku de o Yesus Awi duduno wototuuru .

text: And there followed him a great company of people , and of women , which also bewailed and lamented him .
text2: Kanaga manga duduno o bi nyawa yadadala gena itotuuru , de komagena lo manga sidongirabaka o bi ngopeqeka yamuruo naga . O ngopeqeka ona magena iari de lo idodora ma ngale Una .

text: But Jesus turning unto them said , Daughters of Jerusalem , weep not for me , but weep for yourselves , and for your children .
text2: Kagena de Una womakiliho de watemo onaka , " Awa - awa o Yerusalemno , kodo ! Upa Ngohi nisigari . Lebelaha nigari nia rohe masirete de lo nia ngopa - ngopa .

text: For , behold , the days are coming , in the which they shall say , Blessed are the barren , and the wombs that never bare , and the paps which never gave suck .
text2: Sababu done asa ma orasi yaado de o nyawa itemo , ' Igogou , o bi ngopeqeka la kanaga ma moi waasi yatilibu , so ma moi waasi ipuo , de lo onaka ma moi waasi o ngopa isusu , ona magena asa yosanangi bai ! '

text: Then shall they begin to say to the mountains , Fall on us ; and to the hills , Cover us .
text2: O orasi magenaka o nyawa asa o tala de o tetoka igolo de itemo , ' Hika nitura la nimitalake ngomiku ! '

text: For if they do these things in a green tree , what shall be done in the dry ?
text2: So o orasi manena ngaroko Ai sala moi lo ihiwa de ona iaka komanena Ngohika , duma done asa iniaka nginika foloisi qatubuso bai ! "

text: And there were also two other , malefactors , led with him to be put to death .
text2: Ma orasi o Yesus wingaho la wisidasangahadi , de kanagali o nyawa yasinoto ma somoa yangaho la yatooma ka ma moi dede Una . Ona yasinoto gena o nyawa ma dorou .
