text: And when they were come to the place , which is called Calvary , there they crucified him , and the malefactors , one on the right hand , and the other on the left .
text2: Itekawa , de ona imasidiado o riho moi ma ronga o Sahe ma Papala ma Riho , so kagena de gila - gila ona wisidasangahadi . De o orasi magena kanagali o nyawa ma dorou yasinoto gena yasidasangahadi ka o wange moi , so moi Una Awi girinaka de moili Awi gubalika .

text: Then said Jesus , Father , forgive them ; for they know not what they do . And they parted his raiment , and cast lots .
text2: De Una wosumbayang wotemo , " Baba , tanu ona nasiapongu ! O kia ona yaaaka gena ona yanakowa . " O bi prajurit o Yesus wisidodasangahadika , ona magena Awi baju imatekesikotoku yaaka moi - moi de manga gimina yamote o undi ma rabaka .

text: And the people stood beholding . And the rulers also with them derided him , saying , He saved others ; let him save himself , if he be Christ , the chosen of God .
text2: O bi nyawa yadadala yahino imaokono kagena de yotomina . Komagena lo o Yahudika manga roriri wisimaqe , de yotemo , " Cedeke ! O nyawa ma somoa wasisalamati , hika o orasi manena Una Awi rohe masirete de wosisalamati , nakoso igogou Una o Salamati ma Kolano o Gikimoi wihihirika . "

text: And the soldiers also mocked him , coming to him , and offering him vinegar ,
text2: O bi prajurit lo Una wisimaqe . Ona iwidateka de iwihike Unaka o anggur qakokiopi ,

text: And saying , If thou be the king of the Jews , save thyself .
text2: de yotemo , " Nakoso igogou Ngona o Yahudika manga Kolano , hika Ani rohe masirete so nosisalamati ! "

text: And a superscription also was written over him in letters of Greek , and Latin , and Hebrew , THIS IS THE KING OF THE JEWS .
text2: Awi sangahadika Awi sahe ma qokuye yalefo ma demo itemo : UNA MANENA O YAHUDIKA MANGA KOLANO .

text: And one of the malefactors which were hanged railed on him , saying , If thou be Christ , save thyself and us .
text2: De o nyawa ma dorou moi wisisasangahadi kagena womasimote Una wisibicara qatorou , de wotemo , " Cedeke ! Ka igogou Ngona o Salamati ma Kolano ? Nako komagena , hika Ani rohe masirete nosisalamati de komagena lo ngomi ! "

text: But the other answering rebuked him , saying , Dost not thou fear God , seeing thou art in the same condemnation ?
text2: Duma o nyawa ma dorou moili una magena awi dodiao gena wisidapano , wotemo unaka , " Awadede ! Bilasu ngona nowimodo o Gikimoika . Ngona lo nisisala so nitooma maro Una .

text: And we indeed justly ; for we receive the due reward of our deeds : but this man hath done nothing amiss .
text2: O sangisara ngone inasinoto gena , igogou kanaga inadahe de to ngone nanga manara . Duma Una gena Awi sala lo ihiwa . "

text: And he said unto Jesus , Lord , remember me when thou comest into thy kingdom .
text2: Qabolo de una wotemo , " Yesus , tanu noisininga ngohi , ma orasi Ngona nokolano ! "

text: And Jesus said unto him , Verily I say unto thee , To day shalt thou be with me in paradise .
text2: So o Yesus wotemo unaka , " Ngonaka igogou tonisingangasu , o wange manena qabolo ngona dede Ngohi o Firdaus ma rabaka . "

text: And it was about the sixth hour , and there was a darkness over all the earth until the ninth hour .
text2: La o wange itotiai , de o doku ma sigilolino magegena qapuputuka ma deka o orasi saange ,

text: And the sun was darkened , and the veil of the temple was rent in the midst .
text2: sababu o wange lo idadi qapuputuka . Ato imatodoka o baro isifafati o Gikimoi Awi Tahu ma rabaka gena iraca de ileta sinotoka .

text: And when Jesus had cried with a loud voice , he said , Father , into thy hands I commend my spirit : and having said thus , he gave up the ghost .
text2: Qabolo de o Yesus womatoore de wotemo , " Baba ! Ai gurumi tosisaraha Ani gia ma sohaka ! " Wotemo komagena , de wosoneka .

text: Now when the centurion saw what was done , he glorified God , saying , Certainly this was a righteous man .
text2: O prajurit - prajurit manga kapita moi o kia naga idadadi magena wakelelo , de una o Gikimoi wigiliri , de wotemo , " We ! O nyawa Una manena igogou Awi sala ihiwa ! "

text: And all the people that came together to that sight , beholding the things which were done , smote their breasts , and returned .
text2: Ona yahino yototomina gena o kia naga idadadi magena yakelelo , de ona yangodu asa yoliho de manga mamata masireteka yangangapo , ma ngale manga sininga foloi ipeleso .

text: And all his acquaintance , and the women that followed him from Galilee , stood afar off , beholding these things .
text2: Nako o nyawa Una winanako de lo o bi ngopeqeka ma orasi Una o Galilea ma dokuka so wimomote de wiriwoka , ona yangodu kagenadahu lo o kia naga idadadi magena qangodu yakelelo , gena ma soa sutu ikuruka .

text: ( The same had not consented to the counsel and deed of them ; ) he was of Arimathaea , a city of the Jews : who also himself waited for the kingdom of God .
text2: Kanaga o nyawa moi awi ronga o Yusuf o Arimatea ma dokuno o Yudea ma daeraka . Una magena o nyawa ma loha moi de lo wododamaha o Gikimoi Awi orasi wopareta maro o kolano moi . Ngaroko una lo o Mahkamah Agama ma nyawa moi , duma una wosimotewa manga edekati de manga manara magena ma ngale o Yesus bilasu witooma .

text: This man went unto Pilate , and begged the body of Jesus .
text2: O Yusuf una magena wahika o Pilatuska , de wagolo o Yesus Awi sone ma bake .

text: And he took it down , and wrapped it in linen , and laid it in a sepulchre that was hewn in stone , wherein never man before was laid .
text2: So una o sone ma bake magena waqeheka la de o baro qaaare wosisangika , qabolo de wapoosu o boosu moika , kiaka qamomuanesi yaaka o teto ma rabaka de o sone ma bake moi lo waasi yapoosu .

text: And that day was the preparation , and the sabbath drew on .
text2: Orasi magena he qamaqa - maqa , so ilangi o Sabat ma wange ma solanoka , so asa isimaha kawa o manara yaaka duma bilasu o nyawa imawoma .

text: And the women also , which came with him from Galilee , followed after , and beheld the sepulchre , and how his body was laid .
text2: Komagena so o bi ngopeqeka , o Yesus o Galileano wimomote , ona magena o Yusuf wisiduuru yahika o boosuka , de kagena ma rabaka yananano idodooha o Yesus wipoosu .

text: And they returned , and prepared spices and ointments ; and rested the sabbath day according to the commandment .
text2: Qabolo ona imajobo so yoliho o dokuka , de o bi rapa yosidailako ma ngale o Yesus Awi sone ma bake isimuja . Qaboloka , de o Sabat ma wange yaadoka , so ona manga manara imawoma , yamote o bobita o Musa wosilelefoka .

text: Now upon the first day of the week , very early in the morning , they came unto the sepulchre , bringing the spices which they had prepared , and certain others with them .
text2: O Nahadi ma wangeka so ka o goginita nosi o wange asa ibao , de o bi ngopeqeka ona magena itagi o boosuka , o bi rapa isidadailakoka gena yaaho .

text: And they found the stone rolled away from the sepulchre .
text2: Duma kagena imasidiado de yakelelo o teto ilalamo gena he iloloka .

text: And they entered in , and found not the body of the Lord Jesus .
text2: So ona yowosa o boosu ma rabaka , we , yamakewa o Jou Yesus Awi sone ma bake .

text: And it came to pass , as they were much perplexed thereabout , behold , two men stood by them in shining garments :
text2: Ona imaoko manga gamamu ma rabaka , de imatodoka kanaga manga dateka o nyawa yasinoto de manga baju ileleto - leto imasitibaku de imaokoye .

text: And as they were afraid , and bowed down their faces to the earth , they said unto them , Why seek ye the living among the dead ?
text2: So ona yosawangi de foloi yomodo de yobukuku o tonaku , duma yasinoto magena yotemo onaka , " Awa , o kiaso ngini niwisari o nyawa woooho moi isosone manga sidongirabaka .

text: He is not here , but is risen : remember how he spake unto you when he was yet in Galilee ,
text2: Kanena wihiwaka . Una wooho kali ! Niososininga o kia Una winisingangasu qabolo nginika , ipapasaka ma orasi Una o Galileaka

text: Saying , The Son of man must be delivered into the hands of sinful men , and be crucified , and the third day rise again .
text2: wotemo , ' O Nyawa ma Duhutu bilasu wisidoa o nyawa ma dorouka , so wisidasangahadika , de o wange saangeka Una asa wooho kali . ' "

text: And they remembered his words ,
text2: Kagena ona imasininga de igogou o Yesus Awi demo - demo magena .

text: And returned from the sepulchre , and told all these things unto the eleven , and to all the rest .
text2: So kagena o boosuka de ona yoliho so o kia naga idadadi qangodu magena isingangasu Awi muri - muri yamogiowo de moika de lo wimomote ma binukali .

text: It was Mary Magdalene , and Joanna , and Mary the mother of James , and other women that were with them , which told these things unto the apostles .
text2: O ngopeqeka , kiaka isingongangasu , ona magena ongo Maria Magdalena , ongo Yohana , ongo Maria o Yakobus ma awa de lo o bi ngopeqeka ma somoasi imakokomote dede ona .

text: And their words seemed to them as idle tales , and they believed them not .
text2: Ona isingangasuka , duma manga demo gena Awi muri - muri ona magena asa yopiricayawa , itemo manga demo gena cawali manga ade - ade masirete so itiaiwa .

text: Then arose Peter , and ran unto the sepulchre ; and stooping down , he beheld the linen clothes laid by themselves , and departed , wondering in himself at that which was come to pass .
text2: Duma nako o Petrus una magena woise de womagogora o boosuka . So kagena de una ka o boosu ma ngoraka , de womarukuku so ma rabaka womaginano . Eh ? Kagena ka cawali o baro qaaare ihadoku . Qabolo de una woliho awi tahuka de awi gamamuka , de womasosininga o kia idadadika .

text: And , behold , two of them went that same day to a village called Emmaus , which was from Jerusalem about threescore furlongs .
text2: O wange magena o Yesus wimomote yasinoto o Yerusalemno isupu yotagi yakahika o Emaus ma dokuka , ma gaku gena nagala o kilo mogiowo de moi .

text: And they talked together of all these things which had happened .
text2: Ona manga dodagi ma rabaka ma ngale o kia naga idadadika qangodu magena ona isibobicara .

text: And it came to pass , that , while they communed together and reasoned , Jesus himself drew near , and went with them .
text2: Imabobicara de imakokasano moi de moika , de imatodoka o Yesus masirete wahino manga dateka de wotagi imakokomote dede ona .

text: But their eyes were holden that they should not know him .
text2: Ona gena Una iwikelelo , duma kanaga o kia naga moi idadi onaka sidago yaakuwa Una iwinako .

text: And he said unto them , What manner of communications are these that ye have one to another , as ye walk , and are sad ?
text2: Kagena de Una watemo , " O ngeko ma soaka kangano o kia ngini nisibicara . " De ona imatoguka , de manga sininga asa ipeleso .

text: And the one of them , whose name was Cleopas , answering said unto him , Art thou only a stranger in Jerusalem , and hast not known the things which are come to pass therein these days ?
text2: Wimoi awi ronga o Kleopas wosano o Yesuska , " We ! Ngona manena nagala o Yerusalemka asa nomasidiado , so o wange ipapasaka kanaga o kia idadadika gena ka nomatengo nanako waasi . "

text: And he said unto them , What things ? And they said unto him , Concerning Jesus of Nazareth , which was a prophet mighty in deed and word before God and all the people :
text2: O Yesus wotemo , " O kia idadadi . " So ona itemo , " Awadede ! O kia idadadi gena o Yesus , o Nazaret ma nyawaka . Una o nabi moi de Awi demo de lo Awi manara gena ma rabaka kanaga de ma kuasa , bai o Gikimoi Awi simaka de lo o nyawa yangodu manga simaka .

text: And how the chief priests and our rulers delivered him to be condemned to death , and have crucified him .
text2: Duma o imamka ma bi sahe de lo nanga roriri Una wisidoa o bobaretaka la wisisala , so bilasu witooma . Qabolo de igogou ona Una iwisidasangahadika .

text: But we trusted that it had been he which should have redeemed Israel : and beside all this , to day is the third day since these things were done .
text2: Ena momongo , ngomi miwingongano Una asa ngone o Israelka ma nyawa nanga saturuno wonapalako . O wange manena he o wange saange qabolo Una witoomaka .

text: Yea , and certain women also of our company made us astonished , which were early at the sepulchre ;
text2: O kiali , mia ngopeqeka yamuruo naga imiaka so ngomi migamamuka , sababu kangano o goginita nosi de ona yotagi Awi boosuka ,

text: And when they found not his body , they came , saying , that they had also seen a vision of angels , which said that he was alive .
text2: duma Awi sone ma bake yamake kawa . De ona imakiliho de imisingangasu ngomika , o malaikat yakelelo de lo o malaikat magena isingangasu o Yesus wooho kali .

text: And certain of them which were with us went to the sepulchre , and found it even so as the women had said : but him they saw not .
text2: Kagena de mia dodiao yamuruo naga yahika o boosuka , de kagena yakelelo igogou imatero maro o kia o ngopeqeka ona magena yodedemoka . Duma ona o Yesus wimakewa . "

text: Then he said unto them , O fools , and slow of heart to believe all that the prophets have spoken :
text2: Qabolo de Una wotemo onaka , " Ngini igogou nifuma ! Ngini nia sininga isidailako qatemehe so niopiricayawa kiaka o bi nabi isingangasu iqomaka .

text: Ought not Christ to have suffered these things , and to enter into his glory ?
text2: O Salamati ma Kolano Una magena bilasu iqoma wingangapo de wisangisara , so qabolo asa wisioho kali de lo wisimulia so o bi moi - moi qangodu wapareta . "

text: And beginning at Moses and all the prophets , he expounded unto them in all the scriptures the things concerning himself .
text2: Kagena de o Yesus wadoto onaka o bi moi - moi o kia isilelefo o Gikimoi Awi Jaji ma Buku ma rabaka ma ngale Awi oho ma singangasu , ma solano o Musa awi lefoka de sidago o bi nabi manga lefo qangodu .

text: And they drew nigh unto the village , whither they went : and he made as though he would have gone further .
text2: So o doku kiaka ona ikokahikaka magena yadumu , de Una wodupa womaaka la wotagi wogila - gila ,

text: But they constrained him , saying , Abide with us : for it is toward evening , and the day is far spent . And he went in to tarry with them .
text2: duma ona asa iwisimahawa , de yotemo Unaka , " Hino la kanena Ngona nomasidodogu kasi dede ngomi . Imaqa - maqaka , so he qaputu so . " So Una igogou womasidodogu kagena onaka .

text: And it came to pass , as he sat at meat with them , he took bread , and blessed it , and brake , and gave to them .
text2: Ma orasi ona imatamiye la yooqo , de Una o roti waqehe Awi sukuru watide o Gikimoiye , de watepi - tepi , qabolo de wasitoku onaka .

text: And their eyes were opened , and they knew him ; and he vanished out of their sight .
text2: Ato wasitokuka , de ona yanako Una gena o Yesus . De imatodoka Una wisisaka so ona iwikelelo kawa .

text: And they said one to another , Did not our heart burn within us , while he talked with us by the way , and while he opened to us the scriptures ?
text2: So ona imatekebicara yotemo , " We ! So kangano o ngeko ma soaka de ngone nanga sininga maro isora , ma orasi Una wonabicara de lo o Gikimoi Awi Jaji ma Buku ma raba gena wonadoto itotiai ngoneka . "

text: And they rose up the same hour , and returned to Jerusalem , and found the eleven gathered together , and them that were with them ,
text2: So o orasi magena qabolo de ona lo imajobo yoliho o Yerusalemka , de yamakeka o Yesus Awi muri yamogiowo de moi imatolomuno de o nyawa ma somoasi .

text: Saying , The Lord is risen indeed , and hath appeared to Simon .
text2: Ona imatotolomu gena yotemo , " Igogou ! Ma Jou wooho kali bai ! Una womasimane o Simonka ! "

text: And they told what things were done in the way , and how he was known of them in breaking of bread .
text2: Kagena de ona yasinoto lo isihabari itotolomuka , kangano o ngeko ma soaka de o kia naga idadadi , ma orasi o roti watepi - tepi de ona yanako Una gena o Yesus .

text: And as they thus spake , Jesus himself stood in the midst of them , and saith unto them , Peace be unto you .
text2: Ona ka imatekebobicarasi , de imatodokano o Yesus masirete lo asa womaoko to ona manga sidongirabaka , de wotemo , " Ai salam nginika ! Tanu nia sininga ma rabaka igogou isosanangi . "

text: But they were terrified and affrighted , and supposed that they had seen a spirit .
text2: Ona gena yatodoka de lo yamodo , sababu ona itemo nagala o toka yakelelo .

text: And he said unto them , Why are ye troubled ? and why do thoughts arise in your hearts ?
text2: De Una wotemo onaka , " Qadoohaso ngini nimodo de lo nidodato .

text: Behold my hands and my feet , that it is I myself : handle me , and see ; for a spirit hath not flesh and bones , as ye see me have .
text2: Nianano kasi to Ngohi Ai gia de lo Ai qohu , sababu manena Ngohi masirete bai ! Nisipaqa de nisitailako , sababu o toka ma lake de ma kobo gena ihiwa maro kanaga niakelelo Ngohika . "

text: And when he had thus spoken , he shewed them his hands and his feet .
text2: Qabolo de Una Awi gia de Awi qohu ma bi nabo wosikelelo onaka .

text: And while they yet believed not for joy , and wondered , he said unto them , Have ye here any meat ?
text2: De ona gena maro yopiricaya waasi , ona yohairani icarawa so yanali . Komagena so Una wasano onaka wotemo , " Kanaga de nia ino ? "

text: And they gave him a piece of a broiled fish , and of an honeycomb .
text2: So o nao isosinanga o leta moi gena ona iwihike Unaka .

text: And he took it , and did eat before them .
text2: De Una waqehe de waoqo , la ona aku yakelelo igogou Una o toka wisowo .

text: And he said unto them , These are the words which I spake unto you , while I was yet with you , that all things must be fulfilled , which were written in the law of Moses , and in the prophets , and in the psalms , concerning me .
text2: Qabolo de Una wotemo onaka , " Manena o kia naga tinisingangasu nginika , ma orasi iqomaka de Ngohi kanaga dede nginisi . O bi moi - moi ma ngale Ngohi , kiaka o Jou Awi bobita o Musa de lo o bi nabi ma somoa isilelefo ma Buku ma rabaka de lo o Mazmur ma Bukuka gena , qangodu bilasu isiganapu . "

text: Then opened he their understanding , that they might understand the scriptures ,
text2: Qabolo Una wasinako itiai , la ma ngale ona aku o Gikimoi Awi Jaji ma Buku ma ngale gena yosihoda qaloha .

text: And said unto them , Thus it is written , and thus it behoved Christ to suffer , and to rise from the dead the third day :
text2: So Una wotemo onaka , " O Gikimoi Awi Jaji ma Buku ma rabaka isilefo itemo , Ngohi o Salamati ma Kolano manena bilasu isususa de isangisara sidago itooma , qabolo de o wange saangeka asa tooho kali .

text: And that repentance and remission of sins should be preached in his name among all nations , beginning at Jerusalem .
text2: De o habari qaloloha gena bilasu de to Ngohi Ai ronga isihabari ma meta o bi nyawa yangoduka , la ma ngale ona manga dorouno imatoba de imatoduba de lo o Gikimoi waapongu . O habari magena bilasu isihabari ma meta o bi bangsa ma nyawa yangoduka , ma nonomaka o Yerusalemka .

text: And ye are witnesses of these things .
text2: Ma ngale qangodu magegena ngini manena nidadi o saksi .

text: And , behold , I send the promise of my Father upon you : but tarry ye in the city of Jerusalem , until ye be endued with power from on high .
text2: Nimasosininga qaloha , done Ngohi asa tosulo la o Gurumi Qatetebi wouti kanena nginiku , maro Ai Baba wojajajika . Duma ngini bilasu niodamaha iqoma o kota manenaka , sidago o Gikimoi winihike o kuasa nginika la ngini aku niputuru . "

text: And he led them out as far as to Bethany , and he lifted up his hands , and blessed them .
text2: So de o Yesus wobicara qabolo de Una wangaho ona so wasisupu o kota ma duduka , sidago o Betania ma dateka . Kagena Awi gia watide la Awi laha wosidumu onaka .

text: And it came to pass , while he blessed them , he was parted from them , and carried up into heaven .
text2: Ato Awi laha wosidumuka asa Una witide de imakitinga so wakahika o sorogaye .

text: And they worshipped him , and returned to Jerusalem with great joy :
text2: Kagena de ona yobukuku yosuba Unaka , qabolo de manga sininga gena foloi qanali ona yoliho o Yerusalemka .

text: And were continually in the temple , praising and blessing God . Amen .
text2: De o wange isigeto - geto ona asa o Gikimoi Awi Tahuka igogeku de iwisigiliri Unaka .

text: In the beginning was the Word , and the Word was with God , and the Word was God .
text2: Ka ma nonomasi , o bi moi - moi iooho o duniaka gena idadi waasi , de Una Awi ronga o Demo gena he kanagaka . O Demo magena kanaga dede o Gikimoi de o Demo magena ka imatero dede o Gikimoi .

text: The same was in the beginning with God .
text2: De o orasi ma nonomaka gena Una asa dede o Gikimoi .

text: All things were made by him ; and without him was not any thing made that was made .
text2: De o Demo so o bi moi - moi qangodu aku wosidadika . Ena gena , nako Una wihiwa de o kia naga idadadika moi lo asa idadiwa .

text: In him was life ; and the life was the light of men .
text2: O Demo gena Una o oho ma hutu so o moi - moi qangodu wosioho . Komagena lo o nita ma duhutu so aku yaado o bi nyawaka .

text: And the light shineth in darkness ; and the darkness comprehended it not .
text2: De o nita ma duhutu magena o bubutu ma rabaka isiwaka , de o bubutu gena akuwa o nita magena yakoora eko o bubutu gena o nita yanakowa .

text: There was a man sent from God , whose name was John .
text2: Kanaga o nyawa moi awi ronga o Yohanes . Una magena o Gikimoi wisulo so wahino .

text: The same came for a witness , to bear witness of the Light , that all men through him might believe .
text2: Una magena wahino ma ngale o nita ma duhutu magegena wosingangasu o bi nyawaka , la ma ngale ona yangodu o demo magena aku yoise de lo yopiricaya .

text: He was not that Light , but was sent to bear witness of that Light .
text2: O Yohanes una magena o nita wisowo , duma una wahino ka ma ngale o nita magena wosingangasu o bi nyawaka wotemo ,

text: That was the true Light , which lighteth every man that cometh into the world .
text2: " O nita ma duhutu he yadisiwa o bi nyawa yangoduka , de o nita magena asa imasidiado o dunia ma bi dokuka . " Komagena o Yohanes wotemo .

text: He was in the world , and the world was made by him , and the world knew him not .
text2: O Demo magena kanaga o duniaka , de ngaroko Una wosidadika o bi moi - moi qangodu o dunia ma rabaka , duma o dunia ma bi nyawa winakowa Una magena naguuna .

text: He came unto his own , and his own received him not .
text2: So Una asa wahino to Una Awi doku masireteka , duma Awi doku ma bi nyawa , ena gena o Yahudika ma nyawa , ona iwiholu .

text: But as many as received him , to them gave he power to become the sons of God , even to them that believe on his name :
text2: Ngaroko komagena , duma kanaga o nyawa ma somoa ona magena asa Una iwiqehe qaloha sidago lo iwipiricaya Unaka . De ona magena lo asa Una waaka so aku ona imadadi o Gikimoi Awi ngopa - ngopa masirete .

text: Which were born , not of blood , nor of the will of the flesh , nor of the will of man , but of God .
text2: Ona imadadi o Gikimoi Awi ngopa - ngopaka gena , imaterowa de o nyawa o duniaka la manga bi ngopa - ngopa yasibuo , mote ma baba awi dupa masirete . Duma o Gikimoi masirete Awi dupa so ona idadi maro to Una Awi ngopa - ngopaka .

text: And the Word was made flesh , and dwelt among us , ( and we beheld his glory , the glory as of the only begotten of the Father , ) full of grace and truth .
text2: O Demo magena womadadi de womasitero maro ka o nyawa moi , so Una wooho de wogoge to ngone nanga sidongirabaka . De Awi kuasa gena ma sihino ka ma Baba Gikimoino , sababu ma ngale ma Ngopa womatetengo , so igogou ma Baba Awi kuasa ilalamo gena ngomi lo miakeleloka . De ngomi miwimomote gena igogou to Una Awi laha womisidumuka de o dodoto itotiai gena womidotoka .

text: John bare witness of him , and cried , saying , This was he of whom I spake , He that cometh after me is preferred before me : for he was before me .
text2: Ma ngale Una magena so o Yohanes igogou wasingangasu o bi nyawaka , de wotemo womaili - ilika , " Ma ngale Una magena ngohi totemo iqomaka , ' Done wimoi asa wahino wotuuruno , gena Awi manara foloi ilamo , sababu ngohi isibuo waasi de Una he kanaga woohoka . ' "

text: And of his fulness have all we received , and grace for grace .
text2: O Gikimoi ma Ngopa Awi siningaka kanaga Awi laha de ma boloika , so o bi loha moi - moi ngone wonagopola itogu - toguwa .

text: For the law was given by Moses , but grace and truth came by Jesus Christ .
text2: Kanaga o Gikimoi Awi bobita gena o Musa walefoka , duma o Yesus Kristus wosidumuka o Gikimoi Awi laha , de lo o Gikimoi Awi dodoto itotiai wonadotoka .

text: No man hath seen God at any time ; the only begotten Son , which is in the bosom of the Father , he hath declared him .
text2: De o Gikimoi Una magena kanaga o nyawa moi lo waasi ona iwikelelo . Ka cawali o Gikimoi ma Ngopa womatetengo , kanaga ma Baba Awi dateka , Una gena wonasinako o Gikimoi ngoneka .

text: And this is the record of John , when the Jews sent priests and Levites from Jerusalem to ask him , Who art thou ?
text2: O orasi moi de kanaga o Yahudika manga roriri o Yerusalem ma kotaka gena , o imam de lo manga sidongirabaka o Lewi awi ngopa de awi danoku ona magena yamuruo naga yasulo la itagi o Yohanes wikurumi . O bolu moi magena asa yahino manga sosano yaaho so unaka itemo , " Baba , ngona gena naguuna sidago o moi - moi manena naaka . "

text: And he confessed , and denied not ; but confessed , I am not the Christ .
text2: De o Yohanes gena wosipongowa ma ngale una masirete , so wosango de wotemo , " Ngohi manena o Salamati ma Kolano isowo . "

text: And they asked him , What then ? Art thou Elias ? And he saith , I am not . Art thou that prophet ? And he answered , No .
text2: So ona wisano kali itemo , " Nakoso komagena , nagala ngona gena ma nabi Elia ? " " Hiwa ! O Elia gena ngohiwa . " De ona itemo kali , " So ngona naguuna . Nagala ngona o nabi moi kiaka una magena o Gikimoi wojaji iqomaka done asa wahino ? " So una wosango kali wotemo , " Hiwa ! Ngohi una magena isowo . "

text: Then said they unto him , Who art thou ? that we may give an answer to them that sent us . What sayest thou of thyself ?
text2: Kagena de ona wisano kali , itemo unaka , " Baba , mia tabea , duma ngomi manena bilasu mininako kasi ngona gena naguuna , la kanaga o demo , o kia ngona nomisingangasuka gena , ngomi aku miaaho to ngone nanga roririka . So ngomi minisano kali ngona naguuna , la ma ngale ngona masirete tanu nomisingangasu ngomika . "

text: He said , I am the voice of one crying in the wilderness , Make straight the way of the Lord , as said the prophet Esaias .
text2: De ma ngeko komagena so o Yohanes una masirete asa wadedemo onaka wotemo , " Ngohi manena gena imatero de o nyawa una magena iqomaka ma nabi Yesaya awi buku ma rabaka isilefo de itemo , ' Kanaga o nyawa moi o tona ibobeleuka womatotoore : Hika ! Ma ngale nanga Jou Awi hino gena o ngeko bilasu nisibolowo de nisitiai . ' O Yesaya awi demo ma meta gena ka ngohi manena qabolo . " Komagena o Yohanes una masirete womasingangasu onaka .

text: And they which were sent were of the Pharisees .
text2: De kagena manga sidongirabaka lo o Farisika ma nyawa yamuruo naga lo yasusulo o Yohaneska .

text: And they asked him , and said unto him , Why baptizest thou then , if thou be not that Christ , nor Elias , neither that prophet ?
text2: So ona lo iwisano unaka itemo , " Ce ! Baba , nako ngona gena o Salamati ma Kolano nisowo , de o Elia eko o nabi moi o Gikimoi wojajajika una magena lo nisowo , de qadoohaso aku ngona o nyawa naosi . "

text: John answered them , saying , I baptize with water : but there standeth one among you , whom ye know not ;
text2: So kagena de o Yohanes wosango de wotemo kali onaka , " Ngohi manena o nyawa taosi de o ake , duma wimoi he kanaga to ngini nia sidongirabaka duma igogou ngini niwinako waasi .

text: He it is , who coming after me is preferred before me , whose shoe ' s latchet I am not worthy to unloose .
text2: Ma orasika kanaga wimoi Una magena asa wahino wotuuruno , gena Awi manara foloi ilamo , so ngohi manena to Una Awi simaka gena o kia lo waali idahe , ka Awi capato ma gumi tasose maro o nyawa ileleleani moi lo idadiwa . " Ma ngeko komagena la ma ngale una masirete wasingangasu onaka .

text: These things were done in Bethabara beyond Jordan , where John was baptizing .
text2: O bi moi - moi magena imadadi o Betania ma dokuka o Yordan ma Selera ma sonongaka , kiaka kagena o Yohanes o nyawa waosi .

text: The next day John seeth Jesus coming unto him , and saith , Behold the Lamb of God , which taketh away the sin of the world .
text2: Ma goginitano , de o Yohanes una magena o Yesus wikelelo , Una wahino de o Yohanes wobicara wotemo , " He ! Nianano ! O Gikimoi Awi Duba ma Goho , kiaka Una magena o dunia ma bi nyawa manga dorou qangodu done asa wositagali de to Una Awi rohe masirete .

text: This is he of whom I said , After me cometh a man which is preferred before me : for he was before me .
text2: Ma ngale Una gena ngohi tinisingangasu qabolo nginika , de totemo , done wimoi asa wahino wotuuruno gena Awi manara foloi ilamo , sababu ngohi isibuo waasi de Una gena he kanaga woohoka .

text: And I knew him not : but that he should be made manifest to Israel , therefore am I come baptizing with water .
text2: Ma nonomaka , ngohi lo towinako waasi Una magena igogou o Salamati ma Kolano , duma ngohi tahino kanaga o bi nyawa tasiosi de o ake la ma ngale ngini o Israelka ma nyawa aku Una niwinako .

text: And I knew him not : but he that sent me to baptize with water , the same said unto me , Upon whom thou shalt see the Spirit descending , and remaining on him , the same is he which baptizeth with the Holy Ghost .
text2: Igogou , iqoqomaka Una o Salamati ma Kolano ngohi lo towinako waasi , duma o Gikimoi ngohi woisulo tahino la o nyawa aku taosi de o ake , de lo Una magena woisingangasu ngohika wotemo , ' Kanaga naguuna nowikelelo la Ai Gurumi Unaku iuti de itangi gena , igogou Una magena asa o nyawaka wosingosa o Gurumi Qatetebi ma kuasa la manga sininga ma rabaka wopareta . ' So ngohi asa igogou takeleloka Awi Gurumi o sorogaku iuti maro o namo dara moi de itangi Unaku la ona ioho imarimoi .

text: And I saw , and bare record that this is the Son of God .
text2: De ngohi tanako igogou de ngohi towikeleloka , so tinisingangasu tagogou nginika , Una magena o Gikimoi ma Ngopa . "

text: Again the next day after John stood , and two of his disciples ;
text2: Ma goginitano , o riho magenaka kanaga o Yohanes de awi dodiao yasinoto , ona magena o nyawa una wimomote manga sidongirabaka .

text: And looking upon Jesus as he walked , he saith , Behold the Lamb of God !
text2: So ma orasika o Yohanes una wikelelo o Yesus wotagi wokahino onano , de wobicara awi dodiao yasinoto magenaka wotemo , " He ! Una magenaka niwinano . Una magena o Gikimoi Awi Duba ma Goho . "

text: And the two disciples heard him speak , and they followed Jesus .
text2: So yoise komagena , de ona imajobo o Yohanes iwidongosaku de o Yesus wimoteka .

text: Then Jesus turned , and saw them following , and saith unto them , What seek ye ? They said unto him , Rabbi , ( which is to say , being interpreted , Master , ) where dwellest thou ?
text2: So o Yesus womakiliho de wakelelo ona magena Una wimote , de wasano wotemo onaka , " Baba - baba , nidooha eko o kia niasari . " De ona itemo , " Baba Rabi , ngomi ka miadupa Ngona minisano kasi , Ngona gena kiaka nogoge . " ( O Ibrani ma demo ' Rabi ' gena ma ngale Guru . )

text: He saith unto them , Come and see . They came and saw where he dwelt , and abode with him that day : for it was about the tenth hour .
text2: Kagena de Una wotemo onaka , " Hino la o orasi manena ngini aku nimote Ngohi la asa nianako . " So ona yasinoto magena Una wimote de imasidiado to Una Awi riho kiaka kagena wogogogeka . Ma orasi kagena imasidiado he o cako iha qamaqa - maqa . De o wange magena ona kagena igoge dede Una .

text: One of the two which heard John speak , and followed him , was Andrew , Simon Peter ' s brother .
text2: Ona yasinoto o Yohanes awi demo yoiiseka so o Yesus wimote gena , moi awi ronga o Andreas , una magena o Simon eko o Petrus awi nongoru .

text: He first findeth his own brother Simon , and saith unto him , We have found the Messias , which is , being interpreted , the Christ .
text2: De o Simon wihiwa so o Yesus wikurumi qabolo , de o Andreas una cai - cai awi ria wisari . So wimakeka , de gila - gila awi ria o Simonka wotemo , " He ! To ngone nanga Salamati ma Kolano gena ngomi miwikeleloka . " ( Gena o bahasa Ibrani itemo o Mesias , imatero de o bahasa Yunani itemo o Kristus , gena ma ngale Una o Gikimoi wijajajika so asa wonasisalamati . )

text: And he brought him to Jesus . And when Jesus beheld him , he said , Thou art Simon the son of Jona : thou shalt be called Cephas , which is by interpretation , A stone .
text2: Qabolo de o Andreas ma ria o Simon wingaho itagi o Yesuska . So kagena ona de o Yesus imakamake , de Una wotemo o Simonka , " Ngohi ngona toninakoka , ngona gena o Simon o Yohanes awi ngopa . De o orasi manena Ngohi asa o ronga moili tonihike so tonisironga lo o Kefas . " ( O Kefas gena ma ngale o teto ilalamo de nakoso isiyoyunanika gena , o Petrus . )

text: The day following Jesus would go forth into Galilee , and findeth Philip , and saith unto him , Follow me .
text2: De ma goginita noli , de o Yesus wositatapuka asa o Galilea ma tonaka wotagi . So womajoboka , de kanaga o nyawa moi awi ronga o Filipus wikelelo so wiaso , de witemo unaka , " Hino la tanu ngona lo noimote Ngohi . " So una lo o Yesus iwimote .

text: Now Philip was of Bethsaida , the city of Andrew and Peter .
text2: O Filipus una magena wogoge o doku moika , kiaka imatero de o Andreas de lo o Petrus manga doku , ena gena o Betsaida ma dokuka .

text: Philip findeth Nathanael , and saith unto him , We have found him , of whom Moses in the law , and the prophets , did write , Jesus of Nazareth , the son of Joseph .
text2: De o Filipus asa to ona manga dodiao moi o Natanael wimake de wotemo unaka , " He ! Ngomi gena miwimakeka Una magena o Salamati ma Kolano , kiaka o Musa de lo o bi nabi - nabi iqoqomaka gena o Gikimoi Awi Buku ma rabaka isilefoka . Una magena miwikeleloka bai ! Una magena o Nazaret ma nyawa moi o Yusuf awi ngopa . "

text: And Nathanael said unto him , Can there any good thing come out of Nazareth ? Philip saith unto him , Come and see .
text2: O Natanael woise de wotemo , " Ce ! Idodooha so o loha de ma sihino o Nazaretno . " Qabolo de o Filipus wotemo , " Hino , potagi la ngona lo aku nowinano . " So ona imajobo .

text: Jesus saw Nathanael coming to him , and saith of him , Behold an Israelite indeed , in whom is no guile !
text2: De ona itagi so o Yesus he widumuka , de Una asa wotemo o Natanaelka , " Kanaga o nyawa moi una o Israelka ma nyawa , una magena ka wotiai de lo awi siningaka o gulai moi lo ihiwa . "

text: Nathanael saith unto him , Whence knowest thou me ? Jesus answered and said unto him , Before that Philip called thee , when thou wast under the fig tree , I saw thee .
text2: So o Natanael wosano wotemo o Yesuska , " Baba , iqomaka kiaka pomakamake so Ngona aku notemo ngohi noinakoka . " So o Yesus wotemo unaka , " Baba , iqomaka o Filipus ngona woniaso waasi , de Ngohi tonikelelo ngona nomataru o ara ma hutu ma litimika nomatamiku . "

text: Nathanael answered and saith unto him , Rabbi , thou art the Son of God ; thou art the King of Israel .
text2: Kagena de o Natanael wotemo , " Wewe ! Baba Guru , so Ngona ka noinako bai ! Igogou - gogou , Ngona gena o Gikimoi ma Ngopa . Ngona manena o Israelka ma nyawa manga Kolano . "

text: Jesus answered and said unto him , Because I said unto thee , I saw thee under the fig tree , believest thou ? thou shalt see greater things than these .
text2: Qabolo de o Yesus wotemo unaka , " Ce ! Samaloha so Ngohi tonisingangasu , so ngona asa Ngohi noipiricayaka , sababu tonikeleloka ma orasi ngona kagena o ara ma hutu ma golaka . Ngaroko komagena , ngona done asa nakelelo o bi moi - moi ma somoali idadi so done ngona foloisi nohairani .

text: And he saith unto him , Verily , verily , I say unto you , Hereafter ye shall see heaven open , and the angels of God ascending and descending upon the Son of man .
text2: De lo ngona tonisingangasu igogou , ngona done asa nakelelo o soroga ipelenga de o Gikimoi Awi malaikat - malaikat kanaga maro Ngohi o Nyawa ma Duhutu Ai simaka ona magena asa iuti de idola . "

text: And the third day there was a marriage in Cana of Galilee ; and the mother of Jesus was there :
text2: O Yesus womasidiado o Kana ma dokuka o Galilea ma tonaka , de ma goginitano kanaga o kawi ma rarame moi yaaka , so Una ma awa lo kagena naga .

text: And both Jesus was called , and his disciples , to the marriage .
text2: Mutuwade Una de Awi muri - muri lo yakoro so yotagi o rarame magenaka .

text: And when they wanted wine , the mother of Jesus saith unto him , They have no wine .
text2: De kagena o anggur yaudo duma pasa de qamataka . So o Yesus ma awa motagi mowisingangasu Unaka , " Kodo ! Manga anggur gena qamataka . "

text: Jesus saith unto her , Woman , what have I to do with thee ? mine hour is not yet come .
text2: De Una wotemo , " Ai awa , nako ngona eko Ngohi gena , upasi pocapu , sababu to Ngohi Ai orasi gena yaado waasi . "

text: His mother saith unto the servants , Whatsoever he saith unto you , do it .
text2: Ngaroko komagena , duma ma awa motemo o rarame ma bi leleanika , " O kia bato Una wosulo nginika , magena ngini bilasu niaaka . "

text: And there were set there six waterpots of stone , after the manner of the purifying of the Jews , containing two or three firkins apiece .
text2: Kagena naga o ake ma rube ngai butanga . O rube ilalamo so ma raba gena nagala o ake o liter ratu moiku de iwedo , de magena isidailako ma ngale o Yahudika ma nyawa bilasu imatiodo , mote to ona manga adati de manga galepu .

text: Jesus saith unto them , Fill the waterpots with water . And they filled them up to the brim .
text2: Kagena de asa Una wotemo ileleleanika , " O ake ma bi rube qangodu magena hika ngini o ake nioguse sidago iwedo . " Gila - gila ileleleani ona magena o bi rube magenaku o ake yoguse sidago qangodu iwedoka .

text: And he saith unto them , Draw out now , and bear unto the governor of the feast . And they bare it .
text2: Yoguse qaboloka , de Una onaka wotemo kali , " O bi rube iwewedo - wedoka magena ma ake niaui de niwihike o rame ma duhutuka . " De maro o kia Una wosulo onaka , magena ona yaaka .

text: When the ruler of the feast had tasted the water that was made wine , and knew not whence it was : ( but the servants which drew the water knew ; ) the governor of the feast called the bridegroom ,
text2: Duma o rube ma ake yatotota magena Una waaka so o ake de imadadi o anggurka . So o rarame ma duhutu una magena asa wadahake , de una awi siningaka wotemo , " We ! O anggur magena kiano ikahino . " Ngaroko wanakowa , duma igogou ona ileleleani magena yanako itiai . So una wadahakeka , de wokakawi una magena wiaso

text: And saith unto him , Every man at the beginning doth set forth good wine ; and when men have well drunk , then that which is worse : but thou hast kept the good wine until now .
text2: de wotemo unaka , " We ! O nyawa manga biasa gena manga anggur qamomonge magena yasiudo iqoma sidago manga nyawa yakokoro ona yaduga . Qabolo de ona manga anggur qamamali gena yasiudo ituuru . Duma ngona ani anggur ma nonoma qamomonge gena nadiahi sidago o orasi manena de asa nosisupu so nasiudo ituuru . "

text: This beginning of miracles did Jesus in Cana of Galilee , and manifested forth his glory ; and his disciples believed on him .
text2: O nonako ihahairani manena o Yesus waaka o Kana ma dokuka o Galilea ma tonaka . O riho magenaka de asa to Una Awi nonako - nonako ihahairani gena wosolano waaka . Komagena Una Awi kuasa masirete asa wasimane onaka . So Awi muri - muri magena manga piricaya Unaka gena foloi idogo .

text: After this he went down to Capernaum , he , and his mother , and his brethren , and his disciples : and they continued there not many days .
text2: So qaboloka , de Una wotagi wokahoko o Kapernaum ma dokuko . Ona itagi imakangaho gena ma awa , de Awi nonongoru , de lo Awi muri - muri . So o wange muruo naga ona igoge o doku magenaka .

text: And the Jews ' passover was at hand , and Jesus went up to Jerusalem ,
text2: So kagena o Yesus wogoge wodamaha sidago o Paskah ma Wange ma Rarame ma orasi he idumuka , de Una wotagi wokahie o Yerusalemye .

text: And found in the temple those that sold oxen and sheep and doves , and the changers of money sitting :
text2: Kagena womasidiadoka , de Una wotagi de wowosa o Gikimoi Awi Tahu ma lolohaka . De kagena asa Una wasitodadaheno o nyawa yadadala o riho magegenaka imasiiija de imatekekokiija . Ma binuka o sapi , o duba , de lo o namo dara imasiiija gena yaaka manga suba ma gaso , de ma binukali o nyawa o doku ma somoano manga pipi imatekesitagali .

text: And when he had made a scourge of small cords , he drove them all out of the temple , and the sheep , and the oxen ; and poured out the changers ' money , and overthrew the tables ;
text2: Magena wakeleloka , de Una asa o ngangapo moi waaka o iwino la idadi maro o cambuk moi . De Awi cambuk magena , Una gila - gila o Gikimoi Awi Tahu ma lolohaka o nyawa ona magena wadusu de wasisupu . Wadusu ona maro o bolumoi - bolumoi , ona de manga sapi de lo manga duba . De lo ma binuka o pipi imatekesitagali ona manga meja waeha sidago lo manga pipi gena ihaja imakokitingaka .

text: And said unto them that sold doves , Take these things hence ; make not my Father ' s house an house of merchandise .
text2: De ma binukali o namo dara imasiiijaka Una wotemo , " Asitagala ! Ngini gena nia namo niaaho de nisupu . Awadede ! Upa lo Ai Baba Awi Tahuka de niaaka o riho imasiiija . "

text: And his disciples remembered that it was written , The zeal of thine house hath eaten me up .
text2: Komagena imaakaka , de Awi muri - muri magena asa yosiningali kanaga iqoqoma o Gikimoi Awi Jaji ma Buku ma rabaka isilefo itemo , " Ai Baba , Ngohi Ai sininga ma dupa foloisi ilamo gena Ani Tahu bilasu o nyawa yahoromati sidago he dangade tosone . "

text: Then answered the Jews and said unto him , What sign shewest thou unto us , seeing that thou doest these things ?
text2: Qaboloka , de kanaga o Yahudika manga roriri ona magena yahino Unaka , de itemo , " Ce ! Idodooha so Ngona naaka komagena . Ngomi mitemo Ngonaka bilasu o nonako moi nomisimane ngomika . La ma ngale ngomi aku mininako , igogou Ngona gena Ani kuasa ma sihino o Gikimoino . "

text: Jesus answered and said unto them , Destroy this temple , and in three days I will raise it up .
text2: De Una wosango wotemo , " Nakoso ngini o Gikimoi Awi Tahu manena niaruba , de ma deka ka o wange saangeka de Ngohi asa tosigoko kali . "

text: Then said the Jews , Forty and six years was this temple in building , and wilt thou rear it up in three days ?
text2: De ona itemo , " Ilaha ! Kanaga ma deka o taungu moruha de butanga o nyawa imanara asa o Gikimoi Awi Tahu manena isigoko . De Ngona gena nobicara de notemo , ngaroko o tahu magena yabiauka , duma ma deka ka cawali o wange saange de Ngona aku nosigoko kali . "

text: But he spake of the temple of his body .
text2: Duma Una Awi ngale gena Awi rohe masirete wositero maro o Gikimoi Awi Tahu .

text: When therefore he was risen from the dead , his disciples remembered that he had said this unto them ; and they believed the scripture , and the word which Jesus had said .
text2: Cawali ma orasika done Una o sone ma rabano wisioho kali , de asa Awi muri - muri yosininga kiaka iqomaka to Una Awi demo komagena gena wotemo , o Gikimoi Awi Tahu wositero de Awi rohe . Yosiningaka , de asa ona yopiricaya igogou o Gikimoi Awi demo ma ngale o Yesus o sone ma rabano wisioho kali de lo o bi moi - moi qangodu magena Una wasingangasu qabolo onaka .

text: Now when he was in Jerusalem at the passover , in the feast day , many believed in his name , when they saw the miracles which he did .
text2: Ma orasi Una kanaga o Paskah ma Wange ma Rarame o Yerusalemka , de o nyawa yadadala asa ipiricaya igogou Una o Salamati ma Kolano gena , ka cawali o nonako ihahairani waaka .

text: But Jesus did not commit himself unto them , because he knew all men ,
text2: Duma Una woholu wapiricaya onaka , sababu o nyawa yangodu manga sininga ipepelu gena ka wanako .

text: And needed not that any should testify of man : for he knew what was in man .
text2: Komagena lo ma ngale o nyawa manga sininga gena upa he o nyawa asa iwisingangasu , sababu igogou Una wanako qaboloka .

text: There was a man of the Pharisees , named Nicodemus , a ruler of the Jews :
text2: Kanaga o Farisi ma nyawa moi awi ronga o Nikodemus , de una magena lo o Yahudika manga roriri moi o Mahkamah Agama manga sidongirabano .

text: The same came to Jesus by night , and said unto him , Rabbi , we know that thou art a teacher come from God : for no man can do these miracles that thou doest , except God be with him .
text2: Qaputuku de una wahino o Yesuska , de wobicara wotemo , " Baba Guru , ngomi mininako igogou Ngona o guru moi o Gikimoi masirete wonisulo nahino ngomino , sababu Ngona de to Ngona Ani nonako ihahairani . O nyawa moi lo o nonako ihahairani yaaka yaakuwa , ka cawali manga buturu ma sihino o Gikimoino . "

text: Jesus answered and said unto him , Verily , verily , I say unto thee , Except a man be born again , he cannot see the kingdom of God .
text2: Kagena de o Yesus wotemo unaka , " Baba , nakoso kanaga o Gikimoi la igogou o nyawa waparetaka maro o kolano moi , de ona bilasu yasibuo kali . "

text: Nicodemus saith unto him , How can a man be born when he is old ? can he enter the second time into his mother ' s womb , and be born ?
text2: Duma o roriri una magena wosano wotemo , " Ce ! Ma ngeko idodooha so ona yalamoka de aku yasibuo kali . De ma ngeko idodooha aku ona iliho kali to ona manga awa ami poko ma rabaka la yasibuo kali . "

text: Jesus answered , Verily , verily , I say unto thee , Except a man be born of water and of the Spirit , he cannot enter into the kingdom of God .
text2: So kagena de o Yesus asa wosango unaka wotemo , " Igogou ! O nyawa yaaku waasi o Gikimoi Awi pareta ma rabaka iwosa , ka cawali ona nagoona de o ake de lo o Gikimoi Awi Gurumi yasibuo kasi .

text: That which is born of the flesh is flesh ; and that which is born of the Spirit is spirit .
text2: Sababu o nyawa gena manga dodihimo yasibuo , duma o Gikimoi Awi Gurumi wahike o oho qamomuane so imatero de yasibuo kali .

text: Marvel not that I said unto thee , Ye must be born again .
text2: So upa sidago ngona gena nohairani nakoso Ngohi totemo bilasu ngona nisibuo kali .

text: The wind bloweth where it listeth , and thou hearest the sound thereof , but canst not tell whence it cometh , and whither it goeth : so is every one that is born of the Spirit .
text2: O nyawa nagoona nakoso ona o Gikimoi Awi Gurumi wasibuo kali ma ngale wahike onaka o oho qamomuane gena , imatero maro de ka o paro iwuwu . Sababu ngona gena akuwa de ani lako o paro nakelelo , de lo ngaroko o paro ma kuguru gena aku noise , duma naakuwa nanako magena kiano ikahino de kiaka ikahika . "

text: Nicodemus answered and said unto him , How can these things be ?
text2: Woise komagena de o roriri una magena wotemo , " We ! Nagala ngohi manena Ani demo ma ngale gena tosidodoguwa . "

text: Jesus answered and said unto him , Art thou a master of Israel , and knowest not these things ?
text2: So o Yesus wotemo , " Ngona gena ngaroko o Israel ma nyawa manga guru moi nikukuruye , duma qadoohaso sidago o bi moi - moi ngona tonidodedemoka de ma ngale gena naakuwa nanako .

text: Verily , verily , I say unto thee , We speak that we do know , and testify that we have seen ; and ye receive not our witness .
text2: Ngona tonisingangasu igogou , o kia naga Ngohi takokeleloka de tanakoka gena igogou nginika tinidedemo de lo tinisingangasu qaboloka , duma ngini ningodu gena asa niaholu .

text: If I have told you earthly things , and ye believe not , how shall ye believe , if I tell you of heavenly things ?
text2: De o kia Ngohi tinidodedemoka ma ngale gena o kia naga moi done asa idadi o duniaka . So nakoso ma ngale gena ngini niopiricayawa , de idodooha aku niopiricaya ma ngale o kia naga idadadi o sorogaka , nakoso magena lo tinidedemoli .

text: And no man hath ascended up to heaven , but he that came down from heaven , even the Son of man which is in heaven .
text2: Igogou , o nyawa moi lo yahiwa o duniaka de ikahika o sorogaka yaado la o kia idadadika yakelelo . Ka cawali Ngohi masirete , Ai ronga o Nyawa ma Duhutu gena , o sorogano so o moi - moi magena takeleloka .

text: And as Moses lifted up the serpent in the wilderness , even so must the Son of man be lifted up :
text2: Maro ka iqoqoma o Musa o tona ibobeleuka de kanaga o didiki moi maro o ngihia gena o tabagano isitulada watide la nagoona yakokelelo gena isonewa , de komagena lo Ngohi o Nyawa ma Duhutu bilasu o sangahadiye isidola .

text: That whosoever believeth in him should not perish , but have eternal life .
text2: La ma ngale o nyawa , nakoso Ngohi manena ipiricaya , de ona magena asa yamake o oho ka sidutu ikakali .

text: For God so loved the world , that he gave his only begotten Son , that whosoever believeth in him should not perish , but have everlasting life .
text2: Sababu igogou - gogou o Gikimoi foloi wadodara o bi nyawa o dunia ma rabaka , so Una asa Awi Ngopa masirete wihike , ngaroko Awi Ngopa magena to Una Awi Ngopa yanau womatetengo . La o nyawa nagoona Awi Ngopaka magena iwipiricaya , de ona magena upa yasisa , duma yamake o oho ka sidutu ikakali .

text: For God sent not his Son into the world to condemn the world ; but that the world through him might be saved .
text2: Komagena o Gikimoi Awi Ngopa wisulo o duniaku , Una wouti , de upa o bi nyawa o duniaka wasisala so bilasu o Gikimoi wafanggali de o dorou , duma ma ngale manga dorou ma rabano gena wasisalamati .

text: He that believeth on him is not condemned : but he that believeth not is condemned already , because he hath not believed in the name of the only begotten Son of God .
text2: De o nyawa nagoona nakoso to Una Awi Ngopa magena iwipiricayaka , de ona magena asa upa yasisala . Duma nakoso o nyawa la kanaga iwipiricayawa , ona magena yasisala so igogou bilasu o Gikimoi wafanggali de o dorou , sababu ona wipiricayawa Una magena o Gikimoi Awi Ngopa yanau womatetengo , so ona manga dorou ma rabano Una upa wasisalamati .

text: And this is the condemnation , that light is come into the world , and men loved darkness rather than light , because their deeds were evil .
text2: Ona yasisala so bilasu dede o Gikimoi imakitingaka , sababu o nita ma duhutu moi o Gikimoino yahino qabolo o duniaka , ma ngale o Gikimoi wasimane o nyawaka . Duma nakoso o nita de o bubutu , la kanaga o bubutu gena o nyawa asa foloi yodupa , sababu ona magena yodupa o dorou yaaka .

text: For every one that doeth evil hateth the light , neither cometh to the light , lest his deeds should be reproved .
text2: O nyawa nagoona yodupa o dorou yaaka , ona magena asa o nita ma duhutu gena ka yoduhudu de o bubutu gena yodongosa iholu , so yaakuwa yahino o nitano , ma ngale upa manga dorou ma rabano yasisalamati . Yoholu yahino o nitano , magena ma sababu ona itemo idodooha nakoso manga dorou isikelelo . So ona magena de manga salaka .

text: But he that doeth truth cometh to the light , that his deeds may be made manifest , that they are wrought in God .
text2: Duma nakoso kanaga ona yodupa yamote o dodoto itotiai gena ma sihino o Gikimoino , ona magena o nita ma rabano yahino . Ona magena yaaka la ma ngale o nyawa yangodu aku yanako , igogou to ona manga manara magena yaaka sababu ona imarimoika dede o Gikimoi . "

text: After these things came Jesus and his disciples into the land of Judaea ; and there he tarried with them , and baptized .
text2: Ipapasaka , de o Yesus de Awi muri - muri itagi ikahika o Yudea ma tonaka . De kagena o orasi muruo naga Una wogoge dede ona , de lo wosulo o nyawa yaosi , gena maro o nonako moi igogou Una wimomote .

text: And John also was baptizing in Aenon near to Salim , because there was much water there : and they came , and were baptized .
text2: De kanagasi o Yohanes lo o nyawa waosi o ake ma jobubu isironga o Ainon , o Salim ma doku ma dateka , sababu kagena o ake ilamo de o wange isigeto - geto o nyawa yahino unaka ma ngale una aku ona waosi .

text: For John was not yet cast into prison .
text2: O orasi magena una o buika wisingosa waasi .

text: Then there arose a question between some of John ' s disciples and the Jews about purifying .
text2: O wange moika , de o Yohanes wooosi awi nyawa wimomote yamuruo naga de lo o Yahudika ma nyawa moi imatekesikoholu ma ngale o Yahudika ma nyawa manga adati de manga galepu , gena idodooha bilasu yatiodo kasi de asa manga sininga qatebi o Gikimoi Awi simaka .

text: And they came unto John , and said unto him , Rabbi , he that was with thee beyond Jordan , to whom thou barest witness , behold , the same baptizeth , and all men come to him .
text2: Komagena so o Yohanes awi nyawa wimomote yahino unaka , de itemo , " Baba Guru , o nyawa Una magena iqoqomaka , kanaga o Yordan ma Selera ma sonongaka de ngona nowitideka ma ngale nomisingangasu ngomika , Una gena o orasi manena asa o nyawa waosi . Ce ! O nyawa yadadala ngona inidongosa de asa yangodu ikahikaka Unaka . "

text: John answered and said , A man can receive nothing , except it be given him from heaven .
text2: Kagena de o Yohanes wosango wotemo onaka , " Magena qadoohawa . O nyawa ngone gena nakoso o kia naga ngone kanaga pamake magena , ka cawali o Gikimoi wonahike . So ma ngale magegena gena ngohi itoosawa .

text: Ye yourselves bear me witness , that I said , I am not the Christ , but that I am sent before him .
text2: Ngini gena niise qaboloka , ngohi tinisingangasuka totemo ngohi manena o Salamati ma Kolano isowo , duma o Gikimoi woisulo ngohi la ngohi asa toqomano .

text: He must increase , but I must decrease .
text2: Igogou , o Yesus Awi manara dede to ngohi ai manara gena , to Una Awi manara foloi ilamo . Ma orasi o kawi ma rarame ma rabaka de ngohi maro wokakawi awi dodiao moi . Ngaroko una kanaga o bi moi - moi qangodu gena waaturu , duma muna mokakawi gena de una magena wisowo . Wokakawi awi dodiao gena wisulo woqomano , ma ngale ka waaka to muna mokakawi ami dailako . Wosidailako qaboloka , de ma orasi wokakawi wahino so muna gena womingoso de awi nali de awi more gena , awi dodiao magena woise so una lo foloisi winali . Maro wokakawi awi dodiao awi more , komagena ngohi lo aku ai more de lo ai nali ifoloi .

text: He that cometh from above is above all : he that is of the earth is earthly , and speaketh of the earth : he that cometh from heaven is above all .
text2: Una o sorogaka de wouti , Una magena foloisi wolamo de o bi nyawa yangodu o duniaka . Duma nakoso o nyawa la ka o duniaka yasibuo , ona magena manga sininga ma kanako ka o dunia ma kanako . So ka magena aku ona isibicara . Duma Una foloi wolamo gena Una asa o sorogaka de wouti .

text: And what he hath seen and heard , that he testifieth ; and no man receiveth his testimony .
text2: So o bi moi - moi qangodu o sorogaka wakokelelo de woiise magena wosingangasu o nyawa o duniaka . Duma Awi demo gena o nyawa moi lo yopiricayawa .

text: He that hath received his testimony hath set to his seal that God is true .
text2: Duma nakoso o nyawa la kanaga yopiricaya Awi demo magena , gena ona lo isitatapu o Gikimoi Awi demo gena igogou de itiai .

text: For he whom God hath sent speaketh the words of God : for God giveth not the Spirit by measure unto him .
text2: Sababu Una magena o Gikimoi wisulo la wahino , so Una Awi demo gena ka imatero de o Gikimoi Awi demo . O Gikimoi Awi Gurumi ma kuasa gena Una wihike qaasu - asu .

text: The Father loveth the Son , and hath given all things into his hand .
text2: Ma Baba Gikimoi widodara igogou ma Ngopaka de lo wisiputuru sidago o bi moi - moi qangodu lo aku wapareta .

text: He that believeth on the Son hath everlasting life : and he that believeth not the Son shall not see life ; but the wrath of God abideth on him .
text2: So nakoso o nyawa la kanaga o Gikimoi ma Ngopa iwipiricayaka , ona magena asa yamake o oho ka sidutu ikakali . Duma kanaga o nyawa nakoso Una wihoholu , ona magena asa o oho ka sidutu ikakali gena yamakewa . Sababu ona wihoholu o Gikimoi asa wafanggali so dede o Gikimoi imakitinga ka sidutu ikakali . "

text: And he must needs go through Samaria .
text2: So o Yudeaka de Una womajobo wotagi o Galileaka , de o Gikimoi wodupa so upa o ngeko ma somoa wamote , duma bilasu wakahika o Samaria ma tonaka watola , ena gena o Israel ma tona moi .

text: Now Jacob ' s well was there . Jesus therefore , being wearied with his journey , sat thus on the well : and it was about the sixth hour .
text2: O wange itiaika , nagala o cako mogiowo de sinoto , de ona imasidiado o doku moi o Samaria ma tonaka , ena gena isironga o Sikhar . O doku magena he yadumuka , de ona imasiwoma kekiaka o riho magenaka kanaga de o sumu moi . O Sikhar gena imakabati de o tona kekiaka iqoqomaka ona manga ete de manga topora o Yakub gena wihike awi ngopa o Yusufka . De kagena o riho magenaka kanaga o sumu moi isironga lo o Yakub awi sumu . Ma sababu to ona manga dodagi ikuru so o Yesus asa wimomoqoka , so Una womawoma de womatamiku kagena o Yakub awi sumu ma dateka .

text: ( For his disciples were gone away unto the city to buy meat . )
text2: De Awi muri - muri itagi o dokuka , o ino imaija , so Una widongosaka o sumu magenaka . So ona imajoboka de itekawa , de o Samariaka ma ngopeqeka moi mahino kagena o sumuka o ake momasiui . So kagena de Una asa womagolo munaka wotemo , " Awa , nako qaloha , de tanu ani ake sutu noiguse la Ngohi aku taudo . "

text: Then saith the woman of Samaria unto him , How is it that thou , being a Jew , askest drink of me , which am a woman of Samaria ? for the Jews have no dealings with the Samaritans .
text2: Kagena de muna magena motemo , " Awa kodo , Baba ! Ngona gena o Yahudika ma nyawa moi de ngohi manena o Samaria ma nyawa moi , de qadoohaso sidago Ngona de o ake nogolo ngohika . " ( Muna ami sango komagena , sababu o Yahudika ma nyawa de o Samariaka ma nyawa gena ona imatekedodiaowa , sidago manga bobita lo itemo upa manga lelenga eko manga udo - udo imakabau de imakacapu . )

text: Jesus answered and said unto her , If thou knewest the gift of God , and who it is that saith to thee , Give me to drink ; thou wouldest have asked of him , and he would have given thee living water .
text2: Duma Una asa wotemo munaka , " Nakoso ngona gena nanako o kia naga o Gikimoi Awi ngongike o nyawaka , de lo nakoso ngona Ngohi noinakoka o ake togogolo Ngohi manena gena naguuna , ngona lo asa o ake nogolo kali Ngohino , kekiaka de o ake magena o nyawa aku o oho ma duhutu yamake . "

text: The woman saith unto him , Sir , thou hast nothing to draw with , and the well is deep : from whence then hast thou that living water ?
text2: De muna motemo , " Baba , o sumu manena duruhe iluku de Ngona gena Ani ember ihiwa , so kekiano done asa Ngona o ake noqehe la ngohi aku o oho ma duhutu magena tamake .

text: Art thou greater than our father Jacob , which gave us the well , and drank thereof himself , and his children , and his cattle ?
text2: Cedeke ! Cawali to ngomi mia topora o Yakub o sumu manena waaka so kanena o ake mimasiui . Iqoqomaka una de awi ngopa - ngopa lo yaudo . De awi haiwani lo qangodu wapapalihara awi sapi , awi duba , de lo awi kabi lo wosiudo . Duma ngohi tatagapi to Ngona Ani demo kanaga de ma ngale , nako Ngona de o Yakub gena , notemo Ngona foloisi nolamo . Gena ma ngeko idodooha . "

text: Jesus answered and said unto her , Whosoever drinketh of this water shall thirst again :
text2: 1 - 3 O Yesus o nyawa wadotosi kagena o Yudea ma tonaka , de o Farisika ma nyawa ona yogiise idodooha Una magena o nyawa yadadala waosi . Ngaroko yogiise komagena , duma Una he o nyawa waosi kawa , duma ka Awi muri - muri bato ona magena asa o nyawa yaosi . De ona Una wimomote magena manga dala idogo - dogo sidago nakoso isitetero Una de o Yohanes gena , Una wadoto de waosi foloisi yadala . So ma orasi ma Jou Una wanako gena o Farisika yogiise de nagala ona magena yodupawa , so wotemo , " Hino la potagi poliho o Galileaka . "
column6: Jesus answered and said unto her , Whosoever drinketh of this water shall thirst again :
column8: Kagena de o Yesus Una wotemo munaka , " O nyawa nagoona nakoso o ake o sumu manenano yaudo , ona magena done manga kiri asa ka qadudusi .

text: Jesus answered and said unto her , Whosoever drinketh of this water shall thirst again :
text2: 1 - 3 O Yesus o nyawa wadotosi kagena o Yudea ma tonaka , de o Farisika ma nyawa ona yogiise idodooha Una magena o nyawa yadadala waosi . Ngaroko yogiise komagena , duma Una he o nyawa waosi kawa , duma ka Awi muri - muri bato ona magena asa o nyawa yaosi . De ona Una wimomote magena manga dala idogo - dogo sidago nakoso isitetero Una de o Yohanes gena , Una wadoto de waosi foloisi yadala . So ma orasi ma Jou Una wanako gena o Farisika yogiise de nagala ona magena yodupawa , so wotemo , " Hino la potagi poliho o Galileaka . "
column6: Jesus answered and said unto her , Whosoever drinketh of this water shall thirst again :
column8: Kagena de o Yesus Una wotemo munaka , " O nyawa nagoona nakoso o ake o sumu manenano yaudo , ona magena done manga kiri asa ka qadudusi .

text: But whosoever drinketh of the water that I shall give him shall never thirst ; but the water that I shall give him shall be in him a well of water springing up into everlasting life .
text2: Duma nakoso o nyawa la kanaga o ake Ngohi tahihike gena yaudo , ka ma moi yaudoka de isidadu kawa . Sababu o ake magegena imadadi maro o jobubu moi ona manga rohe ma rabaka , de nogena asa isupu la yamake o oho ka sidutu ikakali . "

text: The woman saith unto him , Sir , give me this water , that I thirst not , neither come hither to draw .
text2: So motemo , " Wewe , Baba ! Tanu Ngona o ake magegena ngohi lo noihike taudo , la ai kiri upa he qadudu kali de ngohi lo upa he tahino kali kanena o ake tomasiui . "

text: Jesus saith unto her , Go , call thy husband , and come hither .
text2: Kagena de wotemo kali munaka , " Awa ! Hika ngona notagi ani roka nowingoso la ngini nikahino kali Ngohino . "

text: The woman answered and said , I have no husband . Jesus said unto her , Thou hast well said , I have no husband :
text2: De muna mosango motemo , " Ngohi ai roka ihiwa . " De wotemo munaka , " Ngona ani demo gena itero . Gena igogou ngona ani roka ihiwa .

text: For thou hast had five husbands ; and he whom thou now hast is not thy husband : in that saidst thou truly .
text2: Sababu ngona ani roka gena nomatagali he ma motoha qabolo , de o orasi manena naga ngona de yanau moi nimasikokogoge gena ani roka wisowo . So , Awa , ngona notemo ani roka ihiwa gena itiai de itero . "

text: The woman saith unto him , Sir , I perceive that thou art a prophet .
text2: " Wewe , Baba ! Nagala Ngona manena o nabi moi , sababu ma ngale to ngohi ai moi - moi gena qangodu aku nanako itiai .

text: Our fathers worshipped in this mountain ; and ye say , that in Jerusalem is the place where men ought to worship .
text2: Duma iqoqomaka to ngomi mia ete de mia topora bilasu o tala manenaka itagi de kagena asa manga suba o Gikimoika yatide . Ngaroko komagena , ngini o Yahudika nitemo , ngone bilasu o Gikimoi powisuba ka o Yerusalemka . "

text: Jesus saith unto her , Woman , believe me , the hour cometh , when ye shall neither in this mountain , nor yet at Jerusalem , worship the Father .
text2: So kagena de o Yesus wotemo kali munaka , " Awa , tanu ngona gena bilasu nopiricaya Ai demo manena , de ma orasi lo he idumuka ngini done asa Ai Babaka nisuba gena , upa o talaka de lo upa o Yerusalemka , duma o riho kiaka bato lo aku o Gikimoi ka powisuba .

text: Ye worship ye know not what : we know what we worship : for salvation is of the Jews .
text2: De ngini o Samariaka ma nyawa ngaroko Una niwisuba , duma Una magena niwinako waasi . Duma ngomi o Yahudika ma nyawa , Una miwisusuba gena , ngomi miwinakoka . Sababu o Salamati ma Kolano gena Awi sihino o Yahudi ma nyawano .

text: But the hour cometh , and now is , when the true worshippers shall worship the Father in spirit and in truth : for the Father seeketh such to worship him .
text2: Ngaroko komagena , ma orasi done asa yaado , de igogou ma orasi magena yaadoka , de Ai Baba Awi Gurumi asa o nyawa yariwo so ona aku isuba Ai Babaka . O nyawa kanaga la manga suba ma gola Unaka gena , ona magegena igogou winako . O suba ma ngeko komagena Ai Baba wodupa .

text: God is a Spirit : and they that worship him must worship him in spirit and in truth .
text2: Sababu o Gikimoi Una gena ka o Gurumi , so nakoso o nyawa la iwisuba Unaka , to ona manga suba ma rabaka bilasu Awi Gurumi ona magenaka wariwo sidago kanaga manga sininga ma rabaka aku igogou winako . "

text: The woman saith unto him , I know that Messias cometh , which is called Christ : when he is come , he will tell us all things .
text2: So o ngopeqeka muna magena mobicara kali motemo , " Ngohi tanako o Salamati ma Kolano , Una magena wisiaso ma Kristus , done asa wahino , la ma orasi womasidiado , de Una masirete o bi moi - moi qangodu magena asa womidoto ngomika . "

text: Jesus saith unto her , I that speak unto thee am he .
text2: De o Yesus wotemo munaka , " Nako Una magena , ka ka Ngohi qabolo . "

text: And upon this came his disciples , and marvelled that he talked with the woman : yet no man said , What seekest thou ? or , Why talkest thou with her ?
text2: Kagena de to Una Awi muri - muri iliho so yaado o sumuka , de to ona manga sininga ma rabaka ibao itemo , " Ilaha ! O kiaso Ngona dede o ngopeqeka momatengo nimatekebicara . " Ngaroko manga siningaka ibao komagena , duma ona he wisano kawa .

text: The woman then left her waterpot , and went her way into the city , and saith to the men ,
text2: So o ngopeqeka magena ami ake ma ember he matotota kawa , de ka modongosaka de moliho mokahika o dokuka , de o bi nyawa kagena masigaro

text: Come , see a man , which told me all things that ever I did : is not this the Christ ?
text2: de motemo , " Niahinosi ! La potagi nanga sumuka de kagena o nyawa moi niwikelelo . Ngaroko ngohi woinako waasi , duma Una aku ka wanako to ngohi ai manara moi - moi iqoqoma taaakaka , so magena qangodu woisingangasu ngohika . Igogou , Una magena o Salamati ma Kolano , eko idodooha . "

text: Then they went out of the city , and came unto him .
text2: So ona manga doku yodongosa de itagi yakahika Unaka .

text: In the mean while his disciples prayed him , saying , Master , eat .
text2: Ona imasidiado waasi , kagena o sumuka so Awi muri - muri iwigolo de wigegego Unaka itemo , " Baba Guru , nooqo kasi . "

text: But he said unto them , I have meat to eat that ye know not of .
text2: Duma Una asa wosango onaka wotemo , " Ngohi kanaga de Ai ino , duma ngini ningodu moi lo magena nianakowa . "

text: Therefore said the disciples one to another , Hath any man brought him ought to eat ?
text2: Magena de Awi muri - muri ona imatekekasano moi de moika itemo , " Nagala kanaga o nyawa o ino sutu Una wigahoka , eko idodooha . "

text: Jesus saith unto them , My meat is to do the will of him that sent me , and to finish his work .
text2: So Una asa wasingangasu onaka wotemo , " O kia naga to Ngohi Ai ino gena , nakoso towisigise Una woisusuloka so tahino kanena , de lo nakoso Awi manara magena taaka qabolo .

text: Say not ye , There are yet four months , and then cometh harvest ? behold , I say unto you , Lift up your eyes , and look on the fields ; for they are white already to harvest .
text2: Ma biasa ma orasi nia doro niodato qaboloka , de ngini nitemo , ' O ngoosa iha ma simaka gena ma orasi poutu . ' Duma Ngohi tinidedemo nginika , hika ngini nia lako niapelenga de nia doro nianano kasi . Sababu o sopo magena qaomuka so aku niautu , ena gena o nyawa la kanaga Ai demo yodupa yosigise .

text: And he that reapeth receiveth wages , and gathereth fruit unto life eternal : that both he that soweth and he that reapeth may rejoice together .
text2: De kanaga ona yautu manga manara magena ma fanggali yamake qabolo , sababu to ona manga dato ma sopo gena yamake o oho ka sidutu ikakali . So bai ona o doroka yodadato lo bai ona o doroka youutu , ona yangodu manga nali gena ka imaketero .

text: And herein is that saying true , One soweth , and another reapeth .
text2: De magena igogou de itero maro o kia o orasi isigeto - geto o nyawa itemo , ' Ma binuka yodato de ma binukali youtu . '

text: I sent you to reap that whereon ye bestowed no labour : other men laboured , and ye are entered into their labours .
text2: Nako ngini gena , Ngohi tinisulo la tanu ngini asa nitagi o nyawaka kiaka yasihabari qabolo so niadotoka de ona lo aku yopiricaya . Maro nitagi niautu nia doro niamomanarawa de kanaga o nyawa ma somoali imanara iqomaka , sidago ngini lo o fanggali niamake to ona manga manarano . " So o Yesus wotemo komagena onaka .

text: And many of the Samaritans of that city believed on him for the saying of the woman , which testified , He told me all that ever I did .
text2: De kanaga o Samariaka ma nyawa o doku magegenaka igogoge gena , ona yadala asa Unaka wipiricaya , sababu to muna ami demo ma orasi mosingangasu motemo , " Una aku wanako de ngohi woisingangasu idodooha to ngohi ai manara moi - moi iqoqoma taaakaka . "

text: So when the Samaritans were come unto him , they besought him that he would tarry with them : and he abode there two days .
text2: So ona imasidiado Unaka , de ona asa iwigolo de wigegego itemo , " Baba , Ngona bilasu nogoge to ngomi mia dokuka . Ngona Ani dodagi upasi nosidofa . " So Una de Awi muri - muri lo yogogogesi dede ona ma deka o wange sinoto .

text: And many more believed because of his own word ;
text2: De o orasi magena o nyawa wipipiricaya Unaka asa foloisi yadala , sababu ona yoiseka to Una Awi dodoto .

text: And said unto the woman , Now we believe , not because of thy saying : for we have heard him ourselves , and know that this is indeed the Christ , the Saviour of the world .
text2: De ona asa o ngopeqeka magena imidedemo itemo , " Ma sababu ma nonoma gena ngona nomisingangasu so Una miwipiricaya , duma o orasi manena ngomi Una miwipiricaya sababu ngomi masirete lo asa miwikelelo de miise ka Unano . So ngomi aku mianako igogou Una asa o bi nyawa o dunia manena ma dokuka manga dorouno wasisalamati . "

text: Now after two days he departed thence , and went into Galilee .
text2: O wange sinoto magena ipasaka , de o Yesus womajobo kali wotagi o Galileaka .

text: For Jesus himself testified , that a prophet hath no honour in his own country .
text2: Una wotagi kagena to Una Awi doku masireteka , ngaroko ipapasaka wotemo , " Nakoso o nabi moi kanaga to una awi doku masireteka wogoge gena asa iwihoromatiwa . "

text: Then when he was come into Galilee , the Galilaeans received him , having seen all the things that he did at Jerusalem at the feast : for they also went unto the feast .
text2: Ma orasi Una womasidiado o Galileaka gena o nyawa kagena iwiqehe qalohaka , gena ma gola ipapasaka ma orasi o Paskah ma Wange ma Rarame o Yerusalemka , de Una o bi moi - moi waakaka gena ona lo kagena , so magena qangodu yakeleloka .

text: When he heard that Jesus was come out of Judaea into Galilee , he went unto him , and besought him that he would come down , and heal his son : for he was at the point of death .
text2: De Una woliho o doku o Kanaka o Galilea ma tonaka , ipapasaka kagena o ake de Una waaka so imadadi o anggurka . Kagena lo o kadato ma bobaretaka womomanara moi wogiise o Yesus asa o Yudeano wolihoka de o Galilea ma dokuka womasidiadoka . Una magena awi ngopa yanau moi o doku Kapernaumka wopanyake so awi siri he foloi qatubuso de una wotagi wogolo o Yesuska , so wotemo , " Baba , ai ngopa awi siri foloi qatotubuso so he yadangade wosone , so tanu Ngona notagi cai - cai o Kapernaumka la una nowisiloha . "

text: Then said Jesus unto him , Except ye see signs and wonders , ye will not believe .
text2: Duma o Yesus wotemo una o kadato ma bobaretaka , " Nakoso Ngohi tinisikelelowa o nonako ihahairani , ngini asa Ngohi nipiricayawa . "

text: The nobleman saith unto him , Sir , come down ere my child die .
text2: Duma una wosango o Yesuska wotemo , " Jou , nahinoka bai ! Done ai ngopa wosone so . "

text: Jesus saith unto him , Go thy way ; thy son liveth . And the man believed the word that Jesus had spoken unto him , and he went his way .
text2: Kagena de o Yesus wotemo , " Notagi noliho bato , ani ngopa asa wilohaka . " O nyawa una magena wopiricaya o kia o Yesus wotetemo gena , so wotagi woliho .

text: And as he was now going down , his servants met him , and told him , saying , Thy son liveth .
text2: Kagena de woliho so o ngeko ma soaka , de awi nyawa asa wisibubusu so wisingangasu itemo , " Igogou , ani ngopa wilohaka . "

text: Then inquired he of them the hour when he began to amend . And they said unto him , Yesterday at the seventh hour the fever left him .
text2: De una wasano onaka , " O cako muruoka de ai ngopa wiloha . " De ona yosango , " Kagunugo o cako moi o wange itotiai de awi sosahu isisaka . "

text: So the father knew that it was at the same hour , in the which Jesus said unto him , Thy son liveth : and himself believed , and his whole house .
text2: De ma baba una womasininga de wanako igogou , sababu o orasi magena de o Yesus wotemo unaka , " Ani ngopa wilohaka . " So kagena de o ngopa magena ma baba de ma awa de awi tahu ma raba yangodu lo o Yesus iwipiricayaka .

text: This is again the second miracle that Jesus did , when he was come out of Judaea into Galilee .
text2: So o orasi magegena o Yesus kanaga o Yudea ma tonaka de woliho womasidiado o Galileaka gena , he ma para ma sinotoka o nonako ihahairani waaka .

text: After this there was a feast of the Jews ; and Jesus went up to Jerusalem .
text2: So magena ipasaka , de o Yahudika manga rarame moi ma orasi yaadoka , de o Yesus wotagi kali o Yerusalemka o rarame magena wamote .

text: Now there is at Jerusalem by the sheep market a pool , which is called in the Hebrew tongue Bethesda , having five porches .
text2: De kagena o kota ma boberesu isigogilolino kanaga ma ngora moi isironga o Duba ma Ngora kagena yowosa de ma rabaka kanaga o ake ma lepa moi , magena isironga de o Ibrani ma bahasa itemo o Betesda . O Betesda ma lepa magena isigilolino de o kia naga maro o bi dadaru ngai motoha , duma ma golingasu yagogarade de ma katu qaloloha gena o tetono .

text: In these lay a great multitude of impotent folk , of blind , halt , withered , waiting for the moving of the water .
text2: De kagena naga o bi nyawa yadadala igogoge ona o siri ma rabaka , ena gena moi - moi de manga panyake so ma binuka ipipilo , ma binuka ilulugu , de ma binukali manga rohe isosone . ( ( De ona yodamaha o ake magena iluaki .

text: For an angel went down at a certain season into the pool , and troubled the water : whosoever then first after the troubling of the water stepped in was made whole of whatsoever disease he had .
text2: Sababu mamoi - mamoi kanaga o Gikimoi Awi malaikat moi yahino iutiku de o ake magena yaluaki . De o orasi magena nakoso nagoona yopopanyake la yahika yoqoma o akeku youti yomatono , ona magena ngaroko manga panyake o kia bato lo done aku qaloha kali . ) )

text: And a certain man was there , which had an infirmity thirty and eight years .
text2: De o ake magena ma dateka kanaga o nyawa wopopanyake moi , una magena kagena wogogoge awi orasi ma deka o taungu moruwange de tupaangeka .

text: When Jesus saw him lie , and knew that he had been now a long time in that case , he saith unto him , Wilt thou be made whole ?
text2: Ato o Yesus wikelelo una magena de awi sangisara ma deka lo aku ka wanako , so o Yesus wotemo unaka , " Baba , idodooha nodupa Ngona nisiloha . "

text: The impotent man answered him , Sir , I have no man , when the water is troubled , to put me into the pool : but while I am coming , another steppeth down before me .
text2: De o nyawa una magena wotemo o Yesuska , " Baba , nagala idadiwa , sababu ngaroko ngohi todupa iloha , duma ma orasi o ake manena iluaki , ngohi ai dodiao moi lo yahiwa iriwo la ngohi isiguti o akeku . So ngaroko tomariwo totase la o akeku touti , duma o nyawa ma somoa gena kanaga o akeku youti yoqomaka . "

text: Jesus saith unto him , Rise , take up thy bed , and walk .
text2: Woiseka komagena , de wolulugu una magenaka wotemo , " Nomaoko , de ani jongutu nalolo la natoti de notagi . "

text: And immediately the man was made whole , and took up his bed , and walked : and on the same day was the sabbath .
text2: Ato wobicara qabolo de una magena wilohaka , so gila - gila womaoko so awi jongutu watoti so wotagi . Magena o Yesus waaka o Sabat ma wangeka .

text: The Jews therefore said unto him that was cured , It is the sabbath day : it is not lawful for thee to carry thy bed .
text2: So kanaga o Yahudika manga roriri yamuruo naga gena iwikelelo una wisiloloha awi jongutu watoti , de ona iwisidapano itemo , " Qadoohaso ngona o Sabat ma wangeka de ani jongutu natoti . Sababu nanga adati de nanga galepu gena itemo upa paaka komagena o Sabat ma wangeka . "

text: He answered them , He that made me whole , the same said unto me , Take up thy bed , and walk .
text2: Duma una wotemo onaka , " Ngaroko komagena , duma kanaga o nyawa moi woisulo ngohika , so ai jongutu talolo la tatoti de totagi sidago tahino kanena . Una magena ngohi woisilohaka de woisulo , ' Hika nomaokoye ! De ngona ani jongutu nalolo la natoti de notagi . ' "

text: Then asked they him , What man is that which said unto thee , Take up thy bed , and walk ?
text2: So ona magena itemo unaka , " Una magena naguuna so wonisulo ngona hika ani jongutu natoti de notagi . "

text: And he that was healed wist not who it was : for Jesus had conveyed himself away , a multitude being in that place .
text2: Duma una asa he winako kawa , sababu ma orasi o Yesus wisiloha gena , to Una Awi ronga wodedemo waasi de wotagi womasicapu o nyawa yadadala manga sidongirabaka .

text: Afterward Jesus findeth him in the temple , and said unto him , Behold , thou art made whole : sin no more , lest a worse thing come unto thee .
text2: Qaboloka , de ona asa imakamake kali o Gikimoi Awi Tahuka , so o Yesus wisingangasu una wisilolohaka magena de wotemo , " Igogou , ani buturu iliho kali . So ngona gena nosanangika . So tanu Ai beseso manena nosigise la ngona gena upa o dorou naaka kali . Ngaroko ani sangisara iqoqomaka gena ilamo , duma o dorou ma sopo gena ma fanggali lo asa o sangisara foloisi ilamo . "

text: The man departed , and told the Jews that it was Jesus , which had made him whole .
text2: So una magena womajobo wokahika o Yahudi ma nyawa manga roririka , de wosingangasu wotemo , " O nyawa kiaka ngohi woisilohaka gena Una magena Awi ronga o Yesus . "

text: And therefore did the Jews persecute Jesus , and sought to slay him , because he had done these things on the sabbath day .
text2: Komagena o Sabat ma wangeka de o Yesus una wisilohaka , so ma ngale magegena o Yahudika manga roriri asa o Yesus wisitobio .
